atk-s0508a1:14_0: Therehi bhāsitā gāthā, therīhi ca nirāmisā.
atk-s0508a1:33_2: kāmañcāyamattho gāthāsu vuttoyeva pākaṭakaraṇatthaṃ pana punapi vuccate –
atk-s0508a1:33_4: Yā hi te attanā yathādhigataṃ maggaphalasukhaṃ paccavekkhitvā kāci udānavasena,
atk-s0508a1:33_8: tā sabbā saṅgītikāle ekajjhaṃ katvā “theragāthā”icceva dhammasaṅgāhakehi saṅgītā.
atk-s0508a1:34_6: khuddakanikāyoti pañcasu nikāyesu khuddakanikāyapariyāpannā, suttaṃ, geyyaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:37_0: Evaṃ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena paṭiññātesu caturāsītiyā dhammakkhandhasahassesu katipayadhammakkhandhasaṅgahaṃ gatā.
atk-s0508a1:38_0: Tattha theragāthā tāva nipātato ekanipāto ekuttaravasena yāva cuddasanipātāti cuddasanipāto soḷasanipāto
atk-s0508a1:38_1: vīsatinipāto tiṃsanipāto cattālīsanipāto paññāsanipāto saṭṭhinipāto sattatinipātoti ekavīsatinipātasaṅgahā.
atk-s0508a1:38_3: Eko ekeko gāthānaṃ nipāto nikkhepo etthāti ekanipāto.
atk-s0508a1:39_1: Ekekasmiṃ vagge dasa dasa katvā vīsuttarasataṃ therā,
atk-s0508a1:42_41: Sampiṇḍetvā pana dvesatāni catusaṭṭhi ca therā,
atk-s0508a1:42_42: sahassaṃ tīṇi satāni saṭṭhi ca gāthāti.
atk-s0508a1:43_0: “Sahassaṃ honti tā gāthā, tīṇi saṭṭhi satāni ca;
atk-s0508a1:44_0: Therā ca dve satā saṭṭhi, cattāro ca pakāsitā”ti.
atk-s0508a1:45_0: Therīgāthā pana ekanipāto ekuttaravasena yāva navanipātāti navanipāto ekādasanipāto,
atk-s0508a1:45_19: aṭṭha nipātato paṭṭhāya yāva soḷasanipātā ekekā theriyo taṃtaṃnipātaparimāṇā gāthā;
atk-s0508a1:45_28: Evamettha nipātānaṃ gāthāvaggānaṃ gāthānañca parimāṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:47_0: Evaṃ paricchinnaparimāṇāsu panetāsu theragāthā ādi. Tatthāpi –
atk-s0508a1:50_0: Ayaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle āyasmatā ānandena tesaṃ therānaṃ thomanatthaṃ bhāsitā gāthā ādi.
atk-s0508a1:50_4: “Atha kho sīho senāpati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī”tiādīsu paññattiyaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:50_18: Yathā hi “oṭṭhasseva mukhaṃ etassā”ti vutte oṭṭhassa mukhaṃ viya mukhaṃ etassāti ayamattho vutto eva hoti,
atk-s0508a1:50_19: evamidhāpi “sīhānaṃvā”ti vutte sīhānaṃ nādo viyāti ayamattho vutto eva hoti.
atk-s0508a1:50_31: liṅgaṃ pana parivattetvā “sīhīna”ntiādinā itthiliṅgavasenāpi attho veditabbo.
atk-s0508a1:50_32: Ekasesavasena vā sīhā ca sīhiyo ca sīhā,
atk-s0508a1:50_33: tesaṃ sīhānantiādinā sādhāraṇā hetā tisso nidānagāthā theragāthānaṃ therīgāthānañcāti.
atk-s0508a1:51_1: Yathā hi sīhassa migarañño balavisesayogato sarabhamigamattavaravāraṇāditopi parissayo nāma natthi,
atk-s0508a1:51_3: gocarāya pakkamantopi tejussadatāya mattagandhahatthivanamahiṃsādike samāgantvā abhīrū achambhī abhibhavati,
atk-s0508a1:51_4: abhibhavanto ca te aññadatthu hantvā tattha mudumaṃsāni bhakkhayitvā sukheneva viharati,
atk-s0508a1:51_5: evametepi mahātherā ariyabalavisesayogena sabbesampi parissayānaṃ sahanato,
atk-s0508a1:51_6: rāgādisaṃkilesabalassa abhibhavitvā hananato pajahanato tejussadabhāvena kutocipi abhīrū achambhī jhānādisukhena
atk-s0508a1:51_7: viharantīti sahanato hananato ca sīhā viyāti sīhā.
atk-s0508a1:51_8: Saddatthato pana yathā kantanatthena ādiantavipallāsato takkaṃ vuccati,
atk-s0508a1:51_11: Pisodarādipakkhepena niruttinayena pana vuccamāne vattabbameva natthi.
atk-s0508a1:52_0: Atha vā yathā migarājā kesarasīho attano tejussadatāya ekacārī viharati,
atk-s0508a1:52_2: evametepi tejussadatāya vivekābhiratiyā ca ekacārinoti ekacariyaṭṭhenapi sīhā viyāti sīhā, tenāha –
atk-s0508a1:53_0: Atha vā asantāsanajavaparakkamādivisesayogato sīhā viyāti sīhā,
atk-s0508a1:54_4: Bhikkhu ca khīṇāsavo sīho ca migarājā”ti.
atk-s0508a1:55_2: Tathā hi so usabhasatampi laṅghitvā vanamahiṃsādīsu nipatati,
atk-s0508a1:55_3: potakopi samāno pabhinnamadānampi mattavaravāraṇānaṃ paṭimānaṃ bhinditvā dantakaḷīraṃva khādati.
atk-s0508a1:55_4: Etesaṃ pana ariyamaggajavo iddhijavo ca aññehi asādhāraṇo,
atk-s0508a1:56_1: Gocaraparakkamatuṭṭhivelādīsu hi yathā sīhā attano āsayato nikkhamitvā vijambhitvā sīhanādaṃ abhītanādaṃ nadanti,
atk-s0508a1:56_2: evaṃ etepi visayajjhattapaccavekkhaṇaudānādikālesu imaṃ abhītanādaṃ nadiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:56_8: Yathā hi sīhā ativiya daḷhānaṃ tikkhānañca catunnaṃ dāṭhānaṃ balena paṭipakkhaṃ abhibhavitvā attano manorathaṃ matthakaṃ pūrenti,
atk-s0508a1:56_9: evametepi catunnaṃ ariyamaggadāṭhānaṃ balena anādimati saṃsāre anabhibhūtapubbapaṭipakkhaṃ abhibhavitvā attano manorathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:56_10: Idhāpi dāṭhā viyāti dāṭhāti sadisakappanāvaseneva attho veditabbo.
atk-s0508a1:57_4: Idaṃ pana nesaṃ virocanaṭṭhānadassanañceva sīhanādassa yogyabhūmidassanañca.
atk-s0508a1:57_6: Yathā hi sīhā yebhuyyena girigabbhare aññehi durāsadatāya janavivitte vasantā attano dassanena uppajjanakassa
atk-s0508a1:57_8: evametepi aññehi durāsadagirigabbharasadiseva suññāgārevasantā guṇehi khuddakānaṃ puthujjanānaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhiparittāsaparivajjanatthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:58_1: tena vakkhamānānaṃ gāthānaṃ sannipatitāya parisāya sotukāmataṃ uppādento savane ādaraṃ janeti,
atk-s0508a1:58_3: Atha vā “sīhāna”ntiādīnaṃ padānaṃ sadisakappanāya vinā mukhyavaseneva attho veditabbo.
atk-s0508a1:58_4: Tasmā daḷhatikkhabhāvena pasaṭṭhātisayadāṭhatāya dāṭhīnaṃ girigabbhare nadantānaṃ sīhagajjitaṃ gajjantānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:58_5: sīhānaṃ migarājūnaṃ viya tesaṃ abhītanādasadisā gāthā suṇāthāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:58_7: “yathā sīhanādaṃ nadantānaṃ sīhānaṃ migarājūnaṃ kutocipi bhayābhāvato so abhītanādo tadaññamigasantāsakaro,
atk-s0508a1:58_8: evaṃ bhāvitattānaṃ appamattānaṃ therānaṃ sīhanādasadisiyo sabbaso bhayahetūnaṃ suppahīnattā abhītanādabhūtā,
atk-s0508a1:59_1: Cittañhi “attā hi kira duddamo yo ve ṭhitatto tasaraṃva ujjū”ti ca “attasammāpaṇidhī”ti ca evamādīsu attāti vuccati,
atk-s0508a1:59_2: tasmā adhicittānuyogena samathavipassanābhivaḍḍhitacittānaṃ samathavipassanābhāvanāmatthakaṃ pāpetvā ṭhitānanti attho.
atk-s0508a1:59_6: anuṭṭhubhādivasena isīhi pavattitaṃ catuppadaṃ chappadaṃ vā vacanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:59_8: Attatthādibhede atthe upanenti tesu vā upaniyyantīti atthūpanāyikā.
atk-s0508a1:60_1: attabhāvo hi āhito ahaṃ māno etthāti “attā”ti vuccati,
atk-s0508a1:60_2: so ca tehi appamādabhāvanāya anavajjabhāvanāya bhāvito sammadeva guṇagandhaṃ gāhāpito.
atk-s0508a1:60_3: Tena tesaṃ kāyabhāvanā sīlabhāvanā cittabhāvanā paññābhāvanāti catunnampi bhāvanānaṃ paripuṇṇabhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:60_7: Sambodhi pana tividhā sammāsambodhi paccekasambodhi sāvakasambodhīti.
atk-s0508a1:60_8: Tattha sammā sāmaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ bujjhanato bodhanato ca sammāsambodhi.
atk-s0508a1:60_9: Sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ maggañāṇaṃ maggañāṇapadaṭṭhānañca sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ “sammāsambodhī”ti vuccati. Tenāha –
atk-s0508a1:61_0: “Buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi,
atk-s0508a1:61_1: tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto balesu ca vasībhāva”nti.
atk-s0508a1:62_3: Sammāsambuddhānañhi sayambhūñāṇatāya sayameva pavattamānopi saccābhisamayo sānubuddho aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ saccābhisamayassa hetubhāvato.
atk-s0508a1:62_4: Imesaṃ pana so ekassāpi sattassa saccābhisamayahetu na hoti.
atk-s0508a1:62_7: Tividhāpesā tiṇṇaṃ bodhisattānaṃ yathāsakaṃ āgamanīyapaṭipadāya matthakappattiyā satipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ sattatiṃsāya
atk-s0508a1:62_9: Na hi sacchikiriyābhisamayena vinā bhāvanābhisamayo sambhavati,
atk-s0508a1:62_10: sati ca bhāvanābhisamaye pahānābhisamayo pariññābhisamayo ca siddhoyeva hotīti.
atk-s0508a1:63_0: Yadā hi mahābodhisatto paripūritabodhisambhāro carimabhave katapubbakicco bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha –
atk-s0508a1:63_2: yāva na me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccissatī”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā aparājitapallaṅke nisinno asampattāya
atk-s0508a1:63_3: eva sañjhāvelāya mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā purimayāme pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena anekākāravokāre pubbe nivutthakkhandhe
atk-s0508a1:63_4: anussaritvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuvisodhanena cutūpapātañāṇaanāgataṃsañāṇāni adhigantvā pacchimayāme
atk-s0508a1:63_5: “kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno jāyati ca jīyati ca mīyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca,
atk-s0508a1:63_6: atha ca panimassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṃ nappajānāti jarāmaraṇassā”tiādinā jarāmaraṇato paṭṭhāya paṭiccasamuppādamukhena
atk-s0508a1:63_7: vipassanaṃ abhinivisitvā mahāgahanaṃ chindituṃ nisadasilāyaṃ pharasuṃ nisento viya kilesagahanaṃ chindituṃ
atk-s0508a1:63_8: lokanātho ñāṇapharasuṃ tejento buddhabhāvāya hetusampattiyā paripākaṃ gatattā sabbaññutaññāṇādhigamāya
atk-s0508a1:63_9: vipassanaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpento antarantarā nānāsamāpattiyo samāpajjitvā yathāvavatthāpite nāmarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:63_11: sammasanavāraṃ vitthāretvā tattha mahāvajirañāṇasaṅkhāte vipassanāñāṇe tikkhe sūre pasanne vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvena
atk-s0508a1:63_13: tadā maggapaṭipāṭiyā diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ khepento aggamaggakkhaṇe sammāsambodhiṃ adhigacchati nāma,
atk-s0508a1:63_15: Sammāsambuddhabhāvato dasabalacatuvesārajjādayopi tassa tadā hatthagatāyeva hontīti ayaṃ tāva abhisamayato sammāsambodhipaṭipadā.
atk-s0508a1:63_16: Tadatthato pana mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya yāva tusitabhavane nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:63_19: taṃ sabbākārasampannaṃ cariyāpiṭakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vitthārato vuttamevāti tattha vuttanayeneva gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:64_0: Paccekabodhisattāpi paccekabodhiyā katābhinīhārā anupubbena sambhatapaccekasambodhisambhārā tādise kāle
atk-s0508a1:64_1: carimattabhāve ṭhitā ñāṇassa paripākagatabhāvena upaṭṭhitaṃ saṃveganimittaṃ gahetvā savisesaṃ bhavādīsu
atk-s0508a1:64_2: ādīnavaṃ disvā sayambhūñāṇena pavatti pavattihetuṃ nivatti nivattihetuñca paricchinditvā “so ‘idaṃ dukkha’nti
atk-s0508a1:64_3: yoniso manasi karotī”tiādinā āgatanayena catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ paribrūhentā attano abhinīhārānurūpaṃ
atk-s0508a1:64_4: saṅkhāre parimaddantā anukkamena vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā aggamaggaṃ adhigacchantā paccekasambodhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:64_6: aggaphalakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya paccekasambuddhā nāma hutvā sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhiṇeyyā honti.
atk-s0508a1:65_0: Sāvakā pana satthu sabrahmacārino vā catusaccakammaṭṭhānakathaṃ sutvā tasmiṃyeva khaṇe kālantare vā tajjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:65_1: paṭipattiṃ anutiṭṭhantā ghaṭentā vāyamantā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā,
atk-s0508a1:65_3: saccāni paṭivijjhantā attano abhinīhārānurūpasiddhiaggasāvakabhūmiyā vā kevalaṃ vā aggamaggakkhaṇe sāvakasambodhiṃ adhigacchanti nāma.
atk-s0508a1:65_4: Tato paraṃ sāvakabuddhā nāma honti sadevake loke aggadakkhiṇeyyā.
atk-s0508a1:65_5: Evaṃ tāva abhisamayato paccekasambodhi sāvakasambodhi ca veditabbā.
atk-s0508a1:66_0: Tadatthato pana yathā mahābodhisattānaṃ heṭṭhimaparicchedena cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappānaṃ satasahassañca
atk-s0508a1:66_1: bodhisambhārasambharaṇaṃ icchitabbaṃ majjhimaparicchedena aṭṭha asaṅkhyeyyāni kappānaṃ satasahassañca,
atk-s0508a1:66_2: uparimaparicchedena soḷasa asaṅkhyeyyāni kappānaṃ satasahassañca ete ca bhedā paññādhikasaddhādhikavīriyādhikavasena veditabbā.
atk-s0508a1:66_3: Paññādhikānañhi saddhā mandā hoti paññā tikkhā,
atk-s0508a1:66_4: tato ca upāyakosallassa visadanipuṇabhāvena nacirasseva pāramiyo pāripūriṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0508a1:66_5: Saddhādhikānaṃ paññā majjhimā hotīti tesaṃ nātisīghaṃ nātisaṇikaṃ pāramiyo pāripūriṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0508a1:66_6: Vīriyādhikānaṃ pana paññā mandā hotīti tesaṃ cireneva pāramiyo pāripūriṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0508a1:66_8: Tesañhi satipi paññādhikabhāve dve asaṅkhyeyyāni kappānaṃ satasahassañca bodhisambhārasambharaṇaṃ icchitabbaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:66_10: Saddhādhikavīriyādhikāpi vuttaparicchedato paraṃ katipaye eva kappe atikkamitvā paccekasambodhiṃ abhisambujjhanti,
atk-s0508a1:66_13: tesaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ kappānaṃ satasahassañca sambhārasambharaṇaṃ icchitabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:66_16: tathā buddhassa mātāpitūnaṃ upaṭṭhākassa puttassa ca.
atk-s0508a1:70_0: Evaṃ vutte aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā katapaṇidhānānaṃ mahābodhisattānaṃ mahābhinīhārato pabhuti savisesaṃ
atk-s0508a1:70_1: dānādīsu yuttappayuttānaṃ divase divase vessantaradānasadisaṃ mahādānaṃ dentānaṃ tadanurūpasīlādike sabbapāramidhamme
atk-s0508a1:70_2: ācinantānampi yathāvuttakālaparicchedaṃ asampatvā antarā eva buddhabhāvappatti nāma natthi. Kasmā?
atk-s0508a1:70_4: Paricchinnakāle nipphāditaṃ viya hi sassaṃ buddhañāṇaṃ yathāparicchinnakālavaseneva vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:70_5: vepullaṃ āpajjantaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhantaṃ paripākaṃ gacchatīti evaṃ –
atk-s0508a1:73_0: Ime pañca dhamme samodhānetvā katābhinīhārānaṃ paccekabodhisattānaṃ “adhikāro chandatā”ti dvaṅgasamannāgatāya
atk-s0508a1:73_1: patthanāya vasena katapaṇidhānānaṃ sāvakabodhisattānañca tattha tattha vuttakālaparicchedaṃ asampatvā
atk-s0508a1:73_2: antarā eva paccekasambodhiyā yathāvuttasāvakasambodhiyā ca adhigamo natthi. Kasmā?
atk-s0508a1:73_4: Imesampi hi yathā mahābodhisattānaṃ dānādipāramīhi paribrūhitā paññāpāramī anukkamena gabbhaṃ gaṇhantī paripākaṃ gacchantī buddhañāṇaṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0508a1:73_5: evaṃ dānādīhi paribrūhitā anupubbena yathārahaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhantī paripākaṃ gacchantī paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ sāvakabodhiñāṇañca paripūreti.
atk-s0508a1:73_6: Dānaparicayena hete tattha tattha bhave alobhajjhāsayatāya sabbattha asaṅgamānasā anapekkhacittā hutvā,
atk-s0508a1:73_7: sīlaparicayena susaṃvutakāyavācatāya suparisuddhakāyavacīkammantā parisuddhājīvā indriyesu guttadvārā
atk-s0508a1:73_8: bhojane mattaññuno hutvā jāgariyānuyogena cittaṃ samādahanti,
atk-s0508a1:74_0: Evaṃ pana paṭipajjantānaṃ adhikārasampattiyā appakasireneva aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañcābhiññā chaḷabhiññā
atk-s0508a1:74_3: Yañhi paccekabodhiyā sāvakabodhiyā vā atthāya dānādipuññasambharaṇe abbhussahanaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:74_15: Evaṃ dānasīlabhāvanāsu sīlasamādhipaññāsu ca sijjhamānāsu vīriyādayo siddhā eva honti.
atk-s0508a1:74_16: Sāyeva paccekabodhiatthāya sāvakabodhiatthāya ca dānādipaṭipadā tesaṃ bodhisattānaṃ santānassa bhāvanato paribhāvanato bhāvanā nāma.
atk-s0508a1:74_17: Visesato dānasīlādīhi svābhisaṅkhate santāne pavattā samathavipassanāpaṭipadā,
atk-s0508a1:75_4: pubbayogāvacaro diṭṭheva dhamme paṭikacca aññaṃ ārādheti,
atk-s0508a1:75_5: no ce diṭṭheva dhamme paṭikacca aññaṃ ārādheti,
atk-s0508a1:76_1: abhisamayasaṅkhātāya maggabhāvanāya ca bhāvitattabhāvā buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakā bhāvitattā nāma.
atk-s0508a1:77_0: Ettha ca “sīhānaṃvā”ti iminā therānaṃ sīhasamānavuttitādassanena attano paṭipakkhehi anabhibhavanīyataṃ,
atk-s0508a1:77_3: gāthā”ti iminā theragāthānaṃ sīhanādasadisatādassanena tāsaṃ paravādehi anabhibhavanīyataṃ,
atk-s0508a1:77_11: Tasmiṃ sati paṭipassaddhīppahānaṃ nissaraṇappahānañca siddhameva hoti,
atk-s0508a1:77_13: Maggakkhaṇe hi ariyā appamādabhāvanaṃ bhāventi nāma,
atk-s0508a1:78_4: Sīlena ca tesaṃ paṭipattiyā ādikalyāṇatā dassitā,
atk-s0508a1:78_8: “sabbapāpassa akaraṇa”nti ca vacanato sīlaṃ paṭipattiyā ādikalyāṇaṃva avippaṭisārādiguṇāvahattā.
atk-s0508a1:78_15: “paññaṃ bhāvaya”nti ca vacanato paññā paṭipattiyā pariyosānaṃva,
atk-s0508a1:78_16: paññuttarato kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ sāva kalyāṇā iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu tādibhāvāvahattā.
atk-s0508a1:83_0: Tathā sīlasampadāya tesaṃ kāmasukhānuyogasaṅkhātassa antassa parivajjanaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:83_3: Tathā sīlasampadāya tesaṃ vītikkamappahānaṃ kilesānaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:84_1: cittabhāvanā paññābhāvanāti tisso bhāvanā veditabbā kāyabhāvanāya tadantogadhattā.
atk-s0508a1:84_2: Sīlabhāvanā ca paṭipattiyā ādīti sabbaṃ purimasadisaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:84_3: Yathā pana sīhanādaṃ pare migagaṇā na sahanti,
atk-s0508a1:84_5: aññadatthu sīhanādova te abhibhavati evameva aññatitthiyavādā therānaṃ vāde na sahanti,
atk-s0508a1:84_12: Na hi dhammato sakkā kenaci aññathā kātuṃ appaṭivattanīyato.
atk-s0508a1:85_2: te sādhāraṇavasena nāmato gottato guṇato ca kittetuṃ “yathānāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:85_3: Asādhāraṇato pana tattha tattha gāthāsveva āvibhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:85_5: subhūti mahākoṭṭhikotiādinā nayena nāmadheyyena paññātāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:85_7: gotamo kassapotiādinā nayena kulapadesena yāya yāya jātiyā paññātāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:85_9: pariyattiparamatāyaṃ aṭṭhatvā yathānurūpaṃ samāpattivihārino hutvā vihariṃsūti attho.
atk-s0508a1:85_10: Atha vā yathādhammavihārinoti yathādhammā vihārino ca,
atk-s0508a1:85_11: yādisasīlādidhammā dibbavihārādīsu abhiṇhaso viharamānā yādisavihārā cāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:85_12: Yathādhimuttāti yādisaadhimuttikā saddhādhimuttipaññādhimuttīsu yaṃyaṃadhimuttikā suññatamukhādīsu vā yathā yathā nibbānaṃ adhimuttāti yathādhimuttā.
atk-s0508a1:86_0: “Assaddho akataññū ca, sandhicchedo ca yo naro”tiādi..
atk-s0508a1:87_2: Sappaññāti tihetukapaṭisandhipaññāya pārihārikapaññāya bhāvanāpaññāya cāti tividhāyapi paññāya paññavanto.
atk-s0508a1:87_3: Vihariṃsūti tāya eva sappaññatāya yathāladdhena phāsuvihāreneva vasiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:88_0: Ettha ca pana nāmagottaggahaṇena tesaṃ therānaṃ pakāsapaññātabhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:88_7: “atanditā”ti iminā evaṃ attahitasampattiyaṃ ṭhitānaṃ parahitapaṭipattiṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:89_0: Atha vā “yathānāmā”ti idaṃ tesaṃ therānaṃ garūhi gahitanāmadheyyadassanaṃ samaññāmattakittanato.
atk-s0508a1:89_4: “Yathādhimuttā sappaññā”ti idaṃ nesaṃ vijjāsampattidassanaṃ āsavakkhayapariyosānāya ñāṇasampattiyā adhigamaparidīpanato.
atk-s0508a1:89_8: Na hi sammāappaṇihitattano pubbe ca akatapuññassa saddhānusārīdhammānusārino gottasampattisamudāgamo sambhavati.
atk-s0508a1:89_10: Na hi appatirūpe dese vasato sappurisūpanissayarahitassa ca tādisā guṇavisesā sambhavanti.
atk-s0508a1:89_12: Na hi paratoghosena vinā sāvakānaṃ saccasampaṭivedho sambhavati.
atk-s0508a1:89_13: “Sappaññā atanditā”ti iminā yathāvuttassa guṇavisesassa abyabhicārihetuṃ dasseti ñāyārambhadassanato.
atk-s0508a1:90_1: “yathāgottā”ti ettha gottakittanena tesaṃ therānaṃ yonisomanasikārasampadaṃ dasseti yathāvuttagottasampannassa yonisomanasikārasambhavato.
atk-s0508a1:90_2: “Yathādhammavihārino”ti ettha dhammavihāraggahaṇena saddhammasavanasampadaṃ dasseti saddhammasavanena vinā tadabhāvato.
atk-s0508a1:90_5: “Atanditā”ti iminā vuttanayena attahitasampattiṃ paripūretvā ṭhitānaṃ paresaṃ hitasukhāvahāya paṭipattiyaṃ akilāsubhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:90_6: Tathā “yathāgottā”ti iminā nesaṃ saraṇagamanasampadā dassitā saddhānusārīgottakittanato.
atk-s0508a1:90_11: paññā pariyosānanti ādimajjhapariyosānadassanena sabbepi sāvakaguṇā dassitā honti.
atk-s0508a1:91_0: Īdisī pana guṇavibhūti yāya sammāpaṭipattiyā tehi adhigatā,
atk-s0508a1:91_2: Tattha tatthāti tesu tesu araññarukkhamūlapabbatādīsu vivittasenāsanesu.
atk-s0508a1:91_3: Tattha tatthāti vā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ udānādikāle.
atk-s0508a1:91_6: pañcamaṃ visuddhiṃ adhigantvā paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā matthakaṃ pāpanavasena vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā
atk-s0508a1:91_9: Tañhi sayaṃ acavanadhammattā adhigatānaṃ accutihetubhāvato ca natthi ettha cutīti “accutaṃ”.
atk-s0508a1:91_10: Saṅkhatadhammehi asammissabhāvatāya tadatthikehi paṭipajjitabbatāya ca “pada”nti ca vuccati.
atk-s0508a1:91_13: so attano paccayehi uppāditattā kato nāma.
atk-s0508a1:91_14: Tassa pana pariyosānabhūtaṃ phalaṃ katantoti adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:91_16: Atha vā paccayehi katattā nipphāditattā katā nāma saṅkhatadhammā,
atk-s0508a1:91_19: Paccavekkhantāti “adhigataṃ vata mayā ariyamaggādhigamena idaṃ ariyaphalaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:91_20: adhigatā asaṅkhatā dhātū”ti ariyaphalanibbānāni vimuttiñāṇadassanena paṭipattiṃ avekkhamānā.
atk-s0508a1:91_21: Atha vā saccasampaṭivedhavasena yaṃ ariyena karaṇīyaṃ pariññādisoḷasavidhaṃ kiccaṃ aggaphale ṭhitena nipphāditattā pariyosāpitattā kataṃ nāma,
atk-s0508a1:91_24: Purimanayena pana itarapaccavekkhaṇānīti ekūnavīsati paccavekkhaṇāni dassitāni honti.
atk-s0508a1:92_0: Imamatthanti ettha imanti sakalo theratherīgāthānaṃ attho attano itaresañca tattha sannipatitānaṃ dhammasaṅgāhakamahātherānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:92_1: buddhiyaṃ viparivattamānatāya āsanno paccakkhoti ca katvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:92_2: Atthanti “channā me kuṭikā”tiādīhi gāthāhi vuccamānaṃ attūpanāyikaṃ parūpanāyikaṃ lokiyalokuttarapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ atthaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:92_4: taṃdīpaniyo idāni mayā vuccamānā tesaṃ bhāvitattānaṃ gāthā attūpanāyikā suṇāthāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a1:92_5: Te ca mahātherā evaṃ kathentā attano sammāpaṭipattipakāsanīhi gāthāhi sāsanassa ekantaniyyānikavibhāvanena
atk-s0508a1:92_6: parepi tattha sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ niyojentīti etamatthaṃ dīpeti āyasmā dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko,
atk-s0508a1:92_7: tathā dīpento ca imāhi gāthāhi tesaṃ thomanaṃ tāsañca tesaṃ vacanassa nidānabhāvena ṭhapanaṃ ṭhānagatamevāti dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:97_0: Idāni channā me kuṭikātiādinayappavattānaṃ theragāthānaṃ atthavaṇṇanā hoti.
atk-s0508a1:97_1: Sā panāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā yasmā tāsaṃ tāsaṃ gāthānaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ pakāsetvā vuccamānā pākaṭā hoti suviññeyyā ca.
atk-s0508a1:97_2: Tasmā tattha tattha aṭṭhuppattiṃ pakāsetvā atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāmāti.
atk-s0508a1:98_0: Tattha channā me kuṭikātigāthāya kā uppatti? Vuccate –
atk-s0508a1:98_1: ito kira kappasatasahassamatthake anuppanneyeva padumuttare bhagavati lokanāthe haṃsavatīnāmake nagare
atk-s0508a1:98_4: So vayappatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā tattha sāraṃ apassanto attano parivārabhūtehi catucattālīsāya māṇavakasahassehi
atk-s0508a1:98_5: saddhiṃ pabbatapāde isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca ca abhiññāyo nibbattesi.
atk-s0508a1:99_0: Tena ca samayena padumuttaro bhagavā loke uppajjitvā haṃsavatīnagaraṃ upanissāya viharanto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:99_1: paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento nandatāpasassa antevāsikajaṭilānaṃ arahattūpanissayaṃ nandatāpasassa ca
atk-s0508a1:99_2: dvīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa sāvakaṭṭhānantarassa patthanaṃ disvā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā pubbaṇhasamaye
atk-s0508a1:99_3: pattacīvaramādāya aññaṃ kañci anāmantetvā sīho viya ekacaro nandatāpasassa antevāsikesu phalāphalatthāya
atk-s0508a1:99_4: gatesu “buddhabhāvaṃ me jānātū”ti passantasseva nandatāpasassa ākāsato otaritvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:99_5: Nandatāpaso buddhānubhāvañceva lakkhaṇapāripūriñca disvā lakkhaṇamante sammasitvā “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato
atk-s0508a1:99_6: nāma agāraṃ ajjhāvasanto rājā hoti cakkavattī,
atk-s0508a1:99_7: pabbajanto loke vivaṭacchado sabbaññū buddho hoti.
atk-s0508a1:99_8: Ayaṃ purisājānīyo nissaṃsayaṃ buddhoti ñatvā paccuggamanaṃ katvā,
atk-s0508a1:99_12: Nandatāpasopi attano anucchavikaṃ āsanaṃ gahetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0508a1:100_0: Tasmiṃ samaye catucattālīsasahassajaṭilā paṇītapaṇītāni ojavantāni phalāphalāni gahetvā ācariyassa santikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:100_1: sampattā buddhānañceva ācariyassa ca nisinnāsanaṃ olokentā āhaṃsu – “ācariya,
atk-s0508a1:100_2: mayaṃ ‘imasmiṃ loke tumhehi mahantataro natthī’ti vicarāma,
atk-s0508a1:100_3: ayaṃ pana puriso tumhehi mahantataro maññe”ti.
atk-s0508a1:100_6: sāsapena saddhiṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhisatasahassayojanubbedhaṃ sineruṃ upametuṃ icchatha,
atk-s0508a1:100_7: sabbaññubuddhena saddhiṃ mā maṃ upamitthā”ti āha.
atk-s0508a1:100_8: Atha te tāpasā “sace ayaṃ orako abhavissa,
atk-s0508a1:100_9: na amhākaṃ ācariyo evaṃ upamaṃ āhareyya,
atk-s0508a1:100_10: yāva mahā vatāyaṃ purisājānīyo”ti pādesu nipatitvā sirasā vandiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:100_15: tumhe yaṃ yaṃ paṇītaṃ phalāphalaṃ ānītaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:100_16: taṃ taṃ āharathā”ti vatvā āharāpetvā hatthe dhovitvā sayaṃ tathāgatassa patte patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0508a1:100_17: Satthārā phalāphale paṭiggahitamatte devatā dibbojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:100_19: Tato bhojanakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā nisinne satthari sabbe antevāsike pakkositvā satthu santike sāraṇīyaṃ kathaṃ kathento nisīdi.
atk-s0508a1:100_21: Bhikkhū satthu cittaṃ ñatvā satasahassamattā khīṇāsavā āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:101_3: tumhehi ajja uḷāraṃ bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca sakkāraṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0508a1:101_5: Acinteyyattā iddhivisayassa muhutteneva vaṇṇagandhasampannāni pupphāni āharitvā buddhānaṃ yojanappamāṇaṃ pupphāsanaṃ paññāpesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:101_9: Evaṃ paññattesu āsanesu nandatāpaso tathāgatassa purato añjaliṃ paggayha ṭhito, “bhante,
atk-s0508a1:101_10: mayhaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya imaṃ pupphāsanaṃ abhiruhathā”ti āha.
atk-s0508a1:101_12: Evaṃ nisinne satthari satthu ākāraṃ ñatvā bhikkhū attano attano pattāsane nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:101_13: Nandatāpaso mahantaṃ pupphachattaṃ gahetvā tathāgatassa matthake dhārento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:101_14: Satthā “tāpasānaṃ ayaṃ sakkāro mahapphalo hotū”ti nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajji.
atk-s0508a1:101_16: Tathāgate sattāhaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā nisinne antevāsikā bhikkhācārakāle sampatte vanamūlaphalāphalaṃ
atk-s0508a1:101_17: paribhuñjitvā sesakāle buddhānaṃ añjaliṃ paggayha tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0508a1:101_18: Nandatāpaso pana bhikkhācārampi agantvā pupphachattaṃ dhārento sattāhaṃ pītisukheneva vītināmeti.
atk-s0508a1:102_0: Satthā nirodhato vuṭṭhāya araṇavihāriaṅgena dakkhiṇeyyaṅgena cāti dvīhi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ ekaṃ sāvakaṃ
atk-s0508a1:102_2: So cakkavattirañño santikā paṭiladdhamahālābho mahāyodho viya tuṭṭhamānaso attano visaye ṭhatvā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ sammasitvā anumodanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:102_3: Tassa desanāvasāne satthā sayaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0508a1:102_8: Aṭṭha parikkhārā kāye paṭimukkāva ahesuṃ saṭṭhivassattherā viya satthāraṃ parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:102_10: Tassa kira araṇavihārittherassa santike dhammaṃ sotuṃ āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya “aho vatāhampi anāgate uppajjanakabuddhassa
atk-s0508a1:102_11: sāsane iminā sāvakena laddhadhuraṃ labheyya”nti cittaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0508a1:102_12: So tena parivitakkena maggaphalapaṭivedhaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0508a1:102_13: Tathāgataṃ pana vanditvā sammukhe ṭhatvā āha – “bhante,
atk-s0508a1:102_16: “Araṇavihāriaṅge dakkhiṇeyyaaṅge ca etadaggaṃ patto eso bhikkhū”ti. “Bhante,
atk-s0508a1:102_17: yvāyaṃ mayā sattāhaṃ pupphachattaṃ dhārentena sakkāro kato,
atk-s0508a1:102_18: tena adhikārena na aññaṃ sampattiṃ patthemi,
atk-s0508a1:102_19: anāgate pana ekassa buddhassa sāsane ayaṃ thero viya dvīhaṅgehi samannāgato sāvako bhaveyya”nti patthanamakāsi.
atk-s0508a1:103_1: kho imassa tāpasassa patthanā”ti anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ pesetvā olokento kappasatasahassaṃ atikkamitvā samijjhanakabhāvaṃ disvā nandatāpasaṃ āha –
atk-s0508a1:103_3: anāgate kappasatasahassaṃ atikkamitvā gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0508a1:103_4: tassa santike samijjhissatī”ti vatvā dhammakathaṃ kathetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto ākāsaṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0508a1:103_5: Nandatāpaso yāva cakkhupathasamatikkamā satthāraṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca uddissa añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:103_6: So aparabhāge kālena kālaṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ suṇi.
atk-s0508a1:103_8: Tato pana cuto aparānipi pañca jātisatāni pabbajitvā āraññako ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:103_9: Kassapasammāsambuddhakālepi pabbajitvā āraññako hutvā gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūresi.
atk-s0508a1:103_10: Etaṃ kira vattaṃ aparipūretvā mahāsāvakabhāvaṃ pāpuṇantā nāma natthi.
atk-s0508a1:103_12: So vīsativassasahassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā kālaṅkatvā kāmāvacaradevaloke tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:108_0: “Phalaṃ mūlañca paṇṇañca, na bhuñjāmi ahaṃ tadā;
atk-s0508a1:115_0: Muyhase mohanīye ca, nikkhamassu vanā tuvaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:117_0: Mā kho visuddhaṃ dūsesi, nikkhamassu vanā tuvaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:119_0: Ubhopi mā virādhesi, nikkhamassu vanā tuvaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:121_0: Neva gāme araññe vā, na hi taṃ kaṭṭhasammataṃ.
atk-s0508a1:122_0: “Chavālātūpamo tvaṃ si, na gihī nāpi saññato;
atk-s0508a1:123_0: Ubhato muttako ajja, nikkhamassu vanā tuvaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:124_0: “Siyā nu kho tava etaṃ, ko pajānāti te idaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:129_0: Saṃvāsaṃ alabhanto hi, kathaṃ jīvihisi tuvaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:131_0: Balī nāgo upagantvā, yūthā nīharate gajaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:132_0: “Yūthā vinissaṭo santo, sukhaṃ sātaṃ na vindati;
atk-s0508a1:135_0: Tehi tvaṃ nissaṭo santo, sukhaṃ sātaṃ na lacchasi.
atk-s0508a1:139_0: Tathā sīlavīhino tvaṃ, na jhāyissasi katthaci.
atk-s0508a1:141_0: Mattikaṃ pettikañcāpi, natthi te nihitaṃ dhanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:143_0: Evaṃ jīvihisi gehe, sādhu te taṃ na ruccati.
atk-s0508a1:157_0: Maṇi yathā jotiraso, ākāse caṅkamī tadā.
atk-s0508a1:161_0: Devo nu kho ayaṃ satto, udāhu manujo ayaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:162_0: “Na me suto vā diṭṭho vā, mahiyā ediso naro;
atk-s0508a1:163_0: Api mantapadaṃ atthi, ayaṃ satthā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:183_0: Bhoge te ūnatā natthi, buddhānussatiyā phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:185_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:189_0: Subhūti nāma nāmena, hessasi satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a1:203_0: Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, buddhānussatiyā phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:208_0: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā subhūtitthero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
atk-s0508a1:209_0: Evaṃ pana so tāvatiṃsabhavane aparāparaṃ uppajjanavasena dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā tato cuto manussaloke
atk-s0508a1:209_1: anekasatakkhattuṃ cakkavattirājā ca padesarājā ca hutvā uḷāraṃ manussasampattiṃ anubhavitvā atha amhākaṃ
atk-s0508a1:209_2: bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyaṃ sumanaseṭṭhissa gehe anāthapiṇḍikassa kaniṭṭho hutvā nibbatti “subhūtī”tissa
atk-s0508a1:210_0: Tena ca samayena amhākaṃ bhagavā loke uppajjitvā pavattavaradhammacakko anupubbena rājagahaṃ gantvā tattha
atk-s0508a1:210_1: veḷuvanapaṭiggahaṇādinā lokānuggahaṃ karonto rājagahaṃ upanissāya sītavane viharati.
atk-s0508a1:210_2: Tadā anāthapiṇḍiko seṭṭhi sāvatthiyaṃ uṭṭhānakabhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā attano sahāyassa rājagahaseṭṭhino gharaṃ
atk-s0508a1:210_3: gato buddhuppādaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ sītavane viharantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpattiphale
atk-s0508a1:210_4: patiṭṭhāya satthāraṃ sāvatthiṃ āgamanatthāya yācitvā tato pañcacattālīsayojane magge yojane yojane satasahassapariccāgena
atk-s0508a1:210_5: vihāre patiṭṭhāpetvā sāvatthiyaṃ rājamānena aṭṭhakarīsappamāṇaṃ jetassa rājakumārassa uyyānabhūmiṃ koṭisanthārena
atk-s0508a1:210_6: kiṇitvā tattha bhagavato vihāraṃ kāretvā adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:210_7: Vihārapariggahaṇadivase ayaṃ subhūtikuṭumbiko anāthapiṇḍikaseṭṭhinā saddhiṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanto saddhaṃ paṭilabhitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0508a1:210_8: So upasampajjitvā dve mātikā paguṇā katvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā araññe samaṇadhammaṃ karonto mettājhānapādakaṃ
atk-s0508a1:210_10: So dhammaṃ desento yasmā satthārā desitaniyāmena anodissakaṃ katvā dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0508a1:210_12: Piṇḍāya caranto ghare ghare mettājhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya bhikkhaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti “evaṃ dāyakānaṃ mahapphalaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:210_17: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ araṇavihārīnaṃ yadidaṃ subhūti,
atk-s0508a1:210_19: Evamayaṃ mahāthero arahatte patiṭṭhāya attanā pūritapāramīnaṃ phalassa matthakaṃ patvā loke abhiññāto
atk-s0508a1:210_20: abhilakkhito hutvā bahujanahitāya janapadacārikaṃ caranto anupubbena rājagahaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a1:211_0: Rājā bimbisāro therassa āgamanaṃ sutvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā “idheva, bhante,
atk-s0508a1:211_4: Manussā avuṭṭhitāya upaddutā rañño nivesanadvāre ukkuṭṭhimakaṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:211_5: Rājā “kena nu kho kāraṇena devo na vassatī”ti vīmaṃsanto “therassa abbhokāsavāsena maññe na vassatī”ti cintetvā tassa paṇṇakuṭiṃ kārāpetvā “imissā, bhante,
atk-s0508a1:211_7: Thero kuṭikaṃ pavisitvā tiṇasanthārake pallaṅkena nisīdi.
atk-s0508a1:211_8: Tadā pana devo thokaṃ thokaṃ phusāyati,
atk-s0508a1:211_10: Atha thero lokassa avuṭṭhikabhayaṃ visamitukāmo attano ajjhattikabāhiravatthukassa parissayassa abhāvaṃ pavedento –
atk-s0508a1:213_0: “Channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā, vassa deva yathāsukhaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:214_0: Cittaṃ me susamāhitaṃ vimuttaṃ, ātāpī viharāmi vassa devā”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:216_1: saddo tāva “channā sā kumārikā imassa kumārakassa” “nacchannaṃ nappatirūpa”ntiādīsu patirūpe āgato.
atk-s0508a1:216_6: “Kyāhaṃ te nacchannopi karissāmī”tiādīsu nivāsanapārupane “āyasmā channo anācāraṃ ācaratī”tiādīsu paññattiyaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:216_8: channā kuṭi āhito ginī”ti ca ādīsu tiṇādīhi chādane.
atk-s0508a1:216_10: tasmā tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā channā yathā na vassati vassodakapatanaṃ na hoti na ovassati,
atk-s0508a1:217_9: sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato”ādīsu sāmiatthe āgato.
atk-s0508a1:217_12: Kiñcāpi khīṇāsavānaṃ mamāyitabbaṃ nāma kiñci natthi lokadhammehi anupalittabhāvato,
atk-s0508a1:217_13: lokasamaññāvasena pana tesampi “ahaṃ mamā”ti vohāramattaṃ hoti.
atk-s0508a1:218_0: Kuṭikāti pana mātukucchipi karajakāyopi tiṇādicchadano patissayopi vuccati. Tathā hi –
atk-s0508a1:220_0: Putte santānake brūsi, taṇhā me brūsi bandhana”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:224_1: “Kassapassa bhagavato bhagini kuṭi ovassati” “kuṭi nāma ullittā vā hoti avalittā vā”tiādīsu tiṇachadanapatissayo.
atk-s0508a1:224_2: Idhāpi so eva veditabbo paṇṇasālāya adhippetattā.
atk-s0508a1:225_15: na sukaraṃ akkhānena pāpuṇituṃ yāva sukhā saggā”tiādīsu sukhappaccayaṭṭhāne.
atk-s0508a1:225_19: Sā hi kuṭi anto bahi ca manāpabhāvena sampāditā nivāsanaphāsutāya “sukhā”ti vuttā.
atk-s0508a1:226_3: Savāte hi senāsane utusappāyo na labbhati,
atk-s0508a1:226_9: chandaṃ janehi jīvite apekkha”ntiādīsu sammutideve khattiye āgato.
atk-s0508a1:226_13: Visuddhidevānañhi bhagavato atidevabhāve vutte itaresaṃ vutto eva hoti.
atk-s0508a1:226_15: “Devo ca kālena kālaṃ na sammā dhāraṃ anuppavecchatī”tiādīsu meghe pajjunne vā.
atk-s0508a1:226_17: Vassāti hi te āṇāpento thero ālapati.
atk-s0508a1:226_19: Tava vassanena mayhaṃ bāhiro parissayo natthi,
atk-s0508a1:226_20: tasmā yathākāmaṃ vassāti vassūpajīvisatte anuggaṇhanto vadati.
atk-s0508a1:227_1: Tattha cittaṃ me susamāhitanti mama cittaṃ suṭṭhu ativiya sammā sammadeva ekaggabhāvena ārammaṇe ṭhapitaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:227_3: api ca kho vimuttaṃ orambhāgiyauddhaṃbhāgiyasaṅgahehi sabbasaṃyojanehi sabbakilesadhammato ca visesena vimuttaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:227_4: samucchedappahānavasena paṭipassaddhippahānavasena te pajahitvā ṭhitanti attho.
atk-s0508a1:227_6: Phalasamāpattiatthaṃ vipassanārambhavasena diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthañca āraddhavīriyo hutvā viharāmi,
atk-s0508a1:228_5: bahiddhā ca nāmarūpa”ntiādīsu kāyoti āgato. “Siñca, bhikkhu,
atk-s0508a1:228_9: gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhata”nti ca ādīsu gahanti āgato.
atk-s0508a1:228_11: tiṭṭhaṃ naro mohanasmiṃ pagāḷho”tiādīsu guhāti āgato.
atk-s0508a1:228_17: Attabhāvo hi kaṭṭhādīni paṭicca labbhamānā gehanāmikā kuṭikā viya aṭṭhiādisaññite pathavīdhātuādike phassādike
atk-s0508a1:232_0: Sā panesā attabhāvakuṭikā therassa tiṇṇaṃ channaṃ aṭṭhannañca asaṃvaradvārānaṃ vasena samati vijjhanakassa
atk-s0508a1:232_1: rāgādiavassutassa paññāya saṃvutattā sammadeva pihitattā “channā”ti vuttā.
atk-s0508a1:232_5: Vuttanayena channattā eva kilesadukkhābhāvato nirāmisasukhasamaṅgitāya ca sukhā sukhappattā,
atk-s0508a1:232_6: tato eva ca nivātā nihatamānamadathambhasārambhatāya nivātavuttikā.
atk-s0508a1:232_7: Ayañca nayo “mayhaṃ na saṃkilesadhammānaṃ saṃvaraṇamattena siddho,
atk-s0508a1:232_8: atha kho aggamaggasamādhinā suṭṭhu samāhitacittatāya ceva aggamaggapaññāya sabbasaṃyojanehi vippamuttacittatāya
atk-s0508a1:232_9: cā”ti dassento āha “cittaṃ me susamāhitaṃ vimutta”nti.
atk-s0508a1:232_10: Evaṃbhūto ca “idānāhaṃ katakaraṇīyo”ti na appossukko homi,
atk-s0508a1:232_12: sadevakassa lokassa hitasukhūpasaṃhāre ussāhajāto bhikkhācārakālepi anugharaṃ brahmavihāreneva viharāmi.
atk-s0508a1:232_14: pajjunna mayhaṃ piyaṃ kātukāmatāyapi vassūpajīvīnaṃ sattānaṃ anukampāyapi vassa sammā dhāraṃ anuppavecchāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0508a1:233_0: Ettha ca thero “channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā”ti iminā lokiyalokuttarabhedaṃ attano adhisīlasikkhaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:233_4: Atha vā “channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā”ti iminā animittavihāraṃ dasseti kilesavassapidhānamukhena niccādinimittugghāṭanadīpanato.
atk-s0508a1:233_7: “Ātāpī viharāmī”ti iminā tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vihārānaṃ adhigamūpāyaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:233_11: Tathā dutiyena paṭhamadutiyehi vā dhammavihārasampattiyo dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:233_13: “Ātāpī viharāmī”ti iminā parahitapaṭipattiyaṃ atanditabhāvaṃ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:234_0: Evaṃ “yathānāmā”ti gāthāya vuttānaṃ dhammavihārādīnaṃ imāya gāthāya dassitattā tattha adassitesu nāmagottesu
atk-s0508a1:234_9: na tathā gottenāti “itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā subhūtī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:234_20: Iti sundarāya sarīrāvayavavibhūtiyā sīlasampattiyādivibhūtiyā ca samannāgatattā subhūtīti paññāyittha sīlasārādithiraguṇayogato thero.
atk-s0508a1:234_22: Kasmā panete mahātherā attano guṇe pakāsentīti?
atk-s0508a1:234_23: Iminā dīghena addhunā anadhigatapubbaṃ paramagambhīraṃ ativiya santaṃ paṇītaṃ attanā adhigataṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:234_24: paccavekkhitvā pītivegasamussāhitaudānavasena sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvavibhāvanavasena ca paramappicchā
atk-s0508a1:238_2: Ayampi thero padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:238_3: accayena kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapetvā gharāvāsaṃ vasanto ekadivasaṃ padumuttarassa bhagavato dhammadesanākāle
atk-s0508a1:238_4: haṃsavatīnagaravāsike gandhamālādihatthe yena buddho yena dhammo yena saṅgho,
atk-s0508a1:238_5: tanninne tappoṇe tappabbhāre gacchante disvā mahājanena saddhiṃ upagato satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:238_6: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “ayaṃ kira imasmiṃ sāsane paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ aggo,
atk-s0508a1:238_7: aho vatāhampi ekassa buddhassa sāsane ayaṃ viya paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti cintetvā satthu
atk-s0508a1:238_11: So bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā sakanivesanaṃ gantvā sabbarattiṃ buddhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0508a1:238_12: ca nisajjaṭṭhānaṃ gandhadāmamālādāmādīhi alaṅkaritvā paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā tassā
atk-s0508a1:238_13: rattiyā accayena sake nivesane bhikkhusatasahassaparivāraṃ bhagavantaṃ vividhayāgukhajjakaparivāraṃ nānārasasūpabyañjanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:238_16: ahaṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthemi na kho pana mayhaṃ yuttaṃ ekadivasameva dānaṃ datvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetuṃ,
atk-s0508a1:238_17: anupaṭipāṭiyā satta divase dānaṃ datvā patthessāmī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:238_18: So teneva niyāmena satta divase mahādānāni datvā bhattakiccapariyosāne dussakoṭṭhāgāraṃ vivarāpetvā uttamaṃ
atk-s0508a1:238_19: ticīvarappahonakaṃ sukhumavatthaṃ buddhassa pādamūle ṭhapetvā bhikkhusatasahassassa ca ticīvaraṃ datvā
atk-s0508a1:238_21: yo so bhikkhu tumhehi ito sattamadivasamatthake etadagge ṭhapito,
atk-s0508a1:238_22: ahampi so bhikkhu viya anāgate uppajjanakabuddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti
atk-s0508a1:238_23: vatvā satthu pādamūle nipajjitvā patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:238_24: Satthā tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā “anāgate ito kappasatasahassamatthake gotamo nāma buddho loke uppajjissati,
atk-s0508a1:238_25: tassa sāsane tava patthanā samijjhissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:250_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:254_0: Atthe dhamme nirutte ca, paṭibhāne ca kovidaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:258_0: Nipacca pādamūlamhi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthayiṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:266_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:268_0: Koṭṭhiko nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a1:269_0: “Taṃ sutvā mudito hutvā, yāvajīvaṃ tadā jinaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:276_0: Sabbattha sukhito āsiṃ, tassa kammassa vāhasā.
atk-s0508a1:278_0: Aññaṃ gatiṃ na gacchāmi, suciṇṇassa idaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:280_0: Nīce kule na jāyāmi, suciṇṇassa idaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:284_0: Yadā me pitaraṃ buddho, vinayī sabbasuddhiyā.
atk-s0508a1:290_0: Pabhinnā tena lokaggo, etadagge ṭhapesi maṃ.
atk-s0508a1:295_0: “Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
atk-s0508a1:296_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:299_0: Evaṃ so tattha tattha bhave puññañāṇasambhāraṃ sambharanto aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:299_3: So vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvā brāhmaṇasippe nipphattiṃ gato ekadivasaṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:299_4: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā upasampannakālato paṭṭhāya vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto saha paṭisambhidāhi
atk-s0508a1:299_5: arahattaṃ patvā paṭisambhidāsu ciṇṇavasī hutvā abhiññāte abhiññāte mahāthere upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchantopi
atk-s0508a1:299_6: dasabalaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchantopi paṭisambhidāsuyeva pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0508a1:299_7: Evamayaṃ thero tattha katādhikāratāya ciṇṇavasībhāvena ca paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ aggo jāto.
atk-s0508a1:299_8: Atha naṃ satthā mahāvedallasuttaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi –
atk-s0508a1:299_11: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākoṭṭhiko”ti.
atk-s0508a1:299_12: So aparena samayena vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedento udānavasena –
atk-s0508a1:303_0: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā mahākoṭṭhikatthero gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:304_0: Tattha upasantoti manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ upasamanena nibbisevanabhāvakaraṇena upasanto.
atk-s0508a1:304_6: dubbhāsitato vinā attano bhāsanavasena caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ subhāsitaṃyeva bhaṇatīti attho.
atk-s0508a1:304_7: Jātiādivasena attano anukkaṃsanato na uddhatoti anuddhato atha vā tiṇṇaṃ kāyaduccaritānaṃ vūpasamanena tato paṭiviratiyā upasanto,
atk-s0508a1:304_11: Evaṃ pana tividhaduccaritappahānena suddhe sīle patiṭṭhito,
atk-s0508a1:304_13: tameva samādhiṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā dhunāti pāpake dhamme lāmakaṭṭhena pāpake sabbepi saṃkilesadhamme niddhunāti,
atk-s0508a1:304_17: yathā nāma dumassa rukkhassa pattaṃ paṇḍupalāsaṃ māluto vāto dhunāti,
atk-s0508a1:304_19: evaṃ yathāvuttapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhito pāpadhamme attano santānato nīharati,
atk-s0508a1:304_20: evamayaṃ therassa aññāpadesena aññābyākaraṇagāthāpi hotīti veditabbā.
atk-s0508a1:305_2: Evaṃ payogāsayasuddhassa “anuddhato”ti iminā uddhaccābhāvavacanena tadekaṭṭhatāya nīvaraṇappahānaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:305_6: “dhunāti pāpake dhamme”ti iminā paññābhāvanā vibhāvitā hoti.
atk-s0508a1:305_11: apāyabhavādīnaṃ samatikkamanūpāyo ca yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yojetabbā.
atk-s0508a1:305_12: Iminā nayena sesagāthāsupi yathārahaṃ atthayojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0508a1:305_13: Atthamattameva pana tattha tattha apubbaṃ vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0508a1:308_0: Paññaṃ imaṃ passāti āyasmato kaṅkhārevatassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:308_2: Ayampi thero padumuttarabhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatto.
atk-s0508a1:308_3: Ekadivasaṃ buddhānaṃ dhammadesanākāle heṭṭhā vuttanayena mahājanena saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante
atk-s0508a1:308_4: ṭhito dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ jhānābhiratānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mayāpi anāgate
atk-s0508a1:308_5: evarūpena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā desanāvasāne satthāraṃ nimantetvā heṭṭhā vuttanayena mahāsakkāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:308_7: ahaṃ iminā adhikārakammena aññaṃ sampattiṃ na patthemi,
atk-s0508a1:308_8: yathā pana so bhikkhu tumhehi ito sattamadivasamatthake jhāyīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito,
atk-s0508a1:308_9: evaṃ ahampi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane jhāyīnaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanamakāsi.
atk-s0508a1:308_10: Satthā anāgataṃ oloketvā nipphajjanabhāvaṃ disvā “anāgate kappasatasahassāvasāne gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0508a1:308_11: tassa sāsane tvaṃ jhāyīnaṃ aggo bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:309_0: So yāvajīvaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sāvatthinagare
atk-s0508a1:309_1: mahābhogakule nibbatto pacchābhattaṃ dhammassavanatthaṃ gacchantena mahājanena saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā
atk-s0508a1:309_2: parisapariyante ṭhito dasabalassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā upasampadaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0508a1:309_3: kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā jhānaparikammaṃ karonto jhānalābhī hutvā jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:309_4: So yebhuyyena dasabalena samāpajjitabbasamāpattiṃ samāpajjanto ahorattaṃ jhānesu ciṇṇavasī ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:309_7: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ yadidaṃ kaṅkhārevato”ti jhāyīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a1:323_0: Mudito hohi tvaṃ brahme, lacchase taṃ manorathaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:325_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:327_0: Revato nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a1:330_0: “Pacchime ca bhave dāni, jātohaṃ koliye pure;
atk-s0508a1:334_0: “Kaṅkhā me bahulā āsi, kappākappe tahiṃ tahiṃ;
atk-s0508a1:335_0: Sabbaṃ taṃ vinayī buddho, desetvā dhammamuttamaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:337_0: Viharāmi tadā buddho, maṃ disvā etadabravi.
atk-s0508a1:338_0: “Yā kāci kaṅkhā idha vā huraṃ vā, savediyā vā paravediyā vā;
atk-s0508a1:339_0: Ye jhāyino tā pajahanti sabbā, ātāpino brahmacariyaṃ carantā.
atk-s0508a1:340_0: “Satasahasse kataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dassesi me idha;
atk-s0508a1:346_0: “Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
atk-s0508a1:347_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:350_0: Tathā katakicco panāyaṃ mahāthero pubbe dīgharattaṃ attano kaṅkhāpakatacittataṃ idāni sabbaso vigatakaṅkhatañca
atk-s0508a1:350_2: tenetarahi evaṃ vigatakaṅkho ajjhattaṃ vūpasantacitto jāto”ti sañjātabahumāno bhagavato paññaṃ pasaṃsanto “paññaṃ imaṃ passā”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a1:351_3: Veneyyānaṃ āsayānusayacariyādhimuttiādippakāre dhammānaṃ kusalādike khandhādike ca desetabbappakāre jānāti,
atk-s0508a1:351_8: Tañhi attani siddhena desanābalena nayaggāhato paccakkhaṃ viya upaṭṭhitaṃ gahetvā “ima”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:351_9: Yadaggena vā satthu desanāñāṇaṃ sāvakehi nayato gayhati,
atk-s0508a1:351_10: tadaggena attano visaye paṭivedhañāṇampi nayato gayhateva.
atk-s0508a1:351_14: Passāti vimhayappatto aniyamato ālapati attanoyeva vā cittaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:351_17: puthū avijjāya paretaṃ bhūtaṃ bhūtarataṃ bhavā aparimutta”nti.
atk-s0508a1:351_26: abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgatoti evaṃ aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato.
atk-s0508a1:351_34: tathā gatabhāvena tathāgatoti evampi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgatoti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
atk-s0508a1:351_35: Vitthāro pana paramatthadīpaniyā udānaṭṭhakathāya itivuttakaṭṭhakathāya ca vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0508a1:352_0: Idāni tassā paññāya asādhāraṇavisesaṃ dassetuṃ “aggi yathā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:352_6: yathā nāma nisīthe rattiyaṃ caturaṅgasamannāgate andhakāre vattamāne unnate ṭhāne pajjalito aggi tasmiṃ padese tayagataṃ vidhamantaṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0508a1:352_7: evameva tathāgatānaṃ imaṃ desanāñāṇasaṅkhātaṃ sabbaso veneyyānaṃ saṃsayatamaṃ vidhamantaṃ paññaṃ passāti.
atk-s0508a1:352_8: Yato desanāvilāsena sattānaṃ ñāṇamayaṃ ālokaṃ dentīti ālokadā.
atk-s0508a1:352_10: Tadubhayampi kaṅkhāvinayapadaṭṭhānameva katvā dassento “ye āgatānaṃ vinayanti kaṅkha”nti āha,
atk-s0508a1:352_11: ye tathāgatā attano santikaṃ āgatānaṃ upagatānaṃ veneyyānaṃ “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”ntiādinayappavattaṃ soḷasavatthukaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:352_12: “buddhe kaṅkhati dhamme kaṅkhatī”tiādinayappavattaṃ aṭṭhavatthukañca kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchaṃ vinayanti desanānubhāvena
atk-s0508a1:352_14: Vinayakukkuccasaṅkhātā pana kaṅkhā tabbinayeneva vinītā hontīti.
atk-s0508a1:353_1: yathā aggi nisīthe rattibhāge pajjalito paṭutarajālo samujjalaṃ uccāsane ṭhitānaṃ obhāsadānamattena andhakāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:353_3: Accāsanne pana ṭhitānaṃ taṃ supākaṭaṃ karonto cakkhukiccakaraṇato cakkhudado nāma hoti,
atk-s0508a1:353_4: evameva tathāgato attano dhammakāyassa dūre ṭhitānaṃ akatādhikārānaṃ paññāpajjotena mohandhakāraṃ vidhamitvā
atk-s0508a1:353_6: āsanne ṭhitānaṃ pana katādhikārānaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ uppādento cakkhudadā bhavanti.
atk-s0508a1:353_7: Ye evaṃbhūtā attano vacīgocaraṃ āgatānaṃ mādisānampi kaṅkhābahulānaṃ kaṅkhaṃ vinayanti ariyamaggasamuppādanena vidhamanti,
atk-s0508a1:353_8: tesaṃ tathāgatānaṃ paññaṃ ñāṇātisayaṃ passāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a1:353_9: Evamayaṃ therassa attano kaṅkhāvitaraṇappakāsanena aññābyākaraṇagāthāpi hoti.
atk-s0508a1:353_10: Ayañhi thero puthujjanakāle kappiyepi kukkuccako hutvā kaṅkhābahulatāya “kaṅkhārevato”ti paññāto,
atk-s0508a1:356_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa dasabalassa uppattito puretarameva haṃsavatīnagare brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatto
atk-s0508a1:356_3: anukkamena viññutaṃ patto satthari loke uppajjante ekadivasaṃ buddhānaṃ dhammadesanākāle heṭṭhā vuttanayena
atk-s0508a1:356_4: mahājanena saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante nisīditvā dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ dhammakathikānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:356_5: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mayāpi anāgate evarūpena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā desanāvasāne vuṭṭhitāya
atk-s0508a1:356_6: parisāya satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā nimantetvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva mahāsakkāraṃ katvā bhagavantaṃ evamāha – “bhante,
atk-s0508a1:356_7: ahaṃ iminā adhikārakammena nāññaṃ sampattiṃ patthemi.
atk-s0508a1:356_8: Yathā pana so bhikkhu ito sattamadivasamatthake dhammakathikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito,
atk-s0508a1:356_9: evaṃ ahampi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane dhammakathikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:356_10: Satthā anāgataṃ oloketvā tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā “anāgate kappasatasahassamatthake gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0508a1:356_11: tassa sāsane tvaṃ pabbajitvā dhammakathikānaṃ aggo bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:357_0: So tattha yāvajīvaṃ kalyāṇadhammaṃ katvā tato cuto kappasatasahassaṃ puññañāṇasambhāraṃ sambharanto devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:357_1: saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle kapilavatthunagarassa avidūre doṇavatthunāmake brāhmaṇagāme brāhmaṇamahāsālakule
atk-s0508a1:357_4: So satthari abhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattavaradhammacakke anupubbena rājagahaṃ gantvā taṃ upanissāya viharante
atk-s0508a1:357_5: aññāsikoṇḍaññattherassa santike pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado sabbaṃ pubbakiccaṃ katvā padhānamanuyuñjanto
atk-s0508a1:357_6: pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvāva “dasabalassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti mātulattherena saddhiṃ satthu
atk-s0508a1:357_7: santikaṃ agantvā kapilavatthusāmantāyeva ohīyitvā yonisomanasikāre kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:365_0: Sabbe sissā attamanā, sutvāna mama bhāsato.
atk-s0508a1:373_0: Tassa pana puṇṇattherassa santike pabbajitā kulaputtā pañcasatā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:373_1: Thero sayaṃ dasakathāvatthulābhitāya tepi dasahi kathāvatthūhi ovadi.
atk-s0508a1:373_2: Te tassa ovāde ṭhatvā sabbeva arahattaṃ pattā.
atk-s0508a1:373_3: Te attano pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakappattaṃ ñatvā upajjhāyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āhaṃsu – “bhante,
atk-s0508a1:373_8: “mama dasakathāvatthulābhitaṃ satthā jānāti ahaṃ dhammaṃ desento dasa kathāvatthūni amuñcitvāva desemi,
atk-s0508a1:373_9: mayi gacchante sabbepime bhikkhū maṃ parivāretvā gacchissanti,
atk-s0508a1:373_10: evaṃ gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya gantvā pana ayuttaṃ mayhaṃ dasabalaṃ passituṃ,
atk-s0508a1:373_11: ime tāva gantvā passantū”ti te bhikkhū āha – “āvuso,
atk-s0508a1:373_15: Te therā sabbepi dasabalassa jātibhūmiraṭṭhavāsino sabbe khīṇāsavā sabbe dasakathāvatthulābhino attano
atk-s0508a1:373_16: upajjhāyassa ovādaṃ sampaṭicchitvā theraṃ vanditvā anupubbena cārikaṃ carantā saṭṭhiyojanamaggaṃ atikkamma
atk-s0508a1:373_17: rājagahe veḷuvanamahāvihāraṃ gantvā dasabalassa pāde vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:374_0: Āciṇṇaṃ kho panetaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisammoditunti bhagavā tehi saddhiṃ – “kacci,
atk-s0508a1:374_2: khamanīya”ntiādinā nayena madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā “kuto ca tumhe,
atk-s0508a1:374_7: jātibhūmiyaṃ jātibhūmakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ evaṃ sambhāvito ‘attanā ca appiccho appicchakathañca
atk-s0508a1:374_11: Taṃ kathaṃ sutvā āyasmā sāriputto therassa dassanakāmo ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:374_16: Thero dhammaṃ sutvā dasabalaṃ vanditvā paṭisallānatthāya andhavanaṃ gantvā aññataramhi rukkhamūle divāvihāraṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0508a1:375_0: Sāriputtattheropi tassāgamanaṃ sutvā sīsānulokiko gantvā okāsaṃ sallakkhetvā taṃ rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ upasaṅkamitvā therena saddhiṃ sammoditvā,
atk-s0508a1:375_2: Theropissa pucchitapucchitaṃ byākaronto rathavinītūpamāya cittaṃ ārādhesi,
atk-s0508a1:375_4: Atha satthā aparabhāge bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe nisinno theraṃ “etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:375_6: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ puṇṇo”ti dhammakathikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a1:375_7: So ekadivasaṃ attano vimuttisampattiṃ paccavekkhitvā “satthāraṃ nissāya ahañceva aññe ca bahū sattā saṃsāradukkhato vippamuttā,
atk-s0508a1:375_8: bahūpakārā vata sappurisasaṃsevā”ti pītisomanassajāto udānavasena pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ “sabbhireva samāsethā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:376_3: Te hi anavasesato asataṃ dhammaṃ pahāya saddhamme ukkaṃsagatattā sātisayaṃ pasaṃsiyattā ca visesato “santo sappurisā”ti ca vuccanti.
atk-s0508a1:376_5: Te payirupāsanto tesaṃ sussūsanto diṭṭhānugatiñca āpajjanto samānavāso bhaveyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:376_9: Tato eva attatthādibhedaṃ atthaṃ aviparītato passantīti atthadassino.
atk-s0508a1:376_13: te vā sammā sevantā ekantahitabhāvato maggañāṇādīheva araṇīyato atthaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:376_16: hīnacchandādīhi daṭṭhuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā itarehi ca kicchena daṭṭhabbattā duddasaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:376_22: dukkhena daṭṭhabbaṃ na sukhena daṭṭhuṃ sakkāti duddasaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:376_26: nirodhasaccanti evametaṃ catusaccaṃ dhīrā samadhigacchanti dhitisampannatāya dhīrā catusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā sammadeva adhigacchanti.
atk-s0508a1:376_31: Yasmā paṇḍitehi atthadassībhi samudāyabhūtehi dhīrā appamattā vicakkhaṇā mahantādivisesavantaṃ atthaṃ samadhigacchanti,
atk-s0508a1:379_2: Ayampi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:379_3: suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ senāsanapaññāpakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā
atk-s0508a1:379_4: taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā satthārā byākato yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaritvā kassapadasabalassa
atk-s0508a1:379_6: Tadā tena saddhiṃ apare cha janāti satta bhikkhū ekacittā hutvā aññe sāsane agāravaṃ karonte disvā –
atk-s0508a1:379_7: “idha kiṃ karoma ekamante samaṇadhammaṃ katvā dukkhassantaṃ karissāmā”ti nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā uccaṃ pabbatasikharaṃ āruhitvā,
atk-s0508a1:379_10: mā pacchānutappino ahuvatthā”ti vatvā sabbe ekacittā hutvā nisseṇiṃ pātetvā –
atk-s0508a1:379_12: āvuso”ti aññamaññaṃ ovaditvā cittarucikesu ṭhānesu nisīditvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:380_0: Tatreko thero pañcame divase arahattaṃ patvā,
atk-s0508a1:380_2: ahaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne kiṃ karissāmi”ti iddhiyā uttarakuruto piṇḍapātaṃ āharitvā, “āvuso,
atk-s0508a1:380_10: tenābhataṃ sesā paribhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karissantī”’ti. “Natthi, āvuso”ti.
atk-s0508a1:380_14: Thero te saññāpetuṃ asakkonto phāsukaṭṭhāne piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā gato.
atk-s0508a1:380_15: Aparo thero sattame divase anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā tato cuto suddhāvāsabrahmaloke nibbatto.
atk-s0508a1:380_16: Itare therā tato cutā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā tesu tesu kulesu nibbattā.
atk-s0508a1:381_0: Ayaṃ pana dabbatthero mallaraṭṭhe anupiyanagare ekassa mallarañño gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0508a1:381_2: matasarīraṃ susānaṃ netvā dārucitakaṃ āropetvā aggiṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:381_4: Dārako attano puññabalena uppatitvā ekasmiṃ dabbatthambhe nipati.
atk-s0508a1:381_6: Sā tassa nāmaṃ gaṇhantī dabbatthambhe patitvā laddhajīvitattā “dabbo”tissa nāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:381_7: Tassa ca sattavassikakāle satthā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro mallaraṭṭhe cārikaṃ caramāno anupiyambavane viharati.
atk-s0508a1:381_8: Dabbakumāro satthāraṃ disvā dassaneneva pasīditvā pabbajitukāmo hutvā “ahaṃ dasabalassa santike pabbajissāmī”ti ayyikaṃ āpucchi.
atk-s0508a1:381_10: tātā”ti dabbakumāraṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā, “bhante,
atk-s0508a1:381_14: So thero satthu vacanaṃ sutvā dabbakumāraṃ pabbājento tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0508a1:381_15: Pubbahetusampanno katābhinīhāro satto paṭhamakesavaṭṭiyā voropanakkhaṇe sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi,
atk-s0508a1:381_18: sabbakesānaṃ pana oropanañca arahattaphalasacchikiriyā ca apacchā apure ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:381_19: Satthā mallaraṭṭhe yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā rājagahaṃ gantvā veḷuvane vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0508a1:382_0: Tatrāyasmā dabbo mallaputto rahogato attano kiccanipphattiṃ oloketvā saṅghassa veyyāvaccakaraṇe kāyaṃ yojetukāmo cintesi –
atk-s0508a1:382_1: “yaṃnūnāhaṃ saṅghassa senāsanañca paññāpeyyaṃ bhattāni ca uddiseyya”nti.
atk-s0508a1:382_2: So satthu santikaṃ gantvā attano parivitakkaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0508a1:382_3: Satthā tassa sādhukāraṃ datvā senāsanapaññāpakattañca bhattuddesakattañca sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0508a1:382_4: Atha naṃ “ayaṃ dabbo daharova samāno mahante ṭhāne ṭhito”ti sattavassikakāleyeva upasampādesi.
atk-s0508a1:382_5: Thero upasampannakālato paṭṭhāya rājagahaṃ upanissāya viharantānaṃ sabbabhikkhūnaṃ senāsanāni ca paññāpeti,
atk-s0508a1:382_8: “dabbo kira mallaputto sabhāgasabhāgānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ekaṭṭhāne senāsanāni paññāpeti,
atk-s0508a1:383_0: Atha naṃ bhikkhū kālepi vikālepi – “amhākaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0508a1:383_2: amhākaṃ maddakucchismiṃ migadāye”ti evaṃ senāsanaṃ uddisāpetvā tassa iddhiṃ passantā gacchanti.
atk-s0508a1:383_3: Sopi iddhiyā manomaye kāye abhisaṅkharitvā ekekassa therassa ekekaṃ attanā sadisaṃ bhikkhuṃ datvā aṅguliyā
atk-s0508a1:383_4: jalamānāya purato gantvā “ayaṃ mañco idaṃ pīṭha”ntiādīni vatvā senāsanaṃ paññāpetvā puna attano vasanaṭṭhānameva
atk-s0508a1:383_8: Satthā idameva kāraṇaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā aparabhāge ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno theraṃ senāsanapaññāpakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi –
atk-s0508a1:383_11: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ senāsanapaññāpakānaṃ yadidaṃ dabbo mallaputto”ti.
atk-s0508a1:395_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:407_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:415_0: Sabbattha sukhito āsiṃ, tassa kammassa vāhasā.
atk-s0508a1:423_0: Kassapo nāma gottena, uppajji vadataṃ varo.
atk-s0508a1:429_0: Na suṇissāma saddhammaṃ, aho no appapuññatā.
atk-s0508a1:431_0: Sāgaro ca sasokova, vinadī karuṇaṃ giraṃ.
atk-s0508a1:435_0: Sadhūmā jālavaṭṭā ca, raviṃsu karuṇaṃ migā.
atk-s0508a1:437_0: Saṃviggā bhikkhavo satta, cintayimha mayaṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a1:445_0: Tasmā payogo kattabbo, yāva ṭhāti mune mataṃ.
atk-s0508a1:449_0: Ahañca pakkusāti ca, sabhiyo bāhiyo tathā.
atk-s0508a1:453_0: Mātā matā citāruḷhā, tato nippatito ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:461_0: Jino tasmiṃ guṇe tuṭṭho, etadagge ṭhapesi maṃ.
atk-s0508a1:465_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:467_0: Evaṃbhūtaṃ pana taṃ yena pubbe ekassa khīṇāsavattherassa anuddhaṃsanavasena katena pāpakammena bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye pacci,
atk-s0508a1:467_1: tāya eva kammapilotikāya codiyamānā mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū “iminā mayaṃ kalyāṇabhattikassa gahapatino
atk-s0508a1:467_2: antare paribheditā”ti duggahitagāhino amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:467_3: Tasmiñca adhikaraṇe saṅghena sativinayena vūpasamite ayaṃ thero lokānukampāya attano guṇe vibhāvento “yo duddamiyo”ti imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:468_3: Ubhayenapi aññaṃ viya katvā attānameva vadati.
atk-s0508a1:468_6: Idañca attano puthujjanakāle diṭṭhigatānaṃ visūkāyikānaṃ kilesānaṃ madālepacittassa vipphanditaṃ indriyānaṃ avūpasamanañca cintetvā vadati.
atk-s0508a1:468_8: tena hi danto puna dametabbatābhāvato “danto”ti vattabbataṃ arahati,
atk-s0508a1:468_10: Atha vā damenāti damakena purisadammasārathinā damito.
atk-s0508a1:468_13: Tenāha bhagavā imameva theraṃ sandhāya – “na kho, dabba,
atk-s0508a1:468_15: Santusitoti yathāladdhapaccayasantosena jhānasamāpattisantosena maggaphalasantosena ca santuṭṭho.
atk-s0508a1:468_16: Vitiṇṇakaṅkhoti soḷasavatthukāya aṭṭhavatthukāya ca kaṅkhāya paṭhamamaggeneva samugghāṭitattā vigatakaṅkho.
atk-s0508a1:468_17: Vijitāvīti purisājānīyena vijetabbassa sabbassapi saṃkilesapakkhassa vijitattā vidhamitattā vijitāvī.
atk-s0508a1:468_18: Apetabheravoti pañcavīsatiyā bhayānaṃ sabbaso apetattā apagatabheravo abhayūparato.
atk-s0508a1:468_25: tasmā pahātabbadhammānaṃ maggena sabbaso pahīnattā kilesaparinibbānena parinibbutoti attho.
atk-s0508a1:468_26: Ṭhitattoti ṭhitasabhāvo acalo iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvappattiyā lokadhammehi akampanīyo.
atk-s0508a1:468_28: tena yo pubbe duddamo hutvā ṭhito yasmā dabbattā satthārā uttamena damena damito santusito vitiṇṇakaṅkho vijitāvī apetabheravo,
atk-s0508a1:468_29: tasmā so dabbo parinibbuto tatoyeva ca ṭhitatto,
atk-s0508a1:468_31: na pasādaññathattanti paraneyyabuddhike satte anukampanto thero aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:471_2: Ito kira aṭṭhārasādhikassa kappasatassa matthake atthadassī nāma sambuddho loke uppajjitvā sadevakaṃ
atk-s0508a1:471_3: lokaṃ saṃsāramahoghato tārento ekadivasaṃ mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ gaṅgātīraṃ upagacchi.
atk-s0508a1:471_4: Tasmiṃ kāle ayaṃ gahapatikule nibbatto tattha bhagavantaṃ passitvā pasannamānaso upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0508a1:471_8: Satthā taṃ anukampanto saha bhikkhusaṅghena nāvaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0508a1:471_9: So sayampi abhiruyha sukheneva paratīraṃ sampāpetvā bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca dutiyadivase mahādānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:471_11: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaritvā ito terasādhikakappasatassa matthake khattiyakule nibbattitvā rājā ahosi cakkavattī dhammiko dhammarājā.
atk-s0508a1:471_12: So satte sugatimagge patiṭṭhāpetvā tato cuto ekanavutikappe vipassissa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā dhutadhamme
atk-s0508a1:471_14: Puna kassapassa bhagavato kālepi tassa sāsane tīhi sahāyehi saddhiṃ pabbajitvā vīsativassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:471_15: katvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇamahāsālassa putto
atk-s0508a1:471_19: Bhūmijo jeyyaseno abhirādhanoti tīhi sahāyehi saddhiṃ bhagavato santikaṃ gato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji.
atk-s0508a1:474_0: Atha sambhūto bhagavato santike kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nibaddhaṃ sītavane vasati.
atk-s0508a1:474_2: Tena ca samayena vessavaṇo mahārājā kenacideva karaṇīyena jambudīpe dakkhiṇadisābhāgaṃ uddissa ākāsena
atk-s0508a1:474_3: gacchanto theraṃ abbhokāse nisīditvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontaṃ disvā vimānato oruyha theraṃ vanditvā,
atk-s0508a1:474_6: ārakkhañcassa karothā”ti dve yakkhe āṇāpetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:474_7: Te therassa samīpe ṭhatvā manasikāraṃ paṭisaṃharitvā nisinnakāle ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:474_8: Taṃ sutvā thero “tumhe mama vacanena vessavaṇamahārājassa kathetha,
atk-s0508a1:474_9: bhagavatā attano sāsane ṭhitānaṃ satiārakkhā nāma ṭhapitā atthi,
atk-s0508a1:474_12: bhagavato ovāde ṭhitānaṃ edisāya ārakkhāya karaṇīyaṃ natthī”ti te vissajjetvā tāvadeva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vijjāttayaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:474_13: Tato vessavaṇo nivattamāno therassa samīpaṃ patvā mukhākārasallakkhaṇenevassa katakiccabhāvaṃ ñatvā sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0508a1:474_14: gantvā bhagavato ārocetvā satthu sammukhā theraṃ abhitthavanto –
atk-s0508a1:477_0: Imāya gāthāya therassa guṇe vaṇṇesi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:486_0: “Pacchime ca bhave asmiṃ, jātohaṃ brāhmaṇe kule;
atk-s0508a1:487_0: Saddhiṃ tīhi sahāyehi, pabbajiṃ satthu sāsane.
atk-s0508a1:489_0: Athāyasmā sambhūto bhagavantaṃ dassanāya gacchante bhikkhū disvā “āvuso,
atk-s0508a1:489_1: mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatha,
atk-s0508a1:489_2: evañca vadethā”ti vatvā dhammādhikaraṇaṃ attano satthu aviheṭhitabhāvaṃ pakāsento “yo sītavana”nti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a1:489_3: Te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā sambhūtattherassa sāsanaṃ sampavedentā, “āyasmā, bhante,
atk-s0508a1:489_5: evañca vadatī”ti vatvā taṃ gāthaṃ ārocesuṃ,
atk-s0508a1:490_1: Yaṃ pana te bhikkhū sambhūtattherena vuttaṃ “yo sītavana”nti gāthaṃ satthu nivedesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:490_2: Tattha sītavananti evaṃnāmakaṃ rājagahasamīpe mahantaṃ bheravasusānavanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:490_4: Etena bhagavatā anuññātaṃ pabbajitānurūpaṃ nivāsanaṭṭhānaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:490_5: Bhikkhūti saṃsārabhayassa ikkhanato bhinnakilesatāya ca bhikkhu.
atk-s0508a1:490_12: Vijitāvīti sāsane sammāpaṭipajjantena vijetabbaṃ kilesagaṇaṃ vijitvā ṭhito,
atk-s0508a1:490_22: so bhikkhu vivekasukhānupekkhāya eko sītavanaṃ upāgami,
atk-s0508a1:490_23: upāgato ca lolabhāvābhāvato santuṭṭho dhitimā kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvento tathādhigataṃ jhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:490_24: pādakaṃ katvā āraddhavipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā adhigatena aggamaggena samāhito vijitāvī ca hutvā katakiccatāya
atk-s0508a1:493_2: Ayaṃ kira ito ekatiṃse kappe anuppanne buddhe sumanassa nāma paccekabuddhassa pasannacitto phalāphalaṃ
atk-s0508a1:493_3: datvā sugatīsu eva saṃsaranto sikhissa sammāsambuddhassa kāle aruṇavatīnagare brāhmaṇakule nibbatto “sikhissa
atk-s0508a1:493_5: ojitā nāma dve satthavāhaputtā paṭhamāhāraṃ adaṃsū”ti sutvā attano sahāyakena saddhiṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a1:493_6: vanditvā svātanāya nimantetvā mahādānaṃ pavattetvā patthanaṃ akaṃsu –
atk-s0508a1:493_9: Te tattha tattha bhave puññakammaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsarantā kassapassa bhagavato kāle gopālakaseṭṭhissa puttā bhātaro hutvā nibbattā.
atk-s0508a1:493_11: Amhākaṃ pana bhagavato kāle pokkharavatīnagare satthavāhassa puttā bhātaro hutvā nibbattā.
atk-s0508a1:493_14: te pañcamattāni sakaṭasatāni bhaṇḍassa pūretvā vāṇijjāya gacchantā bhagavati paṭhamābhisambuddhe sattasattāhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:493_15: vimuttisukhadhammapaccavekkhaṇāhi vītināmetvā aṭṭhame sattāhe rājāyatanamūle viharante rājāyatanassa
atk-s0508a1:493_17: tesaṃ tasmiṃ samaye samepi bhūmibhāge akaddamodake sakaṭāni nappavattiṃsu, “kiṃ nu, kho,
atk-s0508a1:493_18: kāraṇa”nti ca cintentānaṃ porāṇasālohitā devatā rukkhaviṭapantare attānaṃ dassentī āha – “mādisā,
atk-s0508a1:493_19: ayaṃ bhagavā acirābhisambuddho sattasattāhaṃ anāhāro vimuttisukhāpaṭisaṃvedī idāni rājāyatanamūle nisinno,
atk-s0508a1:493_22: Taṃ sutvā te uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedentā,
atk-s0508a1:493_23: “āhārasampādanaṃ papañca”nti maññamānā manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca bhagavato datvā dvevācikasaraṇaṃ gantvā kesadhātuyo labhitvā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:493_25: Atha bhagavati bārāṇasiṃ gantvā dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā anupubbena rājagahe viharante taphussabhalliyā
atk-s0508a1:493_26: rājagahaṃ upagatā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:493_28: Tesu taphusso sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya upāsakova ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:496_0: “Ekatiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ tadā;
atk-s0508a1:499_0: Athekadivasaṃ māro bhalliyattherassa bhiṃsāpanatthaṃ bhayānakaṃ rūpaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0508a1:500_1: Tattha yopānudīti yo apānudi khipi pajahi viddhaṃsesi.
atk-s0508a1:500_2: Maccurājassāti maccu nāma maraṇaṃ khandhānaṃ bhedo,
atk-s0508a1:500_3: so eva ca sattānaṃ attano vase anuvattāpanato issaraṭṭhena rājāti maccurājā, tassa.
atk-s0508a1:500_5: sā hissa vasavattane aṅgabhāvato senā nāma,
atk-s0508a1:500_6: tena hesa mahatā nānāvidhena vipulena “mahāseno”ti vuccati. Yathāha –
atk-s0508a1:500_9: Atha vā guṇamāraṇaṭṭhena “maccū”ti idha devaputtamāro adhippeto,
atk-s0508a1:501_0: “Kāmā te paṭhamā senā, dutiyā arati vuccati;
atk-s0508a1:502_0: Tatiyā khuppipāsā te, catutthī taṇhā pavuccati.
atk-s0508a1:504_0: Sattamī vicikicchā te, māno makkho ca aṭṭhamī”ti. ;
atk-s0508a1:505_0: Naḷasetuṃva sudubbalaṃ mahoghoti sāravirahitato naḷasetusadisaṃ ativiya abalabhāvato suṭṭhu dubbalaṃ
atk-s0508a1:505_1: saṃkilesasenaṃ navalokuttaradhammānaṃ mahābalavabhāvato mahoghasadisena aggamaggena yo apānudi vijitāvī
atk-s0508a1:505_4: Taṃ sutvā māro “jānāti maṃ samaṇo”ti tatthevantaradhāyīti.
atk-s0508a1:508_2: Ayaṃ kira ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa bhagavato vasanaāvāsaṃ paṭijaggi.
atk-s0508a1:508_3: Ekadivasañca sindhuvārapupphasadisāni nigguṇṭhipupphāni gahetvā bhagavantaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0508a1:508_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ito pañcatiṃse kappe khattiyakule nibbattitvā mahāpatāpo nāma rājā ahosi cakkavattī.
atk-s0508a1:508_5: So dhammena samena rajjaṃ kārento satte saggamagge patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0508a1:508_6: Puna imasmiṃ kappe kassapassa bhagavato kāle mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi hutvā kapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ dānaṃ dento saṅghassa khīrabhattaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:508_7: Evaṃ tattha tattha dānamayaṃ puññasambhāraṃ karonto itarañca nibbānatthaṃ sambharanto devamanussesu saṃsaritvā
atk-s0508a1:508_8: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthinagare rañño pasenadissa amaccakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:508_10: So vayappatto nāmānugatehi pattabalajavādiguṇehi samannāgato saṅgāmasūro hutvā mātāpitūhi nibandhavasena
atk-s0508a1:508_11: kārite dārapariggahe ekaṃyeva puttaṃ labhitvā pubbahetunā codiyamāno kāmesu saṃsāre ca ādīnavaṃ disvā
atk-s0508a1:508_12: saṃvegajāto pabbajitvā ghaṭento vāyamanto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:516_0: Evaṃ pana arahattaṃ patvā phalasamāpattisukhena vītināmentaṃ theraṃ purāṇadutiyikā uppabbājetukāmā antarantarā
atk-s0508a1:516_1: nānānayehi palobhetuṃ parakkamantī ekadivasaṃ divāvihāraṭṭhānaṃ gantvā itthikuttādīni dassetuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0508a1:516_2: Athāyasmā vīro “maṃ palobhetukāmā sineruṃ makasapakkhavātena cāletukāmā viya yāva bālā vatāyaṃ itthī”ti
atk-s0508a1:516_3: tassā kiriyāya niratthakabhāvaṃ dīpento “yo duddamiyo”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:517_1: Tattha yo duddamiyotiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
atk-s0508a1:517_2: Idaṃ panettha yojanāmattaṃ yo pubbe adanta kilesatāya paccatthikehi vā saṅgamasīse dametuṃ jetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāyaduddamiyo,
atk-s0508a1:517_3: idāni pana uttamena damena danto catubbidhasammappamadhānavīriyasampattiyā vīro,
atk-s0508a1:517_4: vuttanayeneva santusito vitiṇṇakaṅkho vijitāvī apetalomahaṃso vīro vīranāmako anavasesato kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto,
atk-s0508a1:517_8: “mayhaṃ sāmike evaṃ paṭipanne ko mayhaṃ gharāvāsena attho”ti saṃvegajātā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitvā nacirasseva tevijjā ahosīti.
atk-s0508a1:520_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbatto heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva satthu santike
atk-s0508a1:520_3: dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ devatānaṃ piyamanāpabhāvena aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ
atk-s0508a1:520_4: patthetvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaranto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle manussaloke
atk-s0508a1:520_5: nibbattitvā bhagavati parinibbute satthu thūpassa pūjaṃ katvā saṅghe ca mahādānaṃ pavattetvā tato cuto
atk-s0508a1:520_6: devamanussesu eva saṃsaranto anuppanne buddhe cakkavattī rājā hutvā mahājanaṃ pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0508a1:520_8: So anuppanneyeva amhākaṃ bhagavati sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇagehe nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:520_12: Saṃsāre pana saṃvegabahulatāya paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā cūḷagandhāraṃ nāma vijjaṃ sādhetvā tāya
atk-s0508a1:520_13: vijjāya ākāsacārī paracittavidū ca hutvā rājagahe lābhaggayasaggappatto paṭivasati.
atk-s0508a1:521_0: Atha yadā amhākaṃ bhagavā abhisambuddho hutvā anukkamena rājagahaṃ upagato,
atk-s0508a1:521_1: tato paṭṭhāya buddhānubhāvena tassa sā vijjā na sampajjati,
atk-s0508a1:521_4: “sutaṃ kho pana metaṃ ācariyapācariyānaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ ‘yattha mahāgandhāravijjā dharati,
atk-s0508a1:521_6: samaṇassa pana gotamassa āgatakālato paṭṭhāya nāyaṃ mama vijjā sampajjati,
atk-s0508a1:521_8: yaṃnūnāhaṃ taṃ payirupāsitvā tassa santike taṃ vijjaṃ pariyāpuṇeyya”nti.
atk-s0508a1:521_15: Tassa bhagavā dhammaṃ kathetvā caritānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:521_16: So upanissayasampannatāya nacirasseva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:521_17: Yā pana purimajātiyaṃ tassovāde ṭhatvā sagge nibbattā devatā,
atk-s0508a1:521_18: taṃ kataññutaṃ nissāya sañjātabahumānā sāyaṃ pātaṃ theraṃ payirupāsitvā gacchanti.
atk-s0508a1:521_19: Tasmā thero devatānaṃ piyamanāpatāya aggataṃ patto.
atk-s0508a1:527_0: Sumedho nāma nāmena, anumodittha so tadā.
atk-s0508a1:534_0: “Na te bījaṃ pavappanti, napi nīyanti naṅgalā;
atk-s0508a1:538_0: “Na maṃ mittā amittā vā, hiṃsanti sabbapāṇino;
atk-s0508a1:547_0: Tathā devatāhi ativiya piyāyitabbabhāvato imaṃ theraṃ bhagavā devatānaṃ piyamanāpabhāvena aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi –
atk-s0508a1:547_3: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ devatānaṃ piyamanāpānaṃ yadidaṃ pilindavaccho”ti so ekadivasaṃ bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe
atk-s0508a1:547_4: nisinno attano guṇe paccavekkhitvā tesaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ vijjānimittaṃ bhagavato santike āgamanaṃ pasaṃsanto
atk-s0508a1:548_5: Nāpagatanti na apagataṃ hitābhivuddhito na apetaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:548_6: Nayidaṃ dumantitaṃ mamāti idaṃ mama duṭṭhu kathitaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:548_13: Yaṃ “bhagavato santike dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajissāmī”ti mama mantitaṃ gaditaṃ kathitaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:548_14: cittena vā vīmaṃsitaṃ idampi na dummantinti.
atk-s0508a1:548_20: Yaṃ seṭṭhaṃ tadupāgaminti yaṃ tattha seṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:548_24: Sammāsambuddhehi eva vā kusalādivasena khandhādivasena yathāsabhāvato saṃvibhattesu sabhāvadhammesu yaṃ tattha seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaraṃ,
atk-s0508a1:548_27: tasmā svāgataṃ mama na apagataṃ sumantitaṃ na dummantitanti yojanā.
atk-s0508a1:551_2: So kira vipassissa bhagavato kāle cakkavākayoniyaṃ nibbatto bhagavantaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:551_3: attano mukhatuṇḍakena sālapupphaṃ gahetvā pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:551_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ito sattarase kappe aṭṭhakkhattuṃ cakkavattī rājā ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:551_5: Imasmiṃ pana kappe kassapassa bhagavato sāsane osakkamāne kuṭumbiyakule nibbattitvā pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:551_6: katvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthinagare samiddhissa nāma brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0508a1:551_8: Tassa jātadivase tasmiṃ gehe sabbā rittakumbhiyo suvaṇṇamāsānaṃ puṇṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:551_10: So vayappatto brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṃ patvā vivāhakammaṃ katvā ekaṃ puttaṃ labhitvā upanissayasampannatāya
atk-s0508a1:551_11: gharāvāsaṃ jigucchanto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado
atk-s0508a1:551_12: pubbakiccasampanno catusaccakammaṭṭhāne yuttappayutto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:557_0: Tena cittappasādena, duggatiṃ so na gacchati.
atk-s0508a1:565_0: Athassa purāṇadutiyikā taṃ palobhetukāmā alaṅkatapaṭiyattā puttena saddhiṃ upagantvā piyālāpabhāvādikehi bhāvavivaraṇakammaṃ nāma kātuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0508a1:565_1: Thero tassā kāraṇaṃ disvā attano katthacipi alaggabhāvaṃ pakāsento “vihari apekkha”nti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:566_1: Tattha viharīti visesato hari apahari apanesi.
atk-s0508a1:566_7: saddo samuccayattho “apadā vā dvipadā vā”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0508a1:566_9: Vedagūti vedena gato maggañāṇena nibbānaṃ gato adhigato,
atk-s0508a1:566_13: Sabbesu dhammesu anūpalittoti sabbesu ārammaṇesu dhammesu taṇhādiṭṭhilepavasena na upalitto,
atk-s0508a1:566_21: yo sakalassa khandhādilokassa samapaññāsāya ākārehi udayabbayaṃ jānitvā vedagū yatatto katthaci anupalitto,
atk-s0508a1:566_22: so sabbattha apekkhaṃ vineyya santusito tādisānaṃ vippakārānaṃ na kiñci maññati,
atk-s0508a1:566_24: Atha sā itthī “ayaṃ samaṇo mayi putte ca nirapekkho,
atk-s0508a1:572_2: So kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle daliddakule nibbattitvā paresaṃ bhatiyā jīvikaṃ kappento bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:572_3: sāvakaṃ sujātaṃ nāma theraṃ paṃsukūlaṃ pariyesantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso upasaṅkamitvā vatthaṃ datvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandi.
atk-s0508a1:572_4: So tena puññakammena tettiṃsakkhattuṃ devarajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0508a1:572_7: Evaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato sāsane osakkamāne pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ katvā ekaṃ
atk-s0508a1:572_8: buddhantaraṃ devamanussagatīsu aparāparaṃ parivattanto amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle kosambiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:572_10: So vayappatto brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṃ gato buddhaguṇe sutvā pasannamānaso bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkami,
atk-s0508a1:572_12: So paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado katapubbakicco caritānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā bhāvento vihari.
atk-s0508a1:572_13: Tena ca samayena kosambikā bhikkhū bhaṇḍanajātā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:572_14: Tadā cūḷavacchatthero ubhayesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ laddhiṃ anādāya bhagavatā dinnovāde ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ brūhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:588_0: Atha cūḷavacchatthero arahattaṃ patvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kalahābhiratiyā sakatthavināsaṃ disvā dhammasaṃvegappatto,
atk-s0508a1:588_1: attano ca pattavisesaṃ paccavekkhitvā pītisomanassavasena “pāmojjabahulo”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:589_1: Tattha pāmojjabahuloti suparisuddhasīlatāya vippaṭisārābhāvato adhikusalesu dhammesu abhirativasena pamodabahulo.
atk-s0508a1:589_5: So hi sabbaññubuddhena sāmukkaṃsikāya desanāya pakāsitattā sātisayaṃ buddhappavedito nāma.
atk-s0508a1:589_6: Tassa pana adhigamūpāyabhāvato desanādhammopi idha labbhateva.
atk-s0508a1:589_8: Evarūpo hi bhikkhu santaṃ padaṃ santaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ upasamabhāvato saṅkhārūpasamaṃ paramasukhatāya
atk-s0508a1:589_10: Parisuddhasīlo hi bhikkhu vippaṭisārābhāvena pāmojjabahulo saddhamme yuttappayutto vimuttipariyosānā sabbasampattiyo pāpuṇāti. Yathāha –
atk-s0508a1:589_17: Tattha pana so pamodabahulo kiṃ vā karotīti āha “dhamme buddhappavedite”tiādi.
atk-s0508a1:589_19: sambhavato sampattiyo hatthagatā eva honti, yathāha –
atk-s0508a1:592_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pānīyadānamadāsi.
atk-s0508a1:592_3: Puna sikhissa bhagavato kāle upāsako hutvā vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ bahuṃ puññakammaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0508a1:592_4: so tehi puññakammehi tattha tattha sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe nāḷakagāme
atk-s0508a1:592_5: samiddhissa nāma brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:592_7: So vayappatto āyasmato sāriputtassa bhagavato sāvakabhāvaṃ sutvā “sopi nāma mahāpañño.
atk-s0508a1:592_9: so eva maññe imasmiṃ loke aggapuggalo”ti bhagavati saddhaṃ uppādetvā satthu santike pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:601_0: Evaṃ pana arahattaṃ patvā vimuttisukhaṃ anubhavanto sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvavibhāvanena sabrahmacārīnaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ “paññābalī”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:602_1: Tattha paññābalīti pārihāriyapaññāya vipassanāpaññāya ca vasena abhiṇhaso sātisayena paññābalena samannāgato.
atk-s0508a1:602_5: Jhānaratoti tato eva ārammaṇūpanijjhāne lakkhaṇūpanijjhāne ca rato satatābhiyutto.
atk-s0508a1:602_9: Yathā paccaye paribhuñjantassa paribhuñjanaṃ atthiyaṃ hoti,
atk-s0508a1:602_11: Sāmiparibhogena hi taṃ atthiyaṃ hoti dāyajjaparibhogena vā,
atk-s0508a1:602_12: na aññathā bhojananti ca nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:602_19: Tasmā anupādāparinibbānatthaṃ bhojanapaccaye bhuñjamāno tato eva kaṅkhetha kālaṃ attano anupādāparinibbānakālaṃ āgameyya.
atk-s0508a1:602_21: Bāhirakassa pana kāmesu vītarāgassa idaṃ natthīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:605_2: So kira atthadassino bhagavato kāle kacchapayoniyaṃ nibbatto vinatāya nāma nadiyā vasati.
atk-s0508a1:605_4: So kira ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ nadiyā tīre ṭhitaṃ disvā,
atk-s0508a1:605_5: “pāraṃ gantukāmo maññe bhagavā”ti attano piṭṭhiyaṃ āropetvā netukāmo pādamūle nipajji.
atk-s0508a1:605_6: Bhagavā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā taṃ anukampanto āruhi.
atk-s0508a1:605_7: So pītisomanassajāto sotaṃ chindanto jiyāya vegena khittasaro viya tāvadeva paratīraṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0508a1:605_8: Bhagavā tassa puññassa phalaṃ etarahi nibbattanakasampattiñca byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:605_9: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto anekasatakkhattuṃ tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññavāsīyeva ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:605_10: Puna kassapabuddhakāle kapotayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā araññe viharantaṃ mettāvihāriṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā cittaṃ pasādesi.
atk-s0508a1:606_0: Tato pana cuto bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto saṃvegajāto pabbajitvā vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ bahuṃ puññakammaṃ upacini.
atk-s0508a1:606_1: Evaṃ tattha tattha devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthunagare vacchagottassa nāma brāhmaṇassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0508a1:606_2: Tassa mātā paripakkagabbhā araññaṃ dassanatthāya sañjātadohaḷā araññaṃ pavisitvā vicarati,
atk-s0508a1:606_9: Aparabhāge mahāsatte mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā mahāpadhānaṃ padahante,
atk-s0508a1:606_10: “ahampi siddhatthakumārena saha araññe viharissāmī”ti nikkhamitvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavante
atk-s0508a1:606_11: vasanto abhisambuddhabhāvaṃ sutvā bhagavato santikaṃ upagantvā pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe
atk-s0508a1:606_12: vasamāno nacirasseva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:616_0: Sukhaṃ me tādisaṃ natthi, phuṭṭhe pādatale yathā.
atk-s0508a1:620_0: Ayañca kacchapo rājā, tāresi mama paññavā.
atk-s0508a1:634_0: Evaṃ pana arahattaṃ patvā bhagavati kapilavatthusmiṃ viharante tattha gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā bhikkhūhi samāgato paṭisanthāravasena “kiṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0508a1:634_2: araññe pabbatā”ti attanā vuṭṭhapabbate vaṇṇento “nīlabbhavaṇṇā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:635_4: Sucindharāti sucisuddhabhūmibhāgatāya suddhacittānaṃ vā ariyānaṃ nivāsanaṭṭhānatāya sucindharā.
atk-s0508a1:635_8: Indagopakasañchannāti indagopakanāmakehi pavāḷavaṇṇehi rattakimīhi sañchāditā pāvussakālavasena evamāha.
atk-s0508a1:635_16: Evaṃ thero attano cirakālaparibhāvitaṃ araññābhiratiṃ pavedento tividhaṃ vivekābhiratimeva dīpeti.
atk-s0508a1:638_2: So kira ito ekatiṃse kappe vessabhussa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto ekadivasaṃ kenacideva karaṇīyena
atk-s0508a1:638_3: araññaṃ paviṭṭho tattha pabbatantare nisinnaṃ vessabhuṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannacitto upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a1:638_5: Puna tattha manoharāni kāsumārikaphalāni disvā tāni gahetvā bhagavato upanesi,
atk-s0508a1:638_7: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato sāsane mātule pabbajante tena saddhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:638_8: pabbajitvā bahuṃ vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vanavacchattherassa bhāgineyyo
atk-s0508a1:638_11: Tassa mātā attano jeṭṭhabhātike vanavacche sāsane pabbajitvā pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā araññe viharante taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā puttaṃ āha –
atk-s0508a1:638_15: So mātu ekavacaneneva ca pubbe katādhikāratāya ca mātulattherassa santikaṃ gantvā pabbajitvā taṃ upaṭṭhahanto araññe vasati.
