atk-s0508a1:2086_0: Sabbametaṃ parikkhīṇaṃ, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2087_0: Tattha yaṃ mayā pakataṃ kammanti yaṃ kammaṃ tīhi kammadvārehi,
atk-s0508a1:2087_3: aṭṭhahi ca saṃvaradvārehi pāpādivasena dānādivasena cāti anekehi pakārehi anādimati saṃsāre yaṃ mayā kataṃ upacitaṃ abhinibbattitaṃ vipākakammaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2087_4: Appaṃ vā yadi vā bahunti tañca vatthucetanāpayogakilesādīnaṃ dubbalabhāvena appaṃ vā,
atk-s0508a1:2087_5: tesaṃ balavabhāvena abhiṇhapavattiyā ca bahuṃ vā.
atk-s0508a1:2087_6: Sabbametaṃ parikkhīṇanti sabbameva cetaṃ kammaṃ kammakkhayakarassa aggamaggassa adhigatattā parikkhayaṃ gataṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2087_7: kilesavaṭṭappahānena hi kammavaṭṭaṃ pahīnameva hoti vipākavaṭṭassa anuppādanato.
atk-s0508a1:2092_0: Yaṃ mayā pakataṃ pāpanti āyasmato samitiguttattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:2092_2: Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:2092_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto bhagavantaṃ passitvā pasannacitto jātisumanapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2092_4: So tena puññakammena yattha yattha bhave nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2092_5: tattha tattha kularūpaparivārasampadāya aññe satte abhibhavitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2092_6: Ekasmiṃ pana attabhāve aññataraṃ paccekabuddhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā “ayaṃ muṇḍako kuṭṭhī maññe,
atk-s0508a1:2092_8: So tena kammena bahuṃ kālaṃ niraye paccitvā kassapassa bhagavato kāle manussaloke nibbatto paribbājakapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2092_9: upagato ekaṃ sīlācārasampannaṃ upāsakaṃ disvā dosantaro hutvā,
atk-s0508a1:2092_11: nhānatitthe ca manussehi ṭhapitāni nhānacuṇṇāni dūsesi.
atk-s0508a1:2092_12: So tena kammena puna niraye nibbattitvā bahūni vassāni dukkhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2092_15: So vayappatto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā suvisuddhasīlo hutvā viharati.
atk-s0508a1:2092_17: tena tassa sarīrāvayavā yebhuyyena chinnabhinnā hutvā paggharanti.
atk-s0508a1:2092_19: Athekadivasaṃ dhammasenāpati gilānapucchaṃ gantvā tattha tattha gilāne bhikkhū pucchanto taṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā “āvuso,
atk-s0508a1:2092_22: Khandhesu pana asantesuyeva natthi dukkha”nti vedanānupassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2092_23: So therassa ovāde ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā chaḷabhiññā sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2104_0: Na tā sakkonti kopetuṃ, jātipūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2110_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā pahīnakilesapaccavekkhaṇena etarahi anubhuyyamānarogavasena purimajātīsu attanā
atk-s0508a1:2110_1: kataṃ pāpakammaṃ anussaritvā tassa idāni sabbaso pahīnabhāvaṃ vibhāvento –
atk-s0508a1:2112_0: “Yaṃ mayā pakataṃ pāpaṃ, pubbe aññāsu jātisu;
atk-s0508a1:2113_0: Idheva taṃ vedanīyaṃ, vatthu aññaṃ na vijjatī”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2114_6: yadipi mayā imasmiṃ attabhāve na tādisaṃ pāpaṃ kataṃ atthi,
atk-s0508a1:2114_8: Yaṃ pana ito aññāsu jātīsu kataṃ atthi,
atk-s0508a1:2114_10: tañhi idheva imasmiṃyeva attabhāve vedayitabbaṃ anubhavitabbaṃ phalaṃ, kasmā?
atk-s0508a1:2114_11: Vatthu aññaṃ na vijjatīti tassa kammassa vipaccanokāso añño khandhappabandho natthi,
atk-s0508a1:2114_12: ime pana khandhā sabbaso upādānānaṃ pahīnattā anupādāno viya jātavedo carimakacittanirodhena appaṭisandhikā nirujjhantīti aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2117_0: Yena yena subhikkhānīti āyasmato kassapattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:2117_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā tīsu vedesu aññesu ca brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṃ gato,
atk-s0508a1:2117_3: so ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso sumanapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2117_4: Karonto ca satthu samantato upari ca pupphamuṭṭhiyo khipi.
atk-s0508a1:2117_6: So taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā bhiyyosomattāya pasannamānaso ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:2117_7: Aparāparaṃ puññāni karonto kappasatasahassaṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2117_12: So ekadivasaṃ jetavanaṃ gato bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā hetusampannatāya tasmiṃyeva āsane sotāpanno
atk-s0508a1:2117_13: hutvā mātu santikaṃ gantvā anujānāpetvā pabbajito satthari vuṭṭhavasse pavāretvā janapadacārikaṃ pakkante
atk-s0508a1:2117_14: sayampi satthārā saddhiṃ gantukāmo āpucchituṃ mātu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2120_0: Tena puttaka gacchassu, mā sokāpahato bhavā”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2121_12: Māti paṭisedhatthe nipāto sokāpahatoti vuttaguṇarahitāni raṭṭhāni gantvā dubbhikkhabhayādijanitena sokena upahato mā bhava māhosīti attho.
atk-s0508a1:2121_15: handa mayaṃ sabbaso accantameva sokarahitaṃ ṭhānaṃ pattuṃ yutta”nti ussāhajāto vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2139_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā “idameva mātu vacanaṃ arahattappattiyā aṅkusaṃ jāta”nti tameva gāthaṃ paccudāhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2142_2: So kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro ito aṭṭhārasakappasatamatthake atthadassissa bhagavato kāle candabhāgāya
atk-s0508a1:2142_3: nadiyā tīre kinnarayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā pupphabhakkho pupphanivasano hutvā viharanto ākāsena gacchantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2142_4: atthadassiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannacitto pūjetukāmo añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2142_5: Bhagavā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā ākāsato oruyha aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle pallaṅkena nisīdi.
atk-s0508a1:2142_6: Kinnaro candanasāraṃ ghaṃsitvā candanagandhena pupphehi ca pūjaṃ katvā vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:2142_7: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde mallarājakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2142_9: So bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0508a1:2142_10: Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā dhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0508a1:2142_11: So dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe viharati.
atk-s0508a1:2145_0: Bhāvehi kusalaṃ dhammaṃ, jaha sīghaṃ samussaya”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:2146_0: Gāthāya ovadi. So gāthāvasāne vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2164_0: Yā pana bhagavatā ovādavasena vuttā “sīhappamatto”ti gāthā,
atk-s0508a1:2164_2: Appamatto viharāti satiyā avippavāsena pamādavirahito sabbiriyāpathesu satisampajaññayutto hutvā viharāhi.
atk-s0508a1:2164_3: Idāni taṃ appamādavihāraṃ saha phalena saṅkhepato dassetuṃ “rattindiva”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2164_5: rattibhāgaṃ divasabhāgañca “caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetī”ti vuttanayena
atk-s0508a1:2164_6: catusammappadhānavasena atandito akusīto āraddhavīriyo kusalaṃ samathavipassanādhammañca lokuttaradhammañca
atk-s0508a1:2164_8: evaṃ bhāvetvā ca jaha sīghaṃ samussayanti tava samussayaṃ attabhāvaṃ paṭhamaṃ tāva tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena sīghaṃ nacirasseva pajaha,
atk-s0508a1:2164_9: evaṃbhūto ca pacchā carimakacittanirodhena anavasesato ca pajahissatīti.
atk-s0508a1:2164_10: Arahattaṃ pana patvā thero aññaṃ byākaronto tameva gāthaṃ paccudāhāsīti.
atk-s0508a1:2167_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle sunando nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā anekasate brāhmaṇe mante vācento vājapeyyaṃ nāma yaññaṃ yaji,
atk-s0508a1:2167_3: bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ anukampanto yaññaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ākāse caṅkami.
atk-s0508a1:2167_4: Brāhmaṇo satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso sissehi pupphāni āharāpetvā ākāse khipitvā pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2167_5: Buddhānubhāvena taṃ ṭhānaṃ sakalañca nagaraṃ pupphapaṭavitānikaṃ viya chāditaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:2167_7: Sunandabrāhmaṇo tena kusalamūlena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2167_9: So viññutaṃ patto “ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sukhasīlā sukhasamācārā subhojanāni bhuñjitvā nivātesu senāsanesu viharanti,
atk-s0508a1:2167_10: imesu pabbajitvā sukhena viharituṃ sakkā”ti sukhābhilāsāya pabbajitvāva satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0508a1:2167_11: katipāhameva manasikaritvā taṃ chaḍḍetvā yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ bhuñjitvā divasabhāgaṃ saṅgaṇikārāmo
atk-s0508a1:2167_14: Satthā tassa hetuparipākaṃ oloketvā ovādaṃ dento –
atk-s0508a1:2170_0: Kudāssu nāma dummedho, dukkhassantaṃ karissatī”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2171_2: “rattiyā paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetī”tiādinā vuttaṃ jāgariyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2171_3: ananuyuñjitvā kevalaṃ rattiyā tīsupi yāmesu niddaṃ okkamitvāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:2171_7: tasmiṃ rato abhirato tattha avigatacchando “saṅgaṇike rato”ti vutto “saṅgaṇikārato”tipi pāḷi.
atk-s0508a1:2172_0: Evaṃ pana satthārā gāthāya kathitāya thero saṃvegajāto vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2188_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā thero aññaṃ byākaronto tameva gāthaṃ paccudāhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2191_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto ito ekattiṃse
atk-s0508a1:2191_3: kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū hutvā araññāyatane
atk-s0508a1:2191_4: assame vasanto tīṇi brāhmaṇasahassāni mante vācesi.
atk-s0508a1:2191_5: Athekadivasaṃ tassa satthāraṃ disvā lakkhaṇāni upadhāretvā lakkhaṇamante parivattentassa,
atk-s0508a1:2191_6: “īdisehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato anantajino anantañāṇo buddho bhavissatī”ti buddhañāṇaṃ ārabbha uḷāro pasādo uppajji.
atk-s0508a1:2191_7: So tena cittappasādena devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde nālakagāme
atk-s0508a1:2191_10: So dhammasenāpatissa gihisahāyo therassa santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā dassanabhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhito pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2205_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā bhikkhūnaṃ dhammadesanāpadesena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:2208_0: Jhāyaṃ nipako patissato, adhigaccheyya sukhaṃ nirāmisa”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:2210_0: Tattha cittanimittassa kovidoti bhāvanācittassa nimittaggahaṇe kusalo,
atk-s0508a1:2210_3: imasmiṃ ajjhupekkhitabba”nti evaṃ paggahaṇādiyogyassa cittanimittassa gahaṇe cheko.
atk-s0508a1:2210_4: Pavivekarasaṃ vijāniyāti kāyavivekasaṃvaḍḍhitassa cittavivekassa rasaṃ sañjānitvā,
atk-s0508a1:2210_7: Jhāyanti paṭhamaṃ ārammaṇūpanijjhānena pacchā lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena ca jhāyanto.
atk-s0508a1:2210_10: Adhigaccheyya sukhaṃ nirāmisanti evaṃ samathanimittādikosallena labbhe cittavivekasukhe patiṭṭhāya sato
atk-s0508a1:2210_11: sampajāno hutvā vipassanājhāneneva jhāyanto kāmāmisavaṭṭāmisehi asammissatāya nirāmisaṃ nibbānasukhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2213_0: Ito bahiddhā puthuaññavādinanti āyasmato nāgitattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:2213_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle nārado nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā ekadivasaṃ māḷake nisinno bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2213_3: bhikkhusaṅghena purakkhataṃ gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso tīhi gāthāhi abhitthavi.
atk-s0508a1:2213_4: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:2213_7: So bhagavati kapilavatthusmiṃ viharante madhupiṇḍikasuttaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2221_0: Vikappetuṃ na sakkonti, ko disvā nappasīdati.
atk-s0508a1:2229_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthu avitathadesanataṃ dhammassa ca niyyānikataṃ nissāya sañjātapītisomanasso pītivegappavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udānento –
atk-s0508a1:2231_0: “Ito bahiddhā puthuaññavādinaṃ, maggo na nibbānagamo yathā ayaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:2232_0: Itissu saṅghaṃ bhagavānusāsati, satthā sayaṃ pāṇitaleva dassaya”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:2234_0: Tattha ito bahiddhāti imasmā buddhasāsanā bāhirake samaye,
atk-s0508a1:2234_3: Maggo na nibbānagamo yathā ayanti yathā ayaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo ekaṃsena nibbānaṃ gacchatīti nibbānagamo,
atk-s0508a1:2234_5: evaṃ nibbānagamo maggo titthiyasamaye natthi asammāsambuddhappaveditattā aññatitthiyavādassa.
atk-s0508a1:2236_8: Vitthāro pana paramatthadīpaniyaṃ itivuttakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbo.
atk-s0508a1:2236_12: “sīlādikkhandhattayasaṅgaho sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena aṭṭhaṅgiko nibbānagāmī ariyamaggo yathā mama sāsane atthi,
atk-s0508a1:2236_13: evaṃ bāhirakasamaye maggo nāma natthī”ti sīhanādaṃ nadanto amhākaṃ satthā bhagavā sayameva sayambhūñāṇena ñātaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2236_14: sayameva vā mahākaruṇāsañcodito hutvā attano desanāvilāsasampattiyā hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya dassento
atk-s0508a1:2239_0: Khandhā diṭṭhā yathābhūtanti āyasmato paviṭṭhattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:2239_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ karonto atthadassissa
atk-s0508a1:2239_3: bhagavato kāle kesavo nāma tāpaso hutvā ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:2239_4: abhivādetvā añjaliṃ paggayha padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:2239_5: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:2239_6: magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule uppajjitvā anukkamena viññutaṃ patto nekkhammaninnajjhāsayatāya paribbājakapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2239_7: pabbajitvā tattha sikkhitabbaṃ sikkhitvā vicaranto upatissakolitānaṃ buddhasāsane pabbajitabhāvaṃ sutvā
atk-s0508a1:2239_9: tadeva maññe seyyo”ti satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji.
atk-s0508a1:2239_11: So vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2240_0: “Nārado iti me nāmaṃ, kesavo iti maṃ vidū;
atk-s0508a1:2243_0: Assāsayanto satte so, dhammaṃ deseti cakkhumā.
atk-s0508a1:2252_0: Vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2253_1: te hi vipassanupalakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca ñātapariññādīhi parijānanavasena vipassitabbā.
atk-s0508a1:2253_2: Diṭṭhā yathābhūtanti vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya “idaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā aviparītato diṭṭhā.
atk-s0508a1:2253_3: Bhavā sabbe padālitāti kāmabhavādayo sabbe kammabhavā upapattibhavā ca maggañāṇasatthena bhinnā viddhaṃsitā.
atk-s0508a1:2253_4: Kilesapadālaneneva hi kammopapattibhavā padālitā nāma honti.
atk-s0508a1:2256_0: Asakkhiṃ vata attānanti āyasmato ajjunattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:2256_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0508a1:2256_3: bhagavato kāle sīhayoniyaṃ nibbatto ekadivasaṃ araññe aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ satthāraṃ disvā
atk-s0508a1:2256_4: “ayaṃ kho imasmiṃ kāle sabbaseṭṭho purisasīho”ti pasannamānaso supupphitasālasākhaṃ bhañjitvā satthāraṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0508a1:2256_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ seṭṭhikule nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:2256_7: So viññutaṃ patto nigaṇṭhehi kataparicayo hutvā “evāhaṃ amataṃ adhigamissāmī”ti vivaṭṭajjhāsayatāya daharakāleyeva
atk-s0508a1:2256_8: nigaṇṭhesu pabbajitvā tattha sāraṃ alabhanto satthu yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:2268_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā anuttarasukhādhigamasambhūtena pītivegena udānaṃ udānento –
atk-s0508a1:2271_0: Vuyhamāno mahogheva, saccāni paṭivijjhaha”nti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2273_2: katamaṃ nu kho dukkarataraṃ vā durabhisambhavataraṃ vā,
atk-s0508a1:2273_3: yaṃ sattadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭivijjheyyā”tiādi ?
atk-s0508a1:2274_1: Yo hi paro na hoti so attāti.
atk-s0508a1:2274_8: yathā nāma gambhīravitthate appatiṭṭhe mahati udakoghe vegasā vuyhamāno puriso kenaci atthakāmena upanītaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2274_9: phiyārittasampannaṃ daḷhanāvaṃ labhitvā sukheneva tato attānaṃ uddharituṃ sakkuṇeyya pāraṃ pāpuṇeyya,
atk-s0508a1:2274_10: evamevāhaṃ saṃsāramahoghe kilesābhisaṅkhāravegena vuyhamāno satthārā upanītaṃ samathavipassanupetaṃ ariyamagganāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2274_11: labhitvā tato attānaṃ uddharituṃ nibbānathalaṃ pattuṃ aho asakkhinti.
atk-s0508a1:2274_14: Yasmā ahaṃ dukkhādīni cattāri ariyasaccāni pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhiṃ ariyamaggañāṇena aññāsiṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2274_15: tasmā asakkhiṃ vata attānaṃ uddhātuṃ udakā thalanti yojanā.
atk-s0508a1:2277_2: Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:2277_3: kāle pārāvatayoniyaṃ nibbatto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso piyālaphalaṃ upanesi.
atk-s0508a1:2277_5: So tena ativiya pasannacitto hutvā kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā cittaṃ pasādeti.
atk-s0508a1:2277_6: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:2277_7: aññatarassa maṇḍalikarañño putto hutvā nibbatto taruṇakāleyeva rajje patiṭṭhito rajjasukhamanubhavanto
atk-s0508a1:2277_10: So dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho saṃvegajāto rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2281_0: Deyyadhammo ca me natthi, dvipadindassa tādino.
atk-s0508a1:2286_0: “Ekattiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ ahaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:2291_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā pahīnakilesapaccavekkhaṇavasena uppannasomanasso udānaṃ udānento –
atk-s0508a1:2294_0: Mutto oghā ca ganthā ca, sabbe mānā visaṃhatā”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2295_7: puttadārādivisayo bahalo chandarāgo vuttanayena sammakkhanato duruttaraṇato ca.
atk-s0508a1:2295_8: Te mayā anāgāmimaggena sabbaso atikkantāti āha “uttiṇṇā paṅkapalipā”ti.
atk-s0508a1:2295_12: Idha pana agāhaduravaggāhaduruttaraṇaṭṭhena pātālā viyāti pātālā, diṭṭhiyo.
atk-s0508a1:2295_13: Te ca mayā paṭhamamaggādhigameneva sabbathā vajjitā samucchinnāti āha “pātālā parivajjitā”ti mutto oghā
atk-s0508a1:2295_14: ca ganthā cāti kāmoghādioghato abhijjhākāyaganthādiganthato ca tena tena maggena mutto parimutto,
atk-s0508a1:2295_16: Sabbe mānā visaṃhatāti navavidhāpi mānā aggamaggādhigamena visesato saṅghātaṃ vināsaṃ āpāditā samucchinnā “mānavidhā hatā”ti keci paṭhanti,
atk-s0508a1:2295_19: tesaṃ pana mānavisassa dukkhassa phalato mānavisāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0508a1:2298_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro atthadassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari
atk-s0508a1:2298_3: parinibbute tassa thūpe pupphehi chattātichattaṃ katvā pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2298_4: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:2298_5: rājagahe aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2298_7: So anukkamena viññutaṃ patto buddhānubhāvaṃ sutvā upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gato satthāraṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ disvā pasannamānaso ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0508a1:2298_8: Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā tathā dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0508a1:2298_9: yathā saddhaṃ paṭilabhi saṃsāre ca saṃvegaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2298_10: So paṭiladdhasaddho saṃvegajāto pabbajitvā ñāṇassa aparipakkattā katipayakālaṃ alasabahulī vihāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2298_11: Puna satthārā dhammadesanāya samuttejito vipassanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā tattha yuttappayutto viharanto nacireneva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2308_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti.
atk-s0508a1:2309_1: uttarimanussadhammo adhigato”ti puṭṭho sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ attano ca dhammānudhammappaṭipattiṃ tesaṃ pavedento aññābyākaraṇavasena –
atk-s0508a1:2312_0: Vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2313_0: Tattha pañcakkhandhā pariññātāti mayā ime pañcupādānakkhandhā “idaṃ dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2313_2: na tato bhiyyo”ti tīhi pariññāhi paricchinditvā ñātā viditā paṭividdhā.
atk-s0508a1:2313_3: Tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakāti tathā pariññātattāyeva mūlabhūtassa samudayassa sabbaso pahīnattā te idāni yāva carimakacittanirodho tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā,
atk-s0508a1:2318_0: Na tathā mataṃ satarasanti āyasmato paripuṇṇakattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:2318_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro dhammadassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari
atk-s0508a1:2318_3: parinibbute satthu cetiye pupphādīhi uḷāraṃ pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2318_4: So tena puññakammena devesu nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:2318_5: kapilavatthusmiṃ sakyarājakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto paripuṇṇavibhavatāya paripuṇṇakoti paññāyittha.
atk-s0508a1:2318_6: So vibhavasampannatāya sabbakālaṃ satarasaṃ nāma āhāraṃ paribhuñjanto satthu missakāhāraparibhogaṃ sutvā
atk-s0508a1:2318_7: “tāva sukhumālopi bhagavā nibbānasukhaṃ apekkhitvā yathā tathā yāpeti,
atk-s0508a1:2318_8: kasmā mayaṃ āhāragiddhā hutvā āhārasuddhikā bhavissāma,
atk-s0508a1:2318_9: nibbānasukhameva pana amhehi pariyesitabba”nti saṃsāre jātasaṃvego gharāvāsaṃ pahāya satthu santike pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:2318_10: bhagavatā kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhāne niyojito tattha patiṭṭhāya paṭiladdhajhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a1:2318_11: kammaṃ karonto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2323_0: “Aho buddho aho dhammo, aho no satthu sampadā;
atk-s0508a1:2328_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā dhamme gāravabahumānena pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udānento “na tathā mataṃ satarasa”nti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2329_2: sudhannaṃ yaṃ mayajja paribhuttanti tathāti tena pakārena.
atk-s0508a1:2329_4: Satarasanti satarasabhojanaṃ “satarasabhojanaṃ nāma satapākasappiādīhi abhisaṅkhataṃ bhojana”nti vadanti.
atk-s0508a1:2329_5: Atha vā anekattho satasaddo “sataso sahassaso”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0508a1:2329_9: Sudhā eva annaṃ sudhābhojanaṃ devānaṃ āhāro.
atk-s0508a1:2329_10: Yaṃ mayajja paribhuttanti yaṃ mayā ajja anubhuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2329_11: “Yaṃ mayā paribhutta”nti ca idaṃ “satarasaṃ sudhanna”nti etthāpi yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2329_13: yaṃ mayā ajja etarahi nirodhasamāpattisamāpajjanavasena phalasamāpattisamāpajjanavasena ca accantameva
atk-s0508a1:2329_15: taṃ yathā mataṃ abhimataṃ sambhāvitaṃ tathā rājakāle mayā paribhuttaṃ satarasabhojanaṃ devattabhāve paribhuttaṃ sudhannañca na mataṃ nābhimataṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0508a1:2329_17: taṃ pana puthujjanasevitaṃ sāmisaṃ kilesānaṃ vatthubhūtaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2329_18: taṃ imassa saṅkhampi kalampi kalabhāgampi na upetīti.
atk-s0508a1:2329_19: Idāni “yaṃ mayajja paribhutta”nti vuttadhammaṃ desento aparimitadassinā gotamena,
atk-s0508a1:2329_22: aparimitaṃ aparicchinnaṃ uppādavayābhāvato santaṃ asaṅkhatadhātuṃ sayambhūñāṇena passī,
atk-s0508a1:2329_23: aparimitassa anantāparimeyyassa ñeyyassa dassāvīti tena aparimitadassinā gotamagottena sammāsambuddhena
atk-s0508a1:2329_24: “khayaṃ virāgaṃ amataṃ paṇīta”nti ca “madanimmadano pipāsavinayo” “sabbasaṅkhārasamatho”ti ca ādinā suṭṭhu
atk-s0508a1:2332_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro piyadassissa bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2332_3: patto satthari parinibbute tassa thūpassa ratanakhacitaṃ vedikaṃ kāretvā tattha uḷāraṃ vedikāmahaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0508a1:2332_4: So tena puññakammena anekasate attabhāve maṇiobhāsena vicari.
atk-s0508a1:2332_5: Evaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2332_7: So vayappatto brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṃ gato tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññāyatane jhānalābhī hutvā
atk-s0508a1:2332_8: viharanto buddhuppādaṃ sutvā uppannappasādo satthu santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0508a1:2332_10: So dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2336_0: Vedikāya mahaṃ katvā, tattha kālaṅkato ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2342_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā aññaṃ byākaronto “yassāsavā parikkhīṇā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2343_1: Tattha yassāsavā parikkhīṇāti yassa uttamapuggalassa kāmāsavādayo cattāro āsavā sabbaso khīṇā ariyamaggena khepitā.
atk-s0508a1:2343_2: Āhāre ca anissitoti yo ca āhāre taṇhādiṭṭhinissayehi anissito agadhito anajjhāpanno,
atk-s0508a1:2343_15: Phalasamāpattivasena taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā viharantassa ayampi tividho vimokkho yassa gocaro,
atk-s0508a1:2343_17: padaṃ tassa durannayanti yathā ākāse gacchantānaṃ sakuṇānaṃ “imasmiṃ ṭhāne pādehi akkamitvā gatā,
atk-s0508a1:2343_21: evameva evarūpassa bhikkhuno “nirayapadādīsu iminā nāma padena gato”ti ñāpetuñca na sakkāti.
atk-s0508a1:2346_0: Dukkhā kāmā erakāti āyasmato erakattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:2346_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a1:2346_3: kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso satthu kiñci dātabbayuttakaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2346_4: alabhanto “handāhaṃ kāyasāraṃ puññaṃ karissāmī”ti satthu gamanamaggaṃ sodhetvā samaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2346_6: So tattha bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha pasannacitto yāva dassanupacārasamatikkamā
atk-s0508a1:2346_8: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:2346_9: sāvatthiyaṃ sambhāvanīyassa kuṭumbiyassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2346_10: erakotissa nāmaṃ ahosi abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko itikattabbatāsu paramena veyyattiyena samannāgato.
atk-s0508a1:2346_11: Tassa mātāpitaro kulena rūpena ācārena vayena kosallena ca anucchavikaṃ dārikaṃ ānetvā vivāhakammaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:2346_12: So tāya saddhiṃ saṃvāsena gehe vasanto pacchimabhavikattā kenacideva saṃvegavatthunā saṃsāre saṃviggamānaso
atk-s0508a1:2346_13: satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji,
atk-s0508a1:2346_15: So kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā katipayadivasātikkamena ukkaṇṭhābhibhūto vihāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2346_16: Atha satthā tassa cittappavattiṃ ñatvā ovādavasena “dukkhā kāmā erakā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2346_18: yohaṃ evarūpassa satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā taṃ vissajjento micchāvitakkabahulo vihāsi”nti saṃvegajāto
atk-s0508a1:2358_0: “Dukkhā kāmā eraka, na sukhā kāmā eraka;
atk-s0508a1:2359_0: Yo kāme kāmayati, dukkhaṃ so kāmayati eraka;
atk-s0508a1:2360_0: Yo kāme na kāmayati, dukkhaṃ so na kāmayati erakā”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:2362_0: Tattha dukkhā kāmāti ime vatthukāmakilesakāmā dukkhavatthutāya vipariṇāmadukkhasaṃsāradukkhasabhāvato ca,
atk-s0508a1:2362_5: Erakāti paṭhamaṃ tāva bhagavā taṃ ālapati,
atk-s0508a1:2362_6: pacchā pana thero attānaṃ nāmena kathesi.
atk-s0508a1:2362_7: Na sukhā kāmāti kāmā nāmete jānantassa sukhā na honti,
atk-s0508a1:2362_12: dukkhaṃ so kāmayatīti yo satto kilesakāmena vatthukāme kāmayati,
atk-s0508a1:2362_14: āyatiṃ apāyadukkhahetutāya ca vaṭṭadukkhahetutāya ca dukkhaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2362_16: Iti so dukkhasabhāvaṃ dukkhanimittaṃ dukkhavatthuñca kāmayatīti vutto.
atk-s0508a1:2365_0: Namo hi tassa bhagavatoti āyasmato mettajittherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:2365_2: So kira anomadassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto sāsane abhippasanno hutvā bodhirukkhassa
atk-s0508a1:2365_5: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:2365_6: magadharaṭṭhe aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2365_8: So vayappatto kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññe viharanto buddhuppādaṃ sutvā pubbahetunā
atk-s0508a1:2365_9: codiyamāno satthu santikaṃ gantvā pavattinivattiyo ārabbha pañhaṃ pucchitvā satthārā pañhe vissajjite
atk-s0508a1:2365_10: paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2369_0: Bhikkhusaṅghe ṭhito satthā, imā gāthā abhāsatha.
atk-s0508a1:2380_0: Tenāyaṃ aggappattena, aggadhammo sudesito”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2381_2: Tassāti yo so bhagavā samattiṃsapāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
atk-s0508a1:2381_4: Anaññasādhāraṇāya puññasampattiyā ca sambhāvito uttamāya rūpakāyasiriyā dhammakāyasiriyā ca samannāgatattā sirīmā,
atk-s0508a1:2381_5: tassa bhagavato sakyaputtassa sirīmato namo atthu,
atk-s0508a1:2381_8: Ayanti tassa dhammassa attano paccakkhatāya vadati.
atk-s0508a1:2381_10: sabbehi vā guṇehi aggabhāvaṃ seṭṭhabhāvaṃ pattena.
atk-s0508a1:2381_11: Aggadhammoti aggo uttamo navavidhalokuttaro dhammo suṭṭhu aviparītaṃ desito paveditoti.
atk-s0508a1:2384_2: Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:2384_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto bhagavati parinibbute thūpamahe kayiramāne umāpupphaṃ gahetvā thūpaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0508a1:2384_4: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:2384_5: sāvatthiyaṃ mahāsuvaṇṇassa nāma kuṭumbikassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2384_7: Mātā tassa ādhāvitvā paridhāvitvā vicaraṇakāle aññaṃ puttaṃ labhi.
atk-s0508a1:2384_8: Tassa mātāpitaro cūḷapāloti nāmaṃ katvā itaraṃ mahāpāloti vohariṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:2384_10: Tasmiṃ samaye satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane.
atk-s0508a1:2384_11: Tattha mahāpālo jetavanaṃ gacchantehi upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:2384_12: kuṭumbabhāraṃ kaniṭṭhabhātikasseva bhāraṃ katvā sayaṃ pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ santike
atk-s0508a1:2384_13: pañcavassāni vasitvā vuṭṭhavasso pavāretvā satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā saṭṭhimatte sahāyabhikkhū
atk-s0508a1:2384_14: labhitvā tehi saddhiṃ bhāvanānukūlaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pariyesanto aññataraṃ paccantagāmaṃ nissāya gāmavāsikehi
atk-s0508a1:2384_15: upāsakehi kāretvā dinnāya araññāyatane paṇṇasālāya vasanto samaṇadhammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0508a1:2384_20: So “akkhirogavūpasamanato kilesarogavūpasamanameva mayhaṃ vara”nti akkhirogaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā vipassanāyayeva yuttappayutto ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:2384_21: Tassa bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpentassa apubbaṃ acarimaṃ akkhīni ceva kilesā ca bhijjiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:2394_0: Atha there akkhirogena vihāre ohīne gāmaṃ piṇḍāya gate bhikkhū disvā upāsakā “kasmā thero nāgato”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0508a1:2394_3: idāni mayameva piṇḍapātaṃ ānetvā upaṭṭhahissāmā”ti tathā karonti.
atk-s0508a1:2394_4: Bhikkhū therassa ovāde ṭhatvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ patvā vuṭṭhavassā pavāretvā,
atk-s0508a1:2394_9: mayā saddhiṃ gacchantānaṃ tumhākaṃ parissayo bhavissati,
atk-s0508a1:2394_11: gantvā satthāraṃ mahāthere ca mama vandanāya vandatha,
atk-s0508a1:2394_12: cūḷapālassa mama pavattiṃ kathetvā kañci purisaṃ peseyyāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0508a1:2394_13: Te punapi yācitvā gamanaṃ alabhantā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā upāsake āpucchitvā anukkamena
atk-s0508a1:2394_14: jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ mahāthere ca tassa vandanāya vanditvā dutiyadivase sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā
atk-s0508a1:2394_15: cūḷapālassa taṃ pavattiṃ vatvā tena “ayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0508a1:2394_21: So anukkamena therassa santikaṃ gantvā attānaṃ tassa orocetvā taṃ gahetvā āgacchanto antarāmagge aññatarassa
atk-s0508a1:2394_22: gāmassa sāmantā araññaṭṭhāne ekissā kaṭṭhahāriyā gāyantiyā saddaṃ sutvā paṭibaddhacitto hutvā yaṭṭhikoṭiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2394_24: muhuttaṃ yāvāhaṃ āgacchāmī”ti vatvā tassā santikaṃ gantvā tattha sīlavipattiṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2394_31: Sāmaṇero tuṇhī hutvā puna pucchitopi na kathesi.
atk-s0508a1:2394_33: gaccha tva”nti vatvā puna tena “bahuparissayo maggo,
atk-s0508a1:2394_35: kathaṃ gamissathā”ti vutte “bāla idheva me nipajjitvā marantassāpi aparāparaṃ parivattentassāpi tādisena gamanaṃ nāma natthī”ti imamatthaṃ dassento –
atk-s0508a1:2397_0: Sayamānopi gacchissaṃ, na sahāyena pāpenā”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsittha;
atk-s0508a1:2398_4: Atha vā “andho”ti idaṃ “andhe jiṇṇe mātāpitaro posetī”tiādīsu viya maṃsacakkhuvekalladīpanaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2398_5: “sabbepime paribbājakā andhā acakkhukā” “andho ekacakkhu dvicakkhū”tiādīsu viya na paññācakkhuvekalladīpananti dassetuṃ “hatanettosmī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2398_9: Tādisañhi kantāraddhānaṃ ayaṃ thero samatikkamitvā ṭhito,
atk-s0508a1:2398_11: pādesu avahantesu urena jaṇṇukāhi ca bhūmiyaṃ saṃsaranto parivattentopi gaccheyyaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2398_12: Na sahāyena pāpenāti tādisena pāpapuggalena sahāyabhūtena saddhiṃ na gacchissanti yojanā.
atk-s0508a1:2398_13: Taṃ sutvā itaro saṃvegajāto “bhāriyaṃ vata mayā sāhasikakammaṃ kata”nti bāhā paggayha kandanto vanasaṇḍaṃ pakkhando ca ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:2398_14: Atha therassa sīlatejena paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0508a1:2398_15: Tena sakko taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā therassa santikaṃ gantvā sāvatthigāmipurisaṃ viya attānaṃ ñāpetvā yaṭṭhikoṭiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2398_16: gaṇhanto maggaṃ saṅkhipitvā tadaheva sāyanhe sāvatthiyaṃ theraṃ netvā tattha jetavane cūḷapālitena kāritāya
atk-s0508a1:2398_17: paṇṇasālāya phalake nisīdāpetvā tassa sahāyavaṇṇena therassa āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā pakkāmi;
atk-s0508a1:2401_2: So kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute tassa
atk-s0508a1:2401_3: thūpassa samantato candanavedikāya parikkhipitvā mahantaṃ pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2401_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu uḷāraṃ sampattiṃ anubhavanto kassapassa bhagavato kāle kuṭumbikakule
atk-s0508a1:2401_5: nibbatto satthari parinibbute kanakathūpaṃ uddissa raññā pupphapūjāya kayiramānāya pupphāni alabhanto
atk-s0508a1:2401_6: ekaṃ khaṇḍasumanapupphaṃ disvā mahatā mūlena taṃ kiṇitvā gaṇhanto cetiye pūjaṃ karonto uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0508a1:2401_7: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā asīti vassakoṭiyo saggasukhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde pāvāyaṃ mallarājakule nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:2401_8: Tassa jātakāle gehe khaṇḍasakkharā sumanapupphāni ca uppannāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2401_10: So viññutaṃ patto bhagavati pāvāyaṃ cundassa ambavane viharante upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:2401_11: pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:2409_0: Omattaṃ me na passāmi, pubbakammassidaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2413_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano purimajātiṃ anussaranto tattha attano sumanapupphapariccāgassa saggasampattinimittakaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2416_0: Saggesu paricāretvā, sesakenamhi nibbuto”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2417_3: Asīti vassakoṭiyoti manussagaṇanāya vassānaṃ asīti koṭiyo,
atk-s0508a1:2417_5: idañca chasu kāmasaggesu dutiye aparāparuppattivasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2417_8: Paricāretvāti rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu indriyāni paricāretvā sukhaṃ anubhavitvā,
atk-s0508a1:2417_10: Sesakenamhi nibbutoti pupphapūjāya vasena pavattakusalacetanāsu bhavasampatti dāyakakammato sesena yaṃ tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayabhūtaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2417_12: Bahū hi tattha pubbāparavasena pavattā cetanā.
atk-s0508a1:2417_13: Sesakenāti vā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena aparikkhīṇeyeva tasmiṃ kammavipāke nibbuto amhi,
atk-s0508a1:2417_15: Etena yasmiṃ attabhāve ṭhatvā attanā arahattaṃ sacchikataṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2417_17: Yādisaṃ sandhāya aññatthāpi “tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesenā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2420_0: Hitvā satapalaṃ kaṃsanti āyasmato tissattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:2420_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro vipassissa bhagavato kāle yānakārakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2420_3: bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso candanakhaṇḍena phalakaṃ katvā bhagavato upanāmesi,
atk-s0508a1:2420_5: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde roruvanagare rājakule nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:2420_6: So vayappatto pitari kālaṅkate rajje patiṭṭhito bimbisārarañño adiṭṭhasahāyo hutvā tassa maṇimuttāvatthādīni paṇṇākārāni pesesi.
atk-s0508a1:2420_7: Tassa rājā bimbisāro puññavantataṃ sutvā paṭipābhataṃ pesento cittapaṭe buddhacaritaṃ suvaṇṇapaṭṭe ca paṭiccasamuppādaṃ likhāpetvā pesesi.
atk-s0508a1:2420_8: So taṃ disvā purimabuddhesu katādhikāratāya pacchimabhavikatāya ca cittapaṭe dassentaṃ buddhacaritaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2420_9: suvaṇṇapaṭṭake likhitaṃ paṭiccasamuppādakkamañca oloketvā pavattinivattiyo sallakkhetvā sāsanakkamaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2420_10: hadaye ṭhapetvā sañjātasaṃvego “diṭṭho mayā bhagavato veso,
atk-s0508a1:2420_13: kiṃ dāni mayhaṃ gharāvāsenā”ti rajjaṃ pahāya kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādento bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2420_14: uddissa pabbajitvā mattikāpattaṃ gahetvā rājā pukkusāti viya mahājanassa paridevantasseva nagarato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0508a1:2420_15: anukkamena rājagahaṃ gantvā tattha sappasoṇḍikapabbhāre viharantaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā
atk-s0508a1:2420_18: So dhammadesanaṃ sutvā vipassanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā yuttappayutto viharanto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2426_0: Akkhubbhaṃ ratanaṃ mayhaṃ, phalakassa idaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2432_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā udānavasena attano paṭipattiṃ kathento –
atk-s0508a1:2435_0: Aggahiṃ mattikāpattaṃ, idaṃ dutiyābhisecana”nti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2436_5: Satarājikanti bhittivicittatāya ca anekarūparājicittatāya ca anekalekhāyuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2436_6: Aggahiṃ mattikāpattanti evarūpe mahārahe bhājane pubbe bhuñjitvā buddhānaṃ ovādaṃ karonto “idānāhaṃ taṃ chaḍḍetvā mattikāmayapattaṃ aggahesiṃ, aho, sādhu,
atk-s0508a1:2436_7: mayā kataṃ ariyavataṃ anuṭhita”nti bhājanakittanāpadesena rajjapariccāgaṃ pabbajjūpagamanañca anumodanto vadati.
atk-s0508a1:2436_9: Paṭhamaṃ rajjābhisecanaṃ upādāya idaṃ pabbajjūpagamanaṃ mama dutiyaṃ abhisecanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2436_10: Tañhi rāgādīhi saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ sāsaṅkaṃ saparisaṅkaṃ kammaṃ anatthasañhitaṃ dukkhapaṭibaddhaṃ nihīnaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2436_11: idaṃ pana taṃvipariyāyato uttamaṃ paṇītanti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:2439_0: Rūpaṃ disvā sati muṭṭhāti āyasmato abhayattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:2439_2: Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:2439_3: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ sumedhaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannacitto saḷalapupphehi
atk-s0508a1:2439_5: So tena puññakammena devesu nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:2439_6: sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā abhayoti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patto hetusampattiyā codiyamāno ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2439_7: vihāraṃ gato satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā katapubbakicco vipassanāya kammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2439_9: Athassa ekadivasaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ mātugāmaṃ disvā ayonisomanasikāravasena tassa rūpaṃ ārabbha chandarāgo uppajji,
atk-s0508a1:2439_10: so vihāraṃ pavisitvā “satiṃ vissajjitvā olokentassa rūpārammaṇe mayhaṃ kileso uppanno,
atk-s0508a1:2439_11: ayuttaṃ mayā kata”nti attano cittaṃ niggaṇhanto tāvadeva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2449_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano kilesuppattinidassanena “kilese anuvattentassa vaṭṭadukkhato nattheva sīsukkhipanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2451_0: “Rūpaṃ disvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasikaroto;
atk-s0508a1:2453_0: Tassa vaḍḍhanti āsavā, bhavamūlopagāmino”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2454_5: Sati muṭṭhāti asubhasabhāve kāye “asubha”ntveva pavattanasati naṭṭhā.
atk-s0508a1:2454_6: Yathā pana rūpaṃ disvā sati naṭṭhā,
atk-s0508a1:2454_8: Yathāupaṭṭhitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ “subhaṃ sukha”ntiādinā piyanimittaṃ katvā ayonisomanasikārena manasikaroto sati muṭṭhāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a1:2454_9: Tathā bhūtova sārattacitto vedetīti suṭṭhu rattacitto hutvā taṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ anubhavati abhinandati,
atk-s0508a1:2454_10: abhinandanto pana tañca ajjhosa tiṭṭhati ajjhosāya taṃ ārammaṇaṃ gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā vattati ceva,
atk-s0508a1:2454_11: evaṃbhūtassa ca tassa vaḍḍhanti āsavā bhavamūlopagāminoti bhavassa saṃsārassa mūlabhāvaṃ kāraṇabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2454_12: upagamanasabhāvā kāmāsavādayo cattāropi āsavā tassa puggalassa uparūpari vaḍḍhantiyeva,
atk-s0508a1:2454_14: Mayhaṃ pana paṭisaṅkhāne ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā saccāni paṭivijjhantassa maggapaṭipāṭiyā te cattāropi
atk-s0508a1:2457_0: Saddaṃ sutvā sati muṭṭhāti āyasmato uttiyattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:2457_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto sumedhassa
atk-s0508a1:2457_3: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannacitto gonakādiatthataṃ
atk-s0508a1:2457_4: sauttaracchadaṃ buddhārahaṃ pallaṅkaṃ gandhakuṭiyaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2457_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ sakyarājakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2457_7: So vayappatto satthu ñātisamāgame buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto
atk-s0508a1:2457_8: ekadivasaṃ nāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho antarāmagge mātugāmassa gītasaddaṃ sutvā ayonisomanasikāravasena tattha
atk-s0508a1:2457_9: chandarāge uppanne paṭisaṅkhānabalena taṃ vikkhambhetvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā sañjātasaṃvego divāṭṭhāne nisīditvā
atk-s0508a1:2467_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano kilesuppattinidassanena “kilese ajigucchantassa natthi vaṭṭadukkhato sīsukkhipanaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2469_0: “Saddaṃ sutvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasikaroto;
atk-s0508a1:2471_0: Tassa vaḍḍhanti āsavā, saṃsāra upagāmino”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2478_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:2478_3: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ sikhiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso bandhujīvakapupphehi
atk-s0508a1:2478_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ sakyarājakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2478_7: So vayappatto cumbaṭakalahavūpasamanatthaṃ satthari āgate buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā pasannamānaso saraṇesu
atk-s0508a1:2478_8: patiṭṭhito puna nigrodhārāme satthari viharante satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā katapubbakicco
atk-s0508a1:2478_9: vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2490_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attanā adhigataṃ vimuttisukhaṃ nissāya uppannapītisomanasso udānavasena –
atk-s0508a1:2494_2: Satipaṭṭhānagocaroti kāyānupassanādayo satipaṭṭhānā gocaro pavattiṭṭhānaṃ etassāti satipaṭṭhānagocaro,
atk-s0508a1:2494_5: tehi sabbaso sammadeva sañchanno vibhūsito alaṅkatoti vimuttikusumasañchanno.
atk-s0508a1:2494_6: Parinibbissatyanāsavoti evaṃ sammā paṭipajjanto bhikkhu nacirasseva anāsavo hutvā parinibbissati saupādisesāya
atk-s0508a1:2499_0: Hitvā gihittaṃ anavositattotiādikā āyasmato belaṭṭhānikattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:2499_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro ito ekatiṃse kappe vessabhussa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:2499_3: vayappatto brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṃ gantvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā isīhi parivuto
atk-s0508a1:2499_4: vicaranto ekadivasaṃ vessabhuṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pītisomanassajāto satthu ñāṇasampattiṃ nissāya pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:2499_6: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:2499_7: belaṭṭhānikoti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2499_8: gahetvā kosalaraṭṭhe araññe viharanto alaso kāyadaḷhibahulo pharusavāco ahosi,
atk-s0508a1:2503_1: So satthāraṃ purato nisinnaṃ viya disvā tañca gāthaṃ sutvā saṃvegajāto ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2505_0: Obhāsentaṃ disā sabbā, osadhiṃ viya tārakaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2515_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthu ovādaṃ paṭipūjento byatirekamukhena ca aññaṃ byākaronto tameva gāthaṃ paccudāhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2516_0: Tattha hitvā gihittanti gahaṭṭhabhāvaṃ pariccajitvā pabbajitvāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:2516_2: yadatthaṃ sāsane pabbajantassa anurūpapariññādīnaṃ atīritattā apariyositabhāvo akatakaraṇīyoti attho.
atk-s0508a1:2516_7: Naṅgalena viya pathaviṃ paresu pharusavācappayogena attānaṃ khanantoti attho.
atk-s0508a1:2516_14: Ettha ca yathā pabbajitvā anavositādisabhāvatāya punappunaṃ gabbhamupeti mando,
atk-s0508a1:2516_16: Tabbiparītasabhāvatāya pana sammāpaṭipattiyā matthakaṃ pāpitattā parinibbāyatīti byatirekamukhena aññaṃ byākāsīti daṭṭhabbanti.
atk-s0508a1:2519_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto tissassa sammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0508a1:2519_3: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ tissaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso sumadhuraṃ
atk-s0508a1:2519_5: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde aññatarassa maṇḍalikarañño putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2519_7: So pitari mate rajje patiṭṭhito ussāhasattīnaṃ abhāvena rājakiccāni virādhento rajjaṃ parahatthagataṃ
atk-s0508a1:2519_8: katvā dukkhappattiyā saṃvegajāto janapadacārikaṃ carantaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā
atk-s0508a1:2519_9: paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā parikammaṃ karonto tadaheva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2532_0: Lābhālābhena mathitā, samādhiṃ nādhigacchantī”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2533_0: Tattha mānena vañcitāseti “seyyohamasmī”tiādinayappavattena mānena attukkaṃsanaparavambhanādivasena kusalabhaṇḍacchedanena vippaladdhā.
atk-s0508a1:2533_1: Saṅkhāresu saṃkilissamānāseti ajjhattikabāhiresu cakkhādīsu ceva rūpādīsu ca saṅkhatadhammesu saṃkilissamānā,
atk-s0508a1:2533_4: eso me attā”ti taṃnimittaṃ taṇhāgāhādivasena saṃkilesaṃ āpajjamānā.
atk-s0508a1:2533_5: Lābhālābhena mathitāti pattacīvarādīnañceva vatthādīnañca lābhena tesaṃyeva ca alābhena taṃnimittaṃ uppannehi
atk-s0508a1:2533_8: Samādhiṃ nādhigacchantīti te evarūpā puggalā samādhiṃ samathavipassanāvasena cittekaggataṃ kadācipi na
atk-s0508a1:2533_9: vindanti na paṭilabhanti na pāpuṇanti samādhisaṃvattanikānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhāvato,
atk-s0508a1:2533_11: Idhāpi yathā mānādīhi abhibhūtā aviddasuno samādhiṃ nādhigacchanti,
atk-s0508a1:2533_13: Te pana mādisā tehi anabhibhūtā samādhiṃ adhigacchantevāti byatirekamukhena aññābyākaraṇanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2536_0: Nāhaṃ etena atthikoti āyasmato bandhurattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:2536_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle aññatarassa rañño antepure gopako hutvā
atk-s0508a1:2536_3: ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ saparisaṃ rājaṅgaṇena gacchantaṃ disvā pasannacitto kaṇaverapupphāni gahetvā sasaṅghaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2536_5: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sīlavatīnagare seṭṭhiputto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2536_7: So viññutaṃ patto kenacideva karaṇīyena sāvatthiyaṃ gato upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gato satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2536_8: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā ñāṇassa paripākattā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2542_0: Buddhassa visuṃ katvāna, tato bhiyyo samokiriṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2548_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā kataññubhāve ṭhatvā attano upakārassa rañño paccupakāraṃ kātuṃ sīlavatīnagaraṃ gantvā rañño dhammaṃ desento saccāni pakāsesi.
atk-s0508a1:2548_1: Rājā saccapariyosāne sotāpanno hutvā attano nagare sudassanaṃ nāma mahantaṃ vihāraṃ kāretvā therassa niyyātesi.
atk-s0508a1:2548_3: Thero vihāraṃ sabbañca lābhasakkāraṃ saṅghassa niyyātetvā sayaṃ purimaniyāmeneva piṇḍāya caritvā yāpento
atk-s0508a1:2548_4: katipāhaṃ tattha vasitvā sāvatthiṃ gantukāmo ahosi. Bhikkhū, “bhante,
atk-s0508a1:2551_0: Pitvā rasaggamuttamaṃ, na ca kāhāmi visena santhava”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:2553_0: Tattha nāhaṃ etena atthikoti yena maṃ tumhe tappetukāmā “paripūressāmā”ti vadatha,
atk-s0508a1:2553_3: santuṭṭhi paramaṃ sukhanti itarītareheva paccayehi yāpemīti attho.
atk-s0508a1:2553_4: Idāni tena anatthikabhāve padhānakāraṇaṃ dassento āha “sukhito dhammarasena tappito”ti.
atk-s0508a1:2553_5: Sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammarasena ceva navavidhalokuttaradhammarasena ca tappito pīṇito sukhito uttamena sukhena suhitoti attho.
atk-s0508a1:2553_6: Pitvā rasaggamuttamanti sabbarasesu aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ tatoyeva uttamaṃ yathāvuttaṃ dhammarasaṃ pivitvā ṭhito, tenāha –
atk-s0508a1:2553_8: Na ca kāhāmi visena santhavanti evarūpaṃ rasuttamaṃ dhammarasaṃ pivitvā ṭhito visena visasadisena visarasena santhavaṃ saṃsaggaṃ na karissāmi,
atk-s0508a1:2556_0: Lahuko vata me kāyoti āyasmato khitakattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:2556_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a1:2556_3: yakkhasenāpati hutvā nibbatto ekadivasaṃ yakkhasamāgame nisinno satthāraṃ aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2556_4: disvā upasaṅkamitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0508a1:2556_6: So dhammaṃ sutvā uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ pavedento apphoṭento uṭṭhahitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:2556_7: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2556_9: So viññutaṃ patto mahāmoggallānattherassa mahiddhikabhāvaṃ sutvā “iddhimā bhavissāmī”ti pubbahetunā codiyamāno
atk-s0508a1:2556_10: pabbajitvā bhagavato santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā samathavipassanāsu kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:2568_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā savisesaṃ iddhīsu vasībhāvena anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhonto iddhipāṭihāriyena
atk-s0508a1:2568_1: anusāsanīpāṭihāriyena ca sattānaṃ anuggahaṃ karonto viharati.
atk-s0508a1:2570_0: “Lahuko vata me kāyo, phuṭṭho ca pītisukhena vipulena;
atk-s0508a1:2571_0: Tūlamiva eritaṃ mālutena, pilavatīva me kāyo”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:2573_0: Tattha lahuko vata me kāyoti nīvaraṇādivikkhambhanena cuddasavidhena cittaparidamanena caturiddhipādakabhāvanāya
atk-s0508a1:2573_1: suṭṭhu ciṇṇavasībhāvena ca me rūpakāyo sallahuko vata,
atk-s0508a1:2573_2: yena dandhaṃ mahābhūtapaccayampi nāma imaṃ karajakāyaṃ cittavasena pariṇāmemīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:2573_3: Phuṭṭho ca pītisukhena vipulenāti sabbatthakameva pharantena mahatā uḷārena pītisahitena sukhena phuṭṭho ca me kāyoti yojanā.
atk-s0508a1:2573_7: Sukhassa pharaṇañcettha taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpavasena daṭṭhabbaṃ kathaṃ pana catutthajjhānasamaṅgino pītisukhapharaṇaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2573_13: upekkhā hi idha santasabhāvatāya ñāṇavisesayogato ca sukhanti adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2573_15: Pādakajjhānārammaṇena rūpakāyārammaṇena vā iddhicittena sahajātaṃ sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamati
atk-s0508a1:2573_16: pavisati phusati sampāpuṇātīti ayampi tattha attho.
atk-s0508a1:2573_19: Upekkhā hi santaṃ sukhanti vuttaṃ sāyeva saññā nīvaraṇehi ceva vitakkādipaccanīkehi ca vimuttattā lahusaññātipi veditabbā.
atk-s0508a1:2573_20: Taṃ okkantassa panassa karajakāyopi tūlapicu viya sallahuko hoti.
atk-s0508a1:2573_21: So evaṃ vātakkhittatūlapicuno viya sallahukena dissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṃ gacchatī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:2573_25: yadāhaṃ brahmalokaṃ aññaṃ vā iddhiyā gantukāmo homi,
atk-s0508a1:2573_26: tadā mālutena vāyunā eritaṃ cittaṃ tūlapicu viya ākāsaṃ laṅghantoyeva me kāyo hotīti.
atk-s0508a1:2576_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle himavantato avidūre aññatarasmiṃ jātassare sakuṇo hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2576_3: padumuttaro bhagavā taṃ anuggaṇhanto tattha gantvā jātassaratīre caṅkamati.
atk-s0508a1:2576_4: Sakuṇo bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso sare kumudāni gahetvā bhagavantaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0508a1:2576_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kurukacchanagare aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2576_7: So viññutaṃ patto pacchābhūmahātheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto viharati.
atk-s0508a1:2576_15: Evaṃ viharanto ca hetusampannatāya mahāpurisajātikatāya ca nacirasseva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2590_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā udānento –
atk-s0508a1:2593_0: Na tvevānatthasaṃhitaṃ, vase vāsaṃ vicakkhaṇo”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2594_0: Tattha ukkaṇṭhitopi na vaseti yasmiṃ āvāse vasantassa me bhojanasappāyālābhena adhikusalesu dhammesu ukkaṇṭhā anabhirati uppajjati,
atk-s0508a1:2594_1: tattha ukkaṇṭhitopi vasāmiyeva itarasappāyalābhena na pakkame na pakkamāmi.
atk-s0508a1:2594_4: Ramamānopi pakkameti yasmiṃ pana āvāse vasantassa me paccayavekallābhāvena natthi ukkaṇṭhā,
atk-s0508a1:2594_10: Parassa ovādadāne pana vaseyya na pakkameyyāti vidhānavasena yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2594_12: vase vāsaṃ vicakkhaṇoti yasmiṃ āvāse paccayā sulabhā,
atk-s0508a1:2594_16: evarūpo āvāso idha anatthasaṃhito nāma avaḍḍhisahitoti katvā.
atk-s0508a1:2594_17: Evarūpaṃ vāsaṃ vicakkhaṇo viññujātiko sakatthaṃ paripūretukāmo natveva vaseyya.
atk-s0508a1:2597_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito dvānavute
atk-s0508a1:2597_3: kappe tissassa bhagavato kāle vanacaro hutvā vane vasati,
atk-s0508a1:2597_4: taṃ anuggahituṃ bhagavā araññaṃ pavisitvā tassa āsanne ṭhāne aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0508a1:2597_5: So bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannacitto sugandhāni punnāgapupphāni ocinitvā bhagavantaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0508a1:2597_6: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:2597_7: pāriyantadese vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2597_9: So viññutaṃ patto saṅkassanagare migadāye viharantaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:2597_10: pabbajitvā tepiṭako hutvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño paṭisambhidāpatto ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:2607_4: Evaṃ cintetvā pabhinnapaṭisambhidatāya akilāsutāya ca attano santikaṃ upagate bhikkhū yathārahaṃ ovadanto
atk-s0508a1:2607_5: anusāsanto kaṅkhaṃ chindanto dhammaṃ kathento kammaṭṭhānaṃ niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ katvā ācikkhanto viharati.
atk-s0508a1:2607_6: Athekadivasaṃ attano santikaṃ upagatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ viññūnañca puggalānaṃ visesaṃ ācikkhanto –
atk-s0508a1:2610_0: Ekaṅgadassī dummedho, satadassī ca paṇḍito”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2611_2: tāni pana sataṃ anekāni liṅgāni etassāti sataliṅgo.
atk-s0508a1:2611_4: “sataṃ sahassa”ntiādīsu viya na saṅkhyāvisesattho tassa sataliṅgassa.
atk-s0508a1:2611_10: Yena liṅgena pavattinimittena tāvatiṃsādhipatimhi indasaddo pavatto,
atk-s0508a1:2612_2: paccayabhāvino atthassa attano phalaṃ paṭicca paccayabhāvo,
atk-s0508a1:2612_3: tena hi so ayaṃ imassa kāraṇanti lakkhīyati.
atk-s0508a1:2612_4: So ca ekasseva atthassa anekappabhedo upalabbhati,
atk-s0508a1:2612_7: tassa tassa atthassa saṅkhatatādayo pakāravisesā te pana atthato avatthāvisesā veditabbā.
atk-s0508a1:2612_8: Te ca pana tesaṃ aniccatādisāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ liṅgenti ñāpentīti “liṅgānī”ti ca vuccanti.
atk-s0508a1:2612_14: “sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ āgacchantī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:2613_0: Ekaṅgadassī dummedhoti evaṃ anekaliṅge anekalakkhaṇe atthe yo tattha ekaṅgadassī aputhupaññatāya ekaliṅgamattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2613_1: ekalakkhaṇamattañca disvā attanā diṭṭhameva “idameva sacca”nti abhinivissa “moghamañña”nti itaraṃ paṭikkhipati,
atk-s0508a1:2613_2: hatthidassanakaandho viya ekaṅgagāhī dummedho duppañño tattha vijjamānānaṃyeva pakāravisesānaṃ ajānanato micchā abhinivisanato ca.
atk-s0508a1:2613_3: Satadassī ca paṇḍitoti paṇḍito pana tattha vijjamāne anekepi pakāre attano paññācakkhunā sabbaso passati.
atk-s0508a1:2613_4: Yo vā tattha labbhamāne aneke paññācakkhunā attanāpi passati,
atk-s0508a1:2613_6: so paṇḍito vicakkhaṇo atthesu kusalo nāmāti.
atk-s0508a1:2613_7: Evaṃ thero ukkaṃsagataṃ attano paṭisambhidāsampattiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vibhāvesi.
atk-s0508a1:2616_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle suvaccho nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū gharāvāse
atk-s0508a1:2616_3: dosaṃ disvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññāyatane pabbatantare assamaṃ kāretvā bahūhi tāpasehi saddhiṃ vasi.
atk-s0508a1:2616_4: Athassa kusalabījaṃ ropetukāmo padumuttaro bhagavā assamasamīpe ākāse ṭhatvā iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0508a1:2616_5: So taṃ disvā pasannamānaso pūjetukāmo nāgapupphāni ocināpesi. Satthā,
atk-s0508a1:2616_7: So pupphāni gahetvā satthu gamanamaggaṃ okiritvā cittaṃ pasādento añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2616_8: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe
atk-s0508a1:2616_9: brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā dhammasavoti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patto hetusampattiyā codiyamāno gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2616_10: pabbajjāya ānisaṃsañca disvā dakkhiṇāgirismiṃ viharantaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:2616_11: pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2630_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā somanassappatto udānavasena –
atk-s0508a1:2633_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2634_0: Tattha pabbajiṃ tulayitvānāti “sambādho gharāvāso rajāpatho”tiādinā gharāvāse,
atk-s0508a1:2634_1: “appassādā kāmā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā”tiādinā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ tappaṭipakkhato nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ tulabhūtāya paññāya vicāretvā vīmaṃsitvāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:2637_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro buddhasuññe loke kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto bhūtagaṇe nāma
atk-s0508a1:2637_3: pabbate viharantaṃ paccekasambuddhaṃ disvā pasannamānaso tiṇasūlapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2637_4: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe
atk-s0508a1:2637_5: brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto dārapariggahaṃ katvā dhammasavaṃ nāma puttaṃ labhitvā tasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2637_8: atha kasmā nāhaṃ pabbajissāmī”ti sañjātasaṃvego satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2645_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā sañjātasomanasso udānento –
atk-s0508a1:2648_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2649_4: Idameva ca imassa therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:2652_0: Na nūnāyaṃ paramahitānukampinoti āyasmato saṅgharakkhitattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:2652_2: Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito catunavute kappe kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:2652_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ pabbatapāde vasante satta paccekasambuddhe disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:2652_5: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ ibbhakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2652_7: So viññutaṃ patto paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ sahāyaṃ katvā araññe viharati.
atk-s0508a1:2652_8: Therassa vasanaṭṭhānato avidūre vanagumbe ekā migī vijāyitvā taruṇaṃ chāpaṃ rakkhantī chātajjhattāpi puttasinehena dūre gocarāya na gacchati,
atk-s0508a1:2652_12: na taṃ chindituṃ sakkotī”ti saṃvegajāto tameva aṅkusaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2654_0: Tamhi pabbatapādamhi, satta buddhā vasanti te.
atk-s0508a1:2656_0: Ubho hatthehi paggayha, satta buddhe samokiriṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2662_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano dutiyakaṃ bhikkhuṃ micchāvitakkabahulaṃ viharantaṃ ñatvā tameva migiṃ upamaṃ karitvā taṃ ovadanto –
atk-s0508a1:2665_0: Tathāhayaṃ viharati pākatindriyo, migī yathā taruṇajātikā vane”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:2667_5: paramena vā anuttarena hitena satte anukampanasīlassa bhagavato.
atk-s0508a1:2667_8: Anuvigaṇetīti ettha “na nūnā”ti padadvayaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ “nānuvigaṇeti nūnā”ti,
atk-s0508a1:2667_16: Pākatindriyoti manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ yathāsakaṃ visayesu vissajjanato sabhāvabhūtaindriyo,
atk-s0508a1:2667_18: Yassa taṇhāsaṅgassa acchinnatāya so bhikkhu pākatindriyo viharati,
atk-s0508a1:2667_19: tassa upamaṃ dassento “migī yathā taruṇajātikā vane”ti āha.
atk-s0508a1:2667_20: Yathā ayaṃ taruṇasabhāvā migī puttasnehassa acchinnatāya vane dukkhaṃ anubhavati,
atk-s0508a1:2667_22: evamayampi bhikkhu saṅgassa acchinnatāya pākatindriyo viharanto vaṭṭadukkhaṃ nātivattatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:2667_25: Taṃ sutvā so bhikkhu sañjātasaṃvego vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2670_0: Nagā nagaggesu susaṃvirūḷhāti āyasmato usabhattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:2670_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni karonto ito ekatiṃse
atk-s0508a1:2670_3: kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle devaputto hutvā nibbatto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso dibbapupphehi
atk-s0508a1:2670_7: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe ibbhakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2670_9: So viññutaṃ patto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe satthari laddhappasādo pabbajitvā katapubbakicco araññe pabbatapāde viharati.
atk-s0508a1:2670_10: Tena ca samayena pāvusakālameghe abhippavuṭṭhe pabbatasikharesu rukkhagacchalatāya ghanapaṇṇasaṇḍino honti.
atk-s0508a1:2670_11: Athekadivasaṃ thero leṇato nikkhamitvā taṃ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṃ pabbatarāmaṇeyyakañca disvā yonisomanasikāravasena
atk-s0508a1:2670_12: “imepi nāma rukkhādayo acetanā utusampattiyā vaḍḍhiṃ pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0508a1:2670_13: atha kasmā nāhaṃ utusappāyaṃ labhitvā guṇehi vaḍḍhiṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti cintento –
atk-s0508a1:2673_0: Vivekakāmassa araññasaññino, janeti bhiyyo usabhassa kalyata”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:2675_4: Susaṃvirūḷhāti suṭṭhu samantato virūḷhamūlā hutvā parito upari ca sammadeva sañjātasākhaggapallavappasākhāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:2675_5: Udaggameghena navena sittāti paṭhamuppannena uḷārena mahatā pāvusameghena abhippavuṭṭhā.
atk-s0508a1:2675_8: idāni upadhivivekādhigamassa nissayabhūto cittaviveko laddhabboti taṃ patthayamānassa,
atk-s0508a1:2675_13: tasmā sā mayā hatthagatā kātabbāti evaṃ araññagatasaññino nekkhammasaṅkappabahulassāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:2675_21: Evaṃ thero imaṃ gāthaṃ vadantoyeva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2690_0: Duppabbajjaṃ ve duradhivāsā gehāti āyasmato jentattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:2690_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle devaputto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:2690_3: So ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannacitto kiṃkirātapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2690_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe jentagāme ekassa maṇḍalikarājassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2690_6: So viññutaṃ patto daharakāleyeva hetusampattiyā codiyamāno pabbajjāninnamānaso hutvā puna cintesi –
atk-s0508a1:2690_11: kiṃ nu kho kattabba”nti evaṃ pana cintābahulo hutvā vicaranto ekadivasaṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2690_12: Sutakālato paṭṭhāya pabbajjābhirato hutvā satthu santike pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0508a1:2695_0: “Ito ca navame kappe, rājā sattuttamo ahuṃ;
atk-s0508a1:2698_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhanto,
atk-s0508a1:2698_1: “asakkhiṃ vatāhaṃ ādito mayhaṃ uppannavitakkaṃ chinditu”nti somanassajāto vitakkassa uppannākāraṃ tassa ca sammadeva chinnataṃ dassento –
atk-s0508a1:2700_0: “Duppabbajjaṃ ve duradhivāsā gehā, dhammo gambhīro duradhigamā bhogā;
atk-s0508a1:2701_0: Kicchā vutti no itarītareneva, yuttaṃ cintetuṃ satatamaniccata”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:2703_0: Tattha duppabbajjanti appaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā bhogakkhandhañceva ñātiparivaṭṭañca pahāya imasmiṃ sāsane
atk-s0508a1:2703_1: uraṃ datvā pabbajanassa dukkarattā dukkhaṃ pabbajanaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2703_11: tasmiṃ tasmiñca kattabbe kariyamānepi gharāvāso chiddaghaṭo viya mahāsamuddo viya ca duppūro,
atk-s0508a1:2703_12: tasmā gehā nāmete adhivasituṃ āvasituṃ dukkhā dukkarāti katvā duradhivāsā durāvāsāti.
atk-s0508a1:2703_19: duradhigamā bhogā yehi vinā na sakkā gehaṃ āvasituṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2703_20: te bhogā dukkhena kasirena adhigantabbatāya duradhigamā.
atk-s0508a1:2703_21: Evaṃ sante gharāvāsaṃ pahāya pabbajjaṃyeva anutiṭṭheyyaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2703_22: evampi kicchā vutti no itarītarena idha imasmiṃ buddhasāsane itarītarena yathāladdhena paccayena amhākaṃ vutti jīvikā kicchā dukkhā,
atk-s0508a1:2703_23: gharāvāsānaṃ duradhivāsatāya bhogānañca duradhigamatāya gehe itarītarena paccayena yāpetabbatāya kicchā kasirā vutti amhākaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2703_25: Yuttaṃ cintetuṃ satatamaniccataṃ sakalaṃ divasaṃ pubbarattāpararattañca tebhūmakadhammajātaṃ aniccatanti,
atk-s0508a1:2703_26: tato uppādavayavantato ādiantavantato tāvakālikato ca na niccanti “anicca”nti cintetuṃ vipassituṃ yuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2703_27: Aniccānupassanāya siddhāya itarānupassanā sukheneva sijjhantīti aniccānupassanāva ettha vuttā,
atk-s0508a1:2703_28: aniccassa dukkhānattatānaṃ abyabhicaraṇato sāsanikassa sukhaggahaṇato ca. Tenāha –
atk-s0508a1:2703_33: “vayadhammā saṅkhārā”ti ca tadaminā evaṃ aññamaññaṃ paṭipakkhavasena aparāparaṃ uppanne vitakke niggahetvā
atk-s0508a1:2703_34: aniccatāmukhena vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā idāni katakicco jātoti dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:2706_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalabījaṃ ropento vipassissa
atk-s0508a1:2706_3: bhagavato kāle bandhumatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ raññā nāgarehi ca saddhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2706_4: buddhapūjaṃ katvā tato paraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe vibhavasampannassa
atk-s0508a1:2706_7: So viññutaṃ patvā brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṃ gato vimuttiṃ gavesanto tattha sāraṃ adisvā paribbājakapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2706_8: pabbajitvā vicaranto satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchitvā tasmiṃ vissajjite pasannamānaso satthu
atk-s0508a1:2706_9: santike pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:2718_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā somanassajāto udānavasena –
atk-s0508a1:2721_0: Sadattho me anuppatto, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2722_0: Tattha tevijjohanti yadipi maṃ pubbe tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāraṃ gatattā “brāhmaṇo tevijjo”ti sañjānanti,
atk-s0508a1:2722_1: taṃ pana samaññāmattaṃ vedesu vijjākiccassa abhāvato.
atk-s0508a1:2722_2: Idāni pana pubbenivāsañāṇādīnaṃ tissannaṃ vijjānaṃ adhigatattā paramatthato tevijjo ahaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2722_4: mahantena maggaphalajhānena mahantassa uḷārassa paṇītassa nibbānassa jhāyanato ca mahājhāyī.
atk-s0508a1:2722_5: Cetosamathakovidoti cittasaṅkhobhakarānaṃ saṃkilesadhammānaṃ vūpasamanena cetaso samādahane kusalo.
atk-s0508a1:2722_13: Tañhi attapaṭibandhaṭṭhena attānaṃ avijahanaṭṭhena attano paramatthaṭṭhena attano atthattā “sakattho”ti vuccati.
atk-s0508a1:2722_14: Svāyaṃ sadattho me mayā anuppatto adhigato.
atk-s0508a1:2722_15: Etena yathāvuttaṃ mahājhāyibhāvaṃ sikhāpattaṃ katvā dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:2725_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalabījaṃ ropento vipassissa
atk-s0508a1:2725_3: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto parassa kammaṃ katvā jīvanto kassaci aparādhaṃ katvā
atk-s0508a1:2725_4: maraṇabhayena tajjito palāyanto antarāmagge bodhirukkhaṃ disvā pasannamānaso tassa mūlaṃ sammajjitvā
atk-s0508a1:2725_5: piṇḍibandhehi asokapupphehi pūjaṃ katvā vanditvā bodhiṃ abhimukho namassamāno pallaṅkena nisinno māretuṃ
atk-s0508a1:2725_6: āgate paccatthike disvā tesu cittaṃ akopetvā bodhiṃ eva āvajjento sataporise papāte papati.
atk-s0508a1:2725_7: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:2725_8: rājagahe vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2725_10: So vayappatto bimbisārasamāgame paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2733_0: Te ca disvānahaṃ tattha, āvajjiṃ bodhimuttamaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2738_0: “Ito ca tatiye kappe, rājā susaññato ahaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:2741_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vivekābhiratiyā vaneyeva vasi,
atk-s0508a1:2741_2: Atha kadāci thero ñātijanānuggahatthaṃ rājagahaṃ gato tattha ñātakehi upaṭṭhiyamāno katipāhaṃ vasitvā gamanākāraṃ sandasseti.
atk-s0508a1:2744_0: Ambusevālasañchannā, te selā ramayanti ma”nti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2745_0: Tattha acchodikāti acchaṃ abahalaṃ sukhumaṃ udakaṃ etesūti “acchodakā”ti vattabbe liṅgavipallāsena acchodikā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2745_2: Puthusilāti puthulā vitthatā mudusukhasamphassā silā etesūti puthusilā.
atk-s0508a1:2745_4: Gunnaṃ viya naṅgulaṃ naṅguṭṭhaṃ etesanti gonaṅgulā,
atk-s0508a1:2745_7: Gonaṅgulehi ca pasadādikehi migehi ca tahaṃ tahaṃ vicarantehi āyutā missitāti gonaṅgulamigāyutā.
atk-s0508a1:2745_9: Ambusevālasañchannāti pasavanato satataṃ paggharamānasalilatāya tahaṃ tahaṃ udakasevālasañchāditā.
atk-s0508a1:2745_10: Te selā ramayanti manti yatthāhaṃ vasāmi;
atk-s0508a1:2745_11: te edisā selā pabbatā vivekābhiratiyā maṃ ramayanti,
atk-s0508a1:2748_2: So kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2748_3: gato kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññe viharanto buddhuppādaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2748_4: sutvā manussūpacāraṃ upagantvā satthāraṃ bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso attano
atk-s0508a1:2748_6: Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā tasmiṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2748_7: Tattha ṭhitaṃ bhagavantaṃ kāḷānusārena gandhena pūjetvā “samuddharasimaṃ loka”ntiādikāhi dasahi gāthāhi abhitthavi.
atk-s0508a1:2748_8: Taṃ satthā “anāgate ito satasahassakappamatthake gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā chaḷabhiñño bhavissatī”ti byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:2748_9: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā tato yāvāyaṃ buddhuppādo,
atk-s0508a1:2748_10: tāva devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā adhimuttoti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a1:2748_11: viññutaṃ patto brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṃ gantvā tattha sāraṃ apassanto pacchimabhavikattā nissaraṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2748_12: gavesanto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho satthu santike pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2772_0: Asamo susamo santo, vasī tādī jitañjayo.
atk-s0508a1:2780_0: Vanditvā satthuno pāde, tuṇhī aṭṭhāsahaṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a1:2782_0: Bhikkhusaṅghe ṭhito satthā, imā gāthā abhāsatha.
atk-s0508a1:2792_0: Tatheva tvaṃ mahāvīra, dhammena tappayī mamaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2795_0: “Aho nūna sa bhagavā, ciraṃ tiṭṭheyya cakkhumā;
atk-s0508a1:2797_0: “Ayaṃ me pacchimā jāti, bhavā sabbe samūhatā;
atk-s0508a1:2802_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attanā saha vasante kāyadaḷhibahule bhikkhū ovadanto –
atk-s0508a1:2806_2: kāyaduṭṭhullaṃ garu sambhāvitaṃ yassa so kāyaduṭṭhullagaru,
atk-s0508a1:2806_5: Hiyyamānamhi jīviteti kunnadīnaṃ udakaṃ viya jīvitasaṅkhāre lahuso khīyamāne.
atk-s0508a1:2806_6: Sarīrasukhagiddhassāti paṇītāhārādīhi attano kāyassa sukhena gedhaṃ āpannassa.
atk-s0508a1:2806_7: Kuto samaṇasādhutāti evarūpassa puggalassa samaṇabhāvena sādhutā susamaṇatā kuto kena kāraṇena siyā,
atk-s0508a1:2806_8: ekaṃsato pana kāye jīvite ca nirapekkhassa itarītarasantosena santuṭṭhassa āraddhavīriyasseva samaṇasādhutāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:2809_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a1:2809_3: nibbattitvā brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṃ gato gharāvāsaṃ pahāya aññatarāya nadiyā tīre assamaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0508a1:2809_5: Athekadivasaṃ bhagavā taṃ anuggaṇhituṃ tassa asamapadaṃ upagacchi.
atk-s0508a1:2809_6: So bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannacitto āsanaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2809_8: Taṃ bhagavā paribhuñjitvā heṭṭhā adhimuttattheravatthumhi vuttanayena anāgataṃ byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:2809_9: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva parivattento imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2809_10: brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā mahānāmoti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patto bhagavato santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2809_11: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nesādake nāma pabbate viharanto kilesapariyuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2809_12: vikkhambhetuṃ asakkonto “kiṃ me iminā saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa jīvitenā”ti attabhāvaṃ nibbindanto uccaṃ pabbatasikharaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2809_13: abhiruhitvā “ito pātetvā taṃ māressāmī”ti attānaṃ paraṃ viya niddisanto –
atk-s0508a1:2812_0: Nesādakena girinā, yasassinā paricchadenā”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2813_0: Tattha esāvahiyyaseti eso tvaṃ mahānāma avahiyyase parihāyasi.
atk-s0508a1:2813_2: Bahukuṭajasallakikenāti bahūhi kuṭajehi indasālarukkhehi sallakīhi indasālarukkhehi vā samannāgatena.
