atk-s0508a1:3036_8: iminā coriyaṃ kata”nti sāmaṇeraṃ pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā vassakārassa brāhmaṇassa dassesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3036_9: Vassakāro ca tadā rañño vinicchaye niyutto hutvā chejjabhejjaṃ anusāsati.
atk-s0508a1:3036_11: suddhapāsaṇḍiyesu pabbajī”ti ca baddhāghātattā kammaṃ asodhetvāva jīvantameva taṃ sūle uttāsesi.
atk-s0508a1:3037_0: Athassa bhagavā ñāṇaparipākaṃ oloketvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā vipphurantahatthanakhamaṇimayūkhasambhinnasitābhatāya
atk-s0508a1:3037_1: paggharantajātihiṅgulakasuvaṇṇarasadhāraṃ viya jālāguṇṭhitamudutalunadīghaṅgulihatthaṃ uttarassa sīse ṭhapetvā, “uttara,
atk-s0508a1:3037_3: tattha tayā paccavekkhaṇabalena adhivāsanā kātabbā”ti vatvā ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0508a1:3037_4: Uttaro amatābhisekasadisena satthu hatthasamphassena sañjātappasādasomanassatāya uḷāraṃ pītipāmojjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3037_5: paṭilabhitvā yathāparicitaṃ vipassanāmaggaṃ samārūḷho ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā satthu ca desanāvilāsena
atk-s0508a1:3037_6: tāvadeva maggapaṭipāṭiyā sabbakilese khepetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:3043_0: Tisūlaṃ sugataṃ gayha, gacchāmi ambare tadā.
atk-s0508a1:3070_0: “Tattha bhutvā pivitvā ca, modāmi tidase tadā;
atk-s0508a1:3076_0: Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, buddhapūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3078_0: Aññaṃ gatiṃ na jānāmi, buddhapūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3080_0: Nīce kule na jānāmi, buddhapūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3089_0: “Imaṃ khāda imaṃ bhuñja, imamhi sayane saya;
atk-s0508a1:3094_0: “Sītaṃ uṇhaṃ na jānāmi, pariḷāho na vijjati;
atk-s0508a1:3095_0: Atho cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ, hadaye me na vijjati.
atk-s0508a1:3111_0: Chaḷabhiñño puna hutvā sūlato uṭṭhahitvā parānuddayāya ākāse ṭhatvā pāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0508a1:3111_4: tādisaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavanto kathaṃ tvaṃ vipassanaṃ anuyuñjituṃ asakkhī”ti puṭṭho,
atk-s0508a1:3111_8: evāhaṃ tādisaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavantopi asakkhiṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā visesaṃ adhigantu”nti dassento –
atk-s0508a1:3113_0: “Natthi koci bhavo nicco, saṅkhārā vāpi sassatā;
atk-s0508a1:3114_0: Uppajjanti ca te khandhā, cavanti aparāparaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3119_0: Tattha natthi koci bhavo niccoti kammabhavo upapattibhavo kāmabhavo rūpabhavo arūpabhavo saññībhavo asaññībhavo
atk-s0508a1:3119_2: tatthāpi hīno majjhimo ukkaṭṭho dīghāyuko sukhabahulo vomissasukhadukkhoti evaṃvibhāgo yokoci nicco dhuvo
atk-s0508a1:3119_3: thiro apalokiyadhammo natthi taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca samuppannattā.
atk-s0508a1:3119_5: tasmā saṅkhārā vāpi sassatā natthīti yojanā.
atk-s0508a1:3119_6: Paccayehi saṅkhatattā “saṅkhārā”ti laddhanāme hi pañcakkhandhe upādāya bhavasamaññāya saṅkhārāva hutvā
atk-s0508a1:3119_7: sambhūtā jarāmaraṇena ca vipariṇamantīti asassatā vipariṇāmadhammā.
atk-s0508a1:3119_11: Te bhavapariyāyena saṅkhārapariyāyena ca vuttā pañcakkhandhā yathāpaccayaṃ aparāparaṃ uppajjanti,
atk-s0508a1:3119_12: uppannā ca jarāya paripīḷitā hutvā cavanti paribhijjantīti attho.
atk-s0508a1:3119_14: saṅkhārā”ti ca laddhavohārā pañcakkhandhā udayabbayasabhāvāti dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:3119_15: Yasmā tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasantassa tayopi bhavā ādittaṃ viya saṅkhate ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ pageva
atk-s0508a1:3119_16: vipassanāpaññāya jānitvā aniccalakkhaṇehi diṭṭhā saṅkhārā dukkhānattā vibhūtatarā upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0508a1:3120_0: Yasmā tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasantassa tayopi bhavā ādittaṃ viya agāraṃ sappaṭibhayā upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0508a1:3120_2: Evaṃ pana sabbaso bhavehi vinivattiyamānassa kāmesu apekkhāya lesopi na sambhavatiyeva,
atk-s0508a1:3120_5: Mānusehi viya dibbehipi kāmehi nivattitacittosmīti attho.
atk-s0508a1:3120_6: Patto me āsavakkhayoti yasmā evaṃ suparimajjitasaṅkhāro bhavesu suparidiṭṭhādīnavo kāmesu ca anāsattamānaso
atk-s0508a1:3120_7: tasmā sūlamatthake nisinnenāpi me mayā patto adhigato āsavakkhayo nibbānaṃ arahattañcāti.
atk-s0508a1:3120_8: Aññehi ca sabrahmacārīhi appattamānasehi tadadhigamāya ussāho karaṇīyoti bhikkhūnaṃ ovādamadāsi.
atk-s0508a1:3123_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle sīhayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā pabbataguhāyaṃ viharati.
atk-s0508a1:3123_3: Bhagavā tassa anuggahaṃ kātuṃ gocarāya pakkantakāle sayanaguhaṃ pavisitvā nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0508a1:3123_4: Sīho gocaraṃ gahetvā nivatto guhādvāre bhagavantaṃ disvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho jalajathalajapupphehi pūjaṃ katvā
atk-s0508a1:3123_5: cittaṃ pasādento bhagavato ārakkhatthāya araññe vāḷamige apanetuṃ tīsu velāsu sīhanādaṃ nadanto buddhagatāya
atk-s0508a1:3123_9: Bhagavā sattāhaccayena nirodhā vuṭṭhahitvā “vattissati imassa ettako upanissayo”ti tassa passantasseva ākāsaṃ pakkhanditvā vihārameva gato.
atk-s0508a1:3123_10: Sīho pālileyyakahatthī viya buddhaviyogadukkhaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto kālaṃ katvā haṃsavatīnagare mahābhogakule
atk-s0508a1:3123_11: nibbattitvā vayappatto nagaravāsīhi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā
atk-s0508a1:3123_12: yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle kosambiyaṃ rañño utenassa
atk-s0508a1:3123_13: purohitaputto hutvā nibbatti bhāradvājo nāma nāmena.
atk-s0508a1:3123_14: So vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvā pañca māṇavakasatāni mante vācento mahagghasabhāvena ananurūpācārattā
atk-s0508a1:3123_15: tehi pariccajjanto rājagahaṃ gantvā bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca lābhasakkāraṃ disvā sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:3123_16: bhojane amattaññū hutvā vicaranto satthārā upāyena mattaññutāya patiṭṭhāpito vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a1:3128_0: “Ekatiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ tadā;
atk-s0508a1:3131_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā “bhagavato sammukhā yaṃ sāvakehi pattabbaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:3131_2: bhikkhusaṅghe ca “yassa magge vā phale vā kaṅkhā atthi,
atk-s0508a1:3131_7: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīhanādikānaṃ yadidaṃ piṇḍolabhāradvājo”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a1:3131_8: So ekadivasaṃ attano santikaṃ upagataṃ gihikāle sahāyabhūtaṃ macchariṃ micchādiṭṭhibrāhmaṇaṃ anukampamāno
atk-s0508a1:3131_9: tassa dānakathaṃ kathetvā tena ca “ayaṃ mama dhanaṃ vināsetukāmo”ti bhakuṭiṃ katvāpi “tuyhaṃ ekabhattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3131_11: “taṃ saṅghassa dehi mā mayha”nti saṅghassa pariṇāmesi.
atk-s0508a1:3131_12: Puna brāhmaṇena “ayaṃ maṃ bahūnaṃ dāpetukāmo”ti appaccaye pakāsite dutiyadivasaṃ dhammasenāpatinā saṅghagatāya
atk-s0508a1:3131_15: āhārassa pana mayā sabbaso pariññātabhāvaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0508a1:3134_0: Āhāraṭṭhitiko samussayo, iti disvāna carāmi esanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3136_0: “Paṅkoti hi naṃ avedayuṃ, yāyaṃ vandanapūjanā kulesu;
atk-s0508a1:3137_0: Sukhumaṃ sallaṃ durubbahaṃ, sakkāro kāpurisena dujjaho”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:3139_0: Tattha nayidaṃ anayena jīvitanti idaṃ mama jīvitaṃ anayena añāyena veḷudānapupphadānādianesanāya na hoti jīvitanikantiyā abhāvato.
atk-s0508a1:3139_1: Nāhāro hadayassa santikoti āhāro ca āhariyamāno maggaphalañāṇaṃ viya hadayassa cittassa santikaro na hoti,
atk-s0508a1:3139_2: kevalaṃ pana sajjukaṃ khudāpaṭighātamattaṃ karotīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:3139_3: Atha vā nāhāro hadayassa santikoti āhāro rasataṇhāvatthu me hadayassa santiko āsatto na hoti rasataṇhāya eva abhāvato.
atk-s0508a1:3139_6: tassa āhāro hadayassa santike nāma abhiṇhaṃ manasikātabbato.
atk-s0508a1:3139_11: Yadi hi jīvitanikanti āhārarasataṇhā ca natthi,
atk-s0508a1:3139_12: atha kasmā piṇḍāya carasīti anuyogaṃ manasi katvā āha “āhāraṭṭhitiko samussayo,
atk-s0508a1:3139_14: Āhāro bhojanaṃ ṭhiti ṭhānaṃ paccayo etassāti āhāraṭṭhitiko.
atk-s0508a1:3139_15: “Āhārapaṭibaddhavuttiko samussayo kāyo”iti disvāna evaṃ ñatvā imamatthaṃ buddhiyaṃ ṭhapetvā carāmi esanaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:3140_0: Paccayanimittaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamanto tattha vandanapūjanāhi lābhasakkārehi ca bajjhatīti evaṃ mādisesu
atk-s0508a1:3140_3: yā ayaṃ paccayanimittaṃ upagatānaṃ pabbajitānaṃ kulesu gehavāsīsu pavattissati guṇasambhāvanā pūjanā ca,
atk-s0508a1:3140_4: yasmā taṃ abhāvitattānaṃ osīdāpanaṭṭhena malīnabhāvakaraṇena ca paṅko kaddamoti buddhādayo avedayuṃ abbhaññāsuṃ pavedesuṃ vā,
atk-s0508a1:3140_5: tasmā sā sappurisānaṃ bandhāya na hoti sakkārāsāya pageva pahīnattā.
atk-s0508a1:3140_6: Asappurisassa pana sakkārāsā duviññeyyasabhāvatāya pīḷājananato anto tudanato uddharituṃ asakkuṇeyyato ca sukhumaṃ sallaṃ durubbahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3140_7: Tato eva tena sakkāro kāpurisena dujjaho durubbaheyyo tassa pahānapaṭipattiyā appaṭipajjanato,
atk-s0508a1:3140_9: Taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo there abhippasanno ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:3143_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekatiṃse kappe kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:3143_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ kenacideva karaṇīyena araññaṃ gato tattha nāradaṃ nāma paccekasambuddhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3143_4: rukkhamūle vasantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso naḷehi sālaṃ katvā tiṇehi chādetvā adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:3143_6: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:3143_8: So vayappatto yobbanamanuppatto indriyavasiko hutvā vicaranto kalyāṇamittasaṃsaggena bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a1:3143_9: dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:3145_0: Sayambhū nārado nāma, rukkhamūle vasī tadā.
atk-s0508a1:3161_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā puthujjanakāle attano cittassa rūpādiārammaṇesu yathākāmappavattiyā,
atk-s0508a1:3161_1: idāni ariyamaggena niggahitabhāvassa ca vibhāvanena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:3166_0: “Tiṭṭha makkaṭa mā dhāvi, na hi te taṃ yathā pure;
atk-s0508a1:3167_0: Niggahītosi paññāya, neva dūraṃ gamissasī”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:3168_0: Tattha ghaṭṭayantoti attano lolabhāvena rukkhassa aññaṃ sākhaṃ muñcitvā aññassa gahaṇena anekavāraṃ tattha
atk-s0508a1:3168_1: rukkhaṃ cālento phalūpabhogamakkaṭo viya tena tena cakkhādidvārena rūpādiārammaṇesu aññaṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3168_2: gaṇhanto cittasantānassa samādānavasena niccalaṃ ṭhātuṃ appadānena abhikkhaṇaṃ ghaṭṭayanto cālento tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0508a1:3168_9: ito paṭṭhāya te dhāvituṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0508a1:3168_10: tasmā na hi te taṃ yathā pūre yasmā taṃ attabhāvagehaṃ pubbe viya na te sevitaṃ pihitadvārabhāvato,
atk-s0508a1:3168_11: kiñca niggahītosi paññāya sayañca idāni maggapaññāya kilesābhisaṅkhārasaṅkhātānaṃ pādānaṃ chedanena accantikaṃ niggahaṃ pattosi,
atk-s0508a1:3168_12: tasmā neva dūraṃ gamissasi ito attabhāvato dūraṃ dutiyādiattabhāvaṃ neva gamissasi yāvacarimakacittaṃ eva te gamananti dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:3171_0: Tiṇṇaṃ me tālapattānantiādikā āyasmato gaṅgātīriyattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:3171_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto sāsane abhippasanno hutvā bhikkhusaṅghassa pānīyamadāsi.
atk-s0508a1:3171_3: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:3171_4: sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa gahapatissa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:3171_6: So vayappatto gharāvāsaṃ vasanto agamanīyaṭṭhānabhāvaṃ ajānitvā vītikkamaṃ katvā puna agamanīyaṭṭhānabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3171_7: ñatvā saṃvegajāto pabbajitvā taṃ kammaṃ jigucchitvā lūkhapaṭipattiṃ anutiṭṭhanto paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ chavasittasadisaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3171_8: mattikāpattañca gahetvā gaṅgātīre tīhi tālapattehi kuṭikaṃ katvā vihāsi,
atk-s0508a1:3171_10: So “arahattaṃ appatvā na kenaci sallapissāmī”ti cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāya paṭhamaṃ saṃvaccharaṃ tuṇhībhūto vacībhedaṃ akarontova vihāsi.
atk-s0508a1:3171_11: Dutiye saṃvacchare gocaragāme aññatarāya itthiyā “mūgo nu kho no”ti vīmaṃsitukāmāya patte khīraṃ āsiñcantiyā hatthavihāre katepi okirite, “alaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:3171_13: Tatiye pana saṃvacchare antaravasseva ghaṭayanto vāyamanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0508a1:3179_0: Arahā pana hutvā attano pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyā vibhāvanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:3185_0: Tatiye antaravassamhi, tamokhandho padālito”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:3186_1: gaṅgātīre kuṭī katāti tālarukkhato pahitehi tīhi tālapaṇṇehi mayhaṃ vassanapariharaṇatthaṃ gaṅgāya nadiyā tīre kuṭikā katā.
atk-s0508a1:3189_2: Chavasittova me pattoti mayhaṃ patto chavasittasadiso,
atk-s0508a1:3189_4: Paṃsukūlañca cīvaranti cīvarañca me antaramaggasusānādīsu chaḍḍitanantakehi kataṃ paṃsukūlaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3190_0: Dvinnaṃ antaravassānanti dvīsu antaravassesu pabbajitato arahattamappattasaṃvaccharesu.
atk-s0508a1:3193_0: Api ce hoti tevijjotiādikā āyasmato ajinattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:3193_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto buddhasuññe loke kulagehe nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:3193_3: viññutaṃ patto kenacideva karaṇīyena araññaṃ gato tattha sucintitaṃ nāma paccekasambuddhaṃ ābādhena pīḷitaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3193_4: nisinnaṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā bhesajjatthāya pasannamānaso ghatamaṇḍaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:3193_5: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:3193_6: sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa daliddabrāhmaṇassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0508a1:3193_9: So bhogasaṃvattaniyassa kammassa akatattā daliddakule nibbatto vayappattopi appannapānabhojano hutvā
atk-s0508a1:3193_10: vicaranto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto
atk-s0508a1:3197_0: Katattā ācitattā ca, gaṅgā bhāgīrathī ayaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3209_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvāpi purimakammanissandena appalābhī appaññātova ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:3209_2: Kammaphaleneva ca naṃ puthujjanā bhikkhū sāmaṇerā ca “appaññāto”ti avamaññanti.
atk-s0508a1:3214_0: “Yo ca kho annapānassa, lābhī hotīdha puggalo;
atk-s0508a1:3215_0: Pāpadhammopi ce hoti, so nesaṃ hoti sakkato”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:3217_7: dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ āsavakkhayañāṇanti imāsaṃ tissannaṃ vijjānaṃ adhigatattā tevijjo tato
atk-s0508a1:3217_8: eva sabbaso kāmāsavādīnaṃ parikkhīṇattā anāsavo āyatiṃ punabbhavassa aggahaṇato maraṇābhāvena maccuhāyī
atk-s0508a1:3217_10: evaṃ santepi appaññātoti naṃ bālā avajānanti yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti,
atk-s0508a1:3217_11: taṃ sadatthaṃ anupāpuṇitvā ṭhitampi naṃ uttamaṃ purisaṃ “dhutavādo bahussuto dhammakathiko”ti uppannalābhassa
atk-s0508a1:3217_12: abhāvato “na paññāto na pākaṭo”ti bālā dummedhapuggalā avajānanti, kasmā?
atk-s0508a1:3217_13: Ajānatā ajānanakāraṇā guṇānaṃ ajānanameva tattha kāraṇanti dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:3218_0: Yathā ca guṇānaṃ ajānanato bālā lābhagarutāya sambhāvanīyampi avajānanti,
atk-s0508a1:3218_1: evaṃ guṇānaṃ ajānanato lābhagarutāya evaṃ avajānitabbampi sambhāventīti dassento dutiyaṃ gāthaṃ āha.
atk-s0508a1:3218_4: tena yathāvuttapuggalato imassa puggalassa vuccamānaṃyeva visesaṃ janeti.
atk-s0508a1:3218_9: Jarāmaraṇehi tassa tassa sattāvāsassa pūraṇato galanato ca puggalo.
atk-s0508a1:3218_12: yo pana puggalo cīvarādipaccayamattasseva lābhī hoti,
atk-s0508a1:3218_14: so pāpicchatāya dussīlabhāvena hīnadhammopi samāno idha imasmiṃ loke bālānaṃ lābhagarutāya sakkato garukato hotīti.
atk-s0508a1:3221_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:3221_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ piṇḍāya gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso madhuraṃ āmodaphalaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:3221_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bārāṇasiyaṃ khattiyakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:3221_5: meḷajinoti laddhanāmo vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato paṇḍito byatto disāsu pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:3221_6: So bhagavati bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane viharante vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:3221_7: pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā tadaheva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:3229_1: kiṃ tayā uttarimanussadhammo adhigato”ti puṭṭho sīhanādaṃ nadanto –
atk-s0508a1:3235_0: Magge paṭipadāyaṃ vā, kaṅkhā mayhaṃ na vijjatī”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:3236_10: yato pabhuti ahaṃ satthuno dhammaṃ desentassa catusaccadhammaṃ assosiṃ sotadvārānusārena upadhāresiṃ upalabhiṃ,
atk-s0508a1:3236_11: tato paṭṭhāya anavasesasaṅkhatāsaṅkhatasammutidhammānaṃ sayambhūñāṇena jānanato sabbaññū anāvaraṇadassāvimhi,
atk-s0508a1:3236_12: pañcannampi mārānaṃ abhibhavanato tehi aparājitattā sadevake loke appaṭihatadhammacakkattā ca aparājite,
atk-s0508a1:3236_15: aññehi duddamānaṃ purisadammānaṃ saraṇato accantikena damathena damanato sārathīnaṃ pavarabhūte uttame sammāsambuddhe,
atk-s0508a1:3236_16: “buddho nu kho no nu kho”ti kaṅkhaṃ nābhijānāmi aparappaccayabhāvato.
atk-s0508a1:3236_17: Tathārūpe desite ariyamagge tadupādāyabhūtāya ca sīlādipaṭipadāya “niyyāniko nu kho na nu kho”ti kaṅkhā vicikicchā na vijjati natthīti.
atk-s0508a1:3236_18: Ettha ca ariyadhamme saṃsayābhāvakathanena ariyasaṅghepi saṃsayābhāvo kathitoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ tattha patiṭṭhitassa anaññathābhāvatoti.
atk-s0508a1:3239_0: Yathā agāraṃ ducchannantiādikā āyasmato rādhattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:3239_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto vihāraṃ gantvā
atk-s0508a1:3239_3: satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno satthārā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭibhāneyyakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a1:3239_4: ṭhapiyamānaṃ disvā sayaṃ taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā mahādānaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0508a1:3239_6: So evaṃ katapaṇidhāno tato cuto tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:3239_7: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ piṇḍāya gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso madhurāni ambaphalānī adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:3239_8: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:3239_9: kāle rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā rādhoti laddhanāmo vayappatto hutvā gharāvāsaṃ vasanto mahallakakāle
atk-s0508a1:3239_12: pabbajissāmī”ti vihāraṃ gantvā there bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā tehi “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo jiṇṇo
atk-s0508a1:3239_13: na sakkoti vattapaṭivattaṃ pūretu”nti paṭikkhitto satthu santikaṃ gantvā attano ajjhāsayaṃ pavedetvā
atk-s0508a1:3239_14: satthārā upanissayasampattiṃ oloketvā āṇattena dhammasenāpatinā pabbājito vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a1:3245_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthu santikāvacaro hutvā vicaranto satthu dhammadesanāpaṭibhānassa paccayabhūtānaṃ paṭibhānajānanakānaṃ aggo jāto.
atk-s0508a1:3245_1: Therassa hi diṭṭhisamudācārañca āgamma dasabalassa navanavā dhammadesanā paṭibhāti.
atk-s0508a1:3245_5: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭibhāneyyakānaṃ yadidaṃ rādho”ti.
atk-s0508a1:3245_6: So ekadivasaṃ “ime sattā abhāvanāya rāgena abhibhuyyanti,
atk-s0508a1:3245_7: bhāvanāya sati taṃ natthī”ti bhāvanaṃ thomento “yathā agāra”ntiādinā gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0508a1:3246_4: Abhāvitanti taṃ agāraṃ vuṭṭhi viya bhāvanāya rahitattā abhāvitaṃ cittaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3246_5: Rāgo samativijjhatīti na kevalaṃ rāgova dosamohamānādayopi sabbakilesā tathārūpaṃ cittaṃ ativijjhantiyeva.
atk-s0508a1:3246_7: evarūpaṃ cittaṃ succhannaṃ gehaṃ vuṭṭhi viya rāgādayo kilesā ativijjhituṃ na sakkontīti.
atk-s0508a1:3249_0: Khīṇā hi mayhaṃ jātītiādikā āyasmato surādhattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:3249_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:3249_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso mātuluṅgaphalaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:3249_4: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:3249_5: anantaraṃ vuttassa rādhattherassa kaniṭṭho hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:3249_7: So jeṭṭhabhātari rādhe pabbajite sayampi pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:3254_0: “Ekatiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ tadā;
atk-s0508a1:3257_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvadassanatthaṃ aññaṃ byākaronto “khīṇā hī mayha”ntiādinā gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0508a1:3258_3: Vusitaṃ jinasāsananti jinassa sammāsambuddhassa sāsanaṃ maggabrahmacariyaṃ vuṭṭhaṃ parivuṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3258_4: Pahīno jālasaṅkhātoti sattasantānassa ottharaṇato nissarituṃ appadānato ca “jālasaṅkhāto”ti ca laddhanāmā diṭṭhi avijjā ca pahīnā maggena samucchinnā.
atk-s0508a1:3258_5: Bhavanetti samūhatāti kāmabhavādikassa bhavassa nayanato pavattanato bhavanettisaññitā taṇhā samugghāṭitā.
atk-s0508a1:3258_6: Yassatthāya pabbajitoti yassa atthāya yadatthaṃ ahaṃ agārasmā gehato anagāriyaṃ pabbajjaṃ pabbajito upagato.
atk-s0508a1:3258_7: So sabbesaṃ orambhāgiyuddhambhāgiyappabhedānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ bandhanānaṃ khayabhūto attho nibbānasaṅkhāto
atk-s0508a1:3258_8: paramattho arahattasaṅkhāto sadattho ca mayā anuppatto adhigatoti attho.
atk-s0508a1:3261_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0508a1:3261_3: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso āmodaphalamadāsi.
atk-s0508a1:3261_4: Tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:3261_5: rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā gotamoti laddhanāmo sattavassikakāle upanayanaṃ katvā ratanabhikkhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3261_6: caritvā sahassaṃ labhitvā taṃ tādise ṭhāne ṭhapetvā vataṃ caranto soḷasasattarasavassuddesikakāle akalyāṇamittehi
atk-s0508a1:3261_7: kāmesu parinīyamāno ekissā rūpūpajīviniyā taṃ sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ datvā brahmacariyavināsaṃ patvā tāya cassa
atk-s0508a1:3261_8: brahmacārirūpaṃ disvā virattākāre dassite ekarattivāseneva nibbinnarūpo attano brahmacariyanivāsaṃ dhanajāniñca
atk-s0508a1:3261_10: Satthā tassa hetusampattiṃ cittācārañca ñatvā tassa āsannaṭṭhāne attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0508a1:3261_13: So dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajanto khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:3267_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā jhānasukhena phalasukhena vītināmentaṃ eko gihisahāyo upagantvā, “āvuso,
atk-s0508a1:3267_1: tayā ratanabhikkhāya laddhaṃ pabbajanto kiṃ akāsī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0508a1:3267_2: Taṃ sutvā thero “idaṃ nāma kata”nti anācikkhitvā mātugāme dosaṃ pakāsetvā attano vītarāgabhāvena aññaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3268_2: ye itthīsu na bajjhareti ye itthīsu visayabhūtāsu nimittabhūtāsu vā rāgabandhanena na bajjhanti,
atk-s0508a1:3268_3: te munayo tapassino saṃyatindriyā sukhaṃ supanti sukhaṃ viharanti,
atk-s0508a1:3268_6: Sadā ve rakkhitabbāsūti ekaṃsena sabbakālaṃ rakkhitabbāsu.
atk-s0508a1:3268_7: Itthiyo hi sattabhūmike nippurise pāsāde uparibhūmiyaṃ vasāpetvāpi,
atk-s0508a1:3268_9: tasmā tā kiṭṭhādigāviyo viya sabbakālaṃ rakkhaṇīyā honti.
atk-s0508a1:3268_10: Bahucittatāya vā sāmikena vatthālaṅkārānuppadānādinā cittaññathattato sabbakālaṃ rakkhitabbā.
atk-s0508a1:3268_11: Sarīrasabhāvaṃ vā mālāgandhādīhi paṭicchādanavasena rakkhitabbacittatāya rakkhitabbāti.
atk-s0508a1:3268_12: Yāsu saccaṃ sudullabhanti yāsu saccavacanaṃ laddhuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0508a1:3268_18: Tasmā evarūpā itthiyo vajjetvā ṭhitā munayo sukhitā vatāti dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:3269_1: Idāni yassa appahīnattā evarūpāsu itthīsupi bajjhanti,
atk-s0508a1:3269_2: tassa kāmassa attano suppahīnataṃ accantaniṭṭhitatañca dassento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a1:3269_3: Vadhaṃ carimha te kāmāti ambho kāma,
atk-s0508a1:3269_7: Anaṇā dāni te mayanti idāni aggamaggapattito paṭṭhāya iṇabhāvakarāya pahīnattā kāma te anaṇā mayaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:3269_9: Avītarāgo hi rāgassa vase vattanato tassa iṇaṃ dhārento viya hoti,
atk-s0508a1:3269_10: vītarāgo pana taṃ atikkamitvā paramena cittissariyena samannāgato.
atk-s0508a1:3269_12: yattha gantvā na socati yasmiṃ nibbāne gamanahetu sabbaso sokahetūnaṃ abhāvato na socati,
atk-s0508a1:3269_13: taṃ anupādisesanibbānameva idāni gacchāma anupāpuṇāmāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:3272_0: Pubbe hanati attānanti āyasmato vasabhattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:3272_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto buddhasuññe loke brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a1:3272_3: nibbattitvā vayappatto brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gantvā nekkhammajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṃ pahāya
atk-s0508a1:3272_4: tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā cuddasasahassatāpasaparivāro himavantassa avidūre samagge nāma pabbate assamaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3272_5: kāretvā vasanto jhānābhiññāyo nibbattetvā tāpasānaṃ ovādānusāsaniyo dento ekadivasaṃ evaṃ cintesi –
atk-s0508a1:3272_6: “ahaṃ kho dāni imehi tāpasehi sakkato garukato pūjito viharāmi,
atk-s0508a1:3272_8: dukkho kho panāyaṃ loke yadidaṃ agaruvāso”ti.
atk-s0508a1:3272_9: Evaṃ pana cintetvā purimabuddhesu katādhikāratāya purimabuddhānaṃ cetiye attanā kataṃ pūjāsakkāraṃ anussaritvā
atk-s0508a1:3272_10: “yaṃnūnāhaṃ purimabuddhe uddissa pulinacetiyaṃ katvā pūjaṃ kareyya”nti haṭṭhatuṭṭho iddhiyā pulinathūpaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3272_11: suvaṇṇamayaṃ māpetvā suvaṇṇamayādīhi tisahassamattehi pupphehi devasikaṃ pūjaṃ karonto yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni
atk-s0508a1:3272_12: katvā aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke nibbatto.
atk-s0508a1:3272_13: Tatthapi yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto tāvatiṃse nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:3272_14: buddhuppāde vesāliyaṃ licchavirājakule nibbattitvā vasabhoti laddhanāmo vayappatto bhagavato vesāligamane
atk-s0508a1:3272_15: buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:3278_0: Sabbo jano maṃ pūjeti, nāhaṃ pūjemi kiñcanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3279_0: “Na me ovādako atthi, vattā koci na vijjati;
atk-s0508a1:3282_0: So me ācariyo natthi, vanavāso niratthako.
atk-s0508a1:3290_0: Tesaṃ etādiso thūpo, taṃ nimittaṃ karomahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3298_0: Kilese saṃvaseyyāsi, na yuttaṃ tava mārisa.
atk-s0508a1:3299_0: “Saha āvajjite thūpe, gāravaṃ hoti me tadā;
atk-s0508a1:3310_0: Gatte sedā na muccanti, suppabhāso bhavāmahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3312_0: Thūpaṃ katvāna pulinaṃ, pattomhi acalaṃ padaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3314_0: Natthi khettaṃ akhettaṃ vā, paṭipattīva sādhakā.
atk-s0508a1:3319_0: “Tatheva me kataṃ kammaṃ, parittaṃ thokakañca yaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:3323_0: “Saddhā mātā pitā mayhaṃ, buddhassa saraṇaṃ gatā;
atk-s0508a1:3340_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā dāyakānuggahaṃ karonto tehi upanīte paccaye na paṭikkhipati,
atk-s0508a1:3340_2: Taṃ puthujjanā “ayaṃ kāyadaḷhibahulo arakkhitacitto”ti maññamānā avamaññanti.
atk-s0508a1:3340_4: Tassa pana avidūre aññataro kuhakabhikkhu pāpiccho samāno appiccho viya santuṭṭho viya attānaṃ dassento lokaṃ vañcento viharati.
atk-s0508a1:3340_6: Athassa sakko devānamindo taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0508a1:3342_0: “Pubbe hanati attānaṃ, pacchā hanati so pare;
atk-s0508a1:3346_0: Yasmiṃ pāpāni kammāni, sa ve kaṇho sujampatī”ti. – gāthādvayamāha;
atk-s0508a1:3347_0: Tattha pubbe hanati attānanti kuhakapuggalo attano kuhakavuttiyā lokaṃ vañcento pāpicchatādīhi pāpadhammehi paṭhamameva attānaṃ hanati,
atk-s0508a1:3347_2: Pacchā hanati so pareti so kuhako paṭhamaṃ tāva vuttanayena attānaṃ hantvā pacchā pare yehi “ayaṃ bhikkhu pesalo ariyo”ti vā sambhāventehi kārā katā,
atk-s0508a1:3347_3: te hanati tesaṃ kārāni attani katāni amahapphalāni katvā paccayavināsanena vināseti.
atk-s0508a1:3347_4: Satipi kuhakassa ubhayahanane attahanane pana ayaṃ visesoti dassento āha suhataṃ hanti attānanti.
atk-s0508a1:3347_5: So kuhako attānaṃ hananto suhataṃ katvā hanti vināseti,
atk-s0508a1:3347_10: Yathā tena vītaṃsasakuṇena aññe sakuṇe vañcetvā hananto attānaṃ idha lokepi hanati viññugarahasāvajjasabhāvādinā,
atk-s0508a1:3347_12: na pana te sakuṇe pacchā hantuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0508a1:3347_13: evaṃ kuhakopi kohaññena lokaṃ vañcetvā idha lokepi attānaṃ hanati vippaṭisāraviññugarahādīhi,
atk-s0508a1:3347_15: na pana te paccayadāyake apāyadukkhaṃ pāpeti.
atk-s0508a1:3347_16: Apica kuhako dakkhiṇāya amahapphalabhāvakaraṇeneva dāyakaṃ hanatīti vutto,
atk-s0508a1:3347_19: “dussīlassa manussabhūtassa dānaṃ datvā sahassaguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā”ti.
atk-s0508a1:3348_0: Evaṃ bāhiraparimajjanamatte ṭhitā puggalā suddhā nāma na honti,
atk-s0508a1:3348_1: abbhantarasuddhiyā eva pana suddhā hontīti dassento “na brāhmaṇo”ti dutiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a1:3348_10: Taṃ sutvā sakko kuhakabhikkhuṃ tajjetvā “dhamme vattāhī”ti ovaditvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0508a1:3353_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kumbhakārakule
atk-s0508a1:3353_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto kumbhakārakammena jīvanto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso ekaṃ mattikāpattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3353_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe nālakagāme rūpasāriyā
atk-s0508a1:3353_6: brāhmaṇiyā putto sāriputtattherassa kaniṭṭhabhātā hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:3353_8: So vayappatto dhammasenāpatiṃ anupabbajitvā taṃ nissāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ghaṭento vāyamanto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:3359_0: Rūpimaye ca sovaṇṇe, taṭṭike ca maṇīmaye.
atk-s0508a1:3366_0: “Yāvatā khettā vijjanti, saṅghāpi ca gaṇāpi ca;
atk-s0508a1:3373_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā attanā paṭiladdhasampattiyā kāraṇabhūtaṃ garūpanissayaṃ vivekavāsañca kittento –
atk-s0508a1:3376_0: Paññāya atthaṃ jānāti, ñāto attho sukhāvaho.
atk-s0508a1:3379_0: Sace ratiṃ nādhigaccheyya tattha, saṅghe vase rakkhitatto satīmā”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:3381_2: Diṭṭhadhammikādibhedañhi atthaṃ sotumicchantena kalyāṇamitte upasaṅkamitvā vattakaraṇena payirupāsitvā
atk-s0508a1:3381_3: yadā te payirupāsanāya ārādhitacittā kañci upanisīditukāmā honti,
atk-s0508a1:3381_4: atha ne upanisīditvā adhigatāya sotumicchāya ohitasotena sotabbaṃ hotīti garusannivāsopi sussūsāhetutāya “sussūsā”ti vuccati.
atk-s0508a1:3381_5: Sā panāyaṃ sussūsā saccapaṭiccasamuppādādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ sutaṃ taṃsamaṅgino puggalassa vaḍḍheti brūhetīti sutavaddhanī,
atk-s0508a1:3381_7: Sutaṃ paññāya vaddhananti yaṃ taṃ “sutadharo sutasannicayo”ti “idhekaccassa bahukaṃ sutaṃ hoti suttaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3381_8: geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇa”nti ca evamādinā nayena vuttaṃ bāhusaccaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:3381_9: taṃ akusalappahānakusalādhigamanahetubhūtaṃ paññaṃ vaddhetīti sutaṃ paññāya vaddhanaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:3383_0: Paññāya atthaṃ jānātīti bahussuto sutamayañāṇe ṭhito taṃ paṭipattiṃ paṭipajjanto sutānusārena atthūpaparikkhāya
atk-s0508a1:3383_1: dhammanijjhānena bhāvanāya ca lokiyalokuttarabhedaṃ diṭṭhadhammādivibhāgaṃ dukkhādivibhāgañca atthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3385_6: pahitatto samāno kāyena ceva paramasaccaṃ sacchikaroti,
atk-s0508a1:3385_7: paññāya ca naṃ ativijjha passatī”ti ca.
atk-s0508a1:3386_0: Ñāto attho sukhāvahoti yathāvutto diṭṭhadhammikādiattho ceva dukkhādiattho ca yāthāvato ñāto adhigato
atk-s0508a1:3387_0: Ṭhitāya bhāvanāpaññāya sutamatteneva na sijjhatīti tassā paṭipajjanavidhiṃ dassento “sevetha…pe…vippamokkha”nti āha.
atk-s0508a1:3387_2: Tena saṃyojanappahānassa ca vakkhamānattā vivekārahasseva vivekavāsoti sīlasaṃvarādayo idha avuttasiddhā veditabbā.
atk-s0508a1:3387_3: Careyya saṃyojanavippamokkhanti yathā saṃyojanehi cittaṃ vippamuccati,
atk-s0508a1:3387_4: tathā vipassanābhāvanaṃ maggabhāvanañca careyya paṭipajjeyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:3387_5: Sace ratiṃ nādhigaccheyya tatthāti tesu pantasenāsanesu yathāladdhesu adhikusaladhammesu ca ratiṃ pubbenāparaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3387_7: saṅghe bhikkhusamūhe rakkhitatto kammaṭṭhānaparigaṇhanato rakkhitacitto chasu dvāresu satiārakkhāya upaṭṭhapanena satimā vaseyya vihareyya,
atk-s0508a1:3387_8: evaṃ viharantassa ca api nāma saṃyojanavippamokkho bhaveyyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:3390_0: Ye kho teti āyasmato jotidāsattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:3390_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:3390_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ piṇḍāya gacchantaṃ disvā pasannacitto kāsumārikaphalaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:3390_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde pādiyatthajanapade vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:3390_6: So viññutaṃ patvā gharamāvasanto ekadivasaṃ mahākassapattheraṃ attano gāme piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannacitto
atk-s0508a1:3390_7: bhojetvā therassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā attano gāmasamīpe pabbate mahantaṃ vihāraṃ kāretvā theraṃ tattha
atk-s0508a1:3390_8: vāsetvā catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahanto therassa dhammadesanāya paṭiladdhasaṃvego pabbajitvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a1:3395_0: “Ekatiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ tadā;
atk-s0508a1:3398_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā visesato vinayapiṭake sukusalabhāvaṃ patvā dasavassiko
atk-s0508a1:3398_1: parisupaṭṭhāko ca hutvā bahūhi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ bhagavantaṃ vandituṃ sāvatthiṃ gacchanto antarāmagge
atk-s0508a1:3398_2: addhānaparissamavinodanatthaṃ titthiyānaṃ ārāmaṃ pavisitvā ekamantaṃ nisinno ekaṃ pañcatapaṃ tapantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3399_0: “Kopo ca issā paraheṭhanā ca, māno ca sārambhamado pamādo;
atk-s0508a1:3400_0: Taṇhā avijjā bhavasaṅgatī ca, te tappanīyā na hi rūpakhandho”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:3401_1: Taṃ sutvā so brāhmaṇo tasmiṃ titthiyārāme sabbe aññatitthiyā ca therassa santike pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:3401_2: Thero tehi saddhiṃ sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā katipāhaṃ tattha vasitvā attano jātibhūmiṃyeva
atk-s0508a1:3401_3: gato dassanatthaṃ upagatesu ñātakesu nānāladdhike yaññasuddhike ovadanto –
atk-s0508a1:3403_0: “Ye kho te veṭhamissena, nānattena ca kammunā;
atk-s0508a1:3405_0: Tepi tattheva kīranti, na hi kammaṃ panassati.
atk-s0508a1:3407_0: “Yaṃ karoti naro kammaṃ, kalyāṇaṃ yadi pāpakaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:3408_0: Tassa tasseva dāyādo, yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ pakubbatī”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:3409_7: Nānattena ca kammunāti hananaghātanahatthapādādicchedanena khuddakaseḷadānādinā ca nānāvidhena parūpaghātakammena.
atk-s0508a1:3409_14: Tepi tattheva kīrantīti te vuttappakārā puggalā yāhi kammakāraṇāhi aññe bādhiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:3409_15: Tattheva tāsuyeva kāraṇāsu sayampi kīranti pakkhipīyanti,
atk-s0508a1:3409_21: Na hi kammaṃ panassati kammañhi ekantaṃ upacitaṃ vipākaṃ adatvā na vigacchati,
atk-s0508a1:3410_0: Idāni “na hi kammaṃ panassatī”ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vibhajitvā sattānaṃ kammassakataṃ vibhāvetuṃ “yaṃ karotī”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:3410_2: yadi vā pāpakaṃ akusalaṃ satto karoti,
atk-s0508a1:3410_3: karonto ca tattha yaṃ kammaṃ yathā phaladānasamatthaṃ hoti,
atk-s0508a1:3410_5: Tassa tasseva dāyādoti tassa tasseva kammaphalassa gaṇhanato tena tena kammena dātabbavipākassa bhāgī hotīti attho.
atk-s0508a1:3410_9: Imā gāthā sutvā therassa ñātakā kammassakatāyaṃ patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
atk-s0508a1:3413_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto paresaṃ bhatako
atk-s0508a1:3413_3: hutvā jīvanto ekadivasaṃ sujātassa nāma satthusāvakassa paṃsukūlaṃ pariyesantassa upaḍḍhadussaṃ pariccaji.
atk-s0508a1:3413_4: So tena puññakammena tāvatiṃsesu nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:3413_5: kosalarañño gāmabhojakassa coravosāsakassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:3413_7: So vayappatto pitu accayena raññā tasmiṃyeva gāmabhojakaṭṭhāne ṭhapito jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3413_8: disvā paṭiladdhasaddho attano kaniṭṭhassa taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ dāpetvā rājānaṃ āpucchitvā pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3429_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano kaniṭṭhabhātaraṃ tato kammato nivattetukāmo tasmiṃyeva kamme abhirataṃ disvā taṃ codento –
atk-s0508a1:3434_0: “Atha pāpāni kammāni, karaṃ bālo na bujjhati;
atk-s0508a1:3435_0: Pacchāssa kaṭukaṃ hoti, vipāko hissa pāpako”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:3437_6: jāyasi ca jiyyasi ca miyyasi ca cavasi ca upapajjasi cā”ti.
atk-s0508a1:3437_7: Āyu khīyati maccānanti maritabbasabhāvattā maccāti laddhanāmānaṃ imesaṃ sattānaṃ āyu “yo ciraṃ jīvati,
atk-s0508a1:3437_8: so vassasataṃ appaṃ vā bhiyyo”ti evaṃ paricchinnakālaparamāyu khīyati khayañca sambhedañca gacchati,
atk-s0508a1:3437_10: Kunnadīnaṃva odakaṃ yathā nāma kunnadīnaṃ pabbateyyānaṃ khuddakanadīnaṃ udakaṃ ciraṃ na tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0508a1:3437_13: evaṃ sattānaṃ āyu lahutaraṃ khīyati khayaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0508a1:3438_1: karaṃ bālo na bujjhatīti evaṃ saṃsāre aniccepi samāne bālo lobhavasena vā kodhavasena vā pāpāni kammāni karoti,
atk-s0508a1:3438_3: pāpaṃ karonto ca “pāpaṃ karomī”ti abujjhanako nāma natthi,
atk-s0508a1:3438_4: “imassa kammassa evarūpo dukkho vipāko”ti pana ajānanato “na bujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3438_5: Pacchāssa kaṭukaṃ hotīti yadipi pāpassa kammassa āyūhanakkhaṇe “imassa kammassa evarūpo vipāko”ti na bujjhati,
atk-s0508a1:3438_6: tato pacchā pana nirayādīsu nibbattassa assa bālassa kaṭukaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ dukkhameva hoti.
atk-s0508a1:3438_7: Vipāko hissa pāpako yasmā assa pāpakammassa nāma vipāko pāpako nihīno aniṭṭho evāti.
atk-s0508a1:3438_8: Imaṃ pana ovādaṃ sutvā therassa kaniṭṭhabhātā rājānaṃ āpucchitvā pabbajitvā nacirasseva sadatthaṃ nipphādesi.
atk-s0508a1:3441_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:3441_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto buddhaguṇe sutvā pasannamānaso ekadivasaṃ kiṃsukarukkhaṃ pupphitaṃ disvā pupphāni
atk-s0508a1:3441_4: gahetvā satthāraṃ uddissa ākāse khipitvā pūjesi.
atk-s0508a1:3441_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bārāṇasiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:3441_6: somamittoti laddhanāmo tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū hutvā vimalena nāma therena kataparicayattā abhiṇhaṃ tassa
atk-s0508a1:3441_7: santikaṃ gacchanto dhammaṃ sutvā sāsane laddhappasādo pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado vattapaṭivattaṃ pūrento vicarati.
atk-s0508a1:3441_8: Vimalatthero pana kusīto middhabahulo rattindivaṃ vītināmeti.
atk-s0508a1:3441_9: Somamitto “kusītaṃ nāma nissāya ko guṇo”ti taṃ pahāya mahākassapattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa ovāde ṭhatvā
atk-s0508a1:3450_0: “Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
atk-s0508a1:3451_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti.
atk-s0508a1:3452_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vimalattheraṃ ovādena tajjento –
atk-s0508a1:3459_0: Niccaṃ āraddhavīriyehi, paṇḍitehi sahāvase”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:3460_1: yathā sīde mahaṇṇaveti pesalopi kulaputto kusītaṃ alasapuggalaṃ nissāya sīdati saṃsāre patati,
atk-s0508a1:3460_4: tasmā taṃ adhikusaladhammavasena sīsaṃ anukkhipitvā kucchitaṃ sīdanato kusītaṃ vīriyārambhābhāvato hīnavīriyaṃ puggalaṃ sabbathā vajjeyya,
atk-s0508a1:3461_0: Evaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya gāthāya kosajje ādīnavaṃ dassetvā idāni vīriyārambhe ānisaṃse dassetuṃ “pavivittehī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3461_4: nibbānaṃ patipesitattatāya pahitattā ārammaṇūpanijjhānavasena lakkhaṇūpanijjhānavasena ca jhāyino,
atk-s0508a1:3461_7: tehiyeva saha āvaseyya sadatthaṃ nipphādetukāmo saṃvaseyyāti.
atk-s0508a1:3461_8: Taṃ sutvā vimalatthero saṃviggamānaso vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā sadatthaṃ ārādhesi.
atk-s0508a1:3464_0: Jano janamhi sambaddhoti āyasmato sabbamittattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:3464_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito dvānavute kappe tissassa
atk-s0508a1:3464_3: bhagavato kāle nesādakule nibbattitvā vanacāriko hutvā vane mige vadhitvā maṃsaṃ khādanto jīvati.
atk-s0508a1:3464_4: Athassa bhagavā anuggaṇhanatthaṃ vasanaṭṭhānasamīpe tīṇi padacetiyāni dassetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:3464_5: So atītakāle sammāsambuddhesu kataparicayattā cakkaṅkitāni disvā pasannamānaso koraṇḍapupphehi pūjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3464_6: katvā tena puññakammena tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:3464_9: So viññutaṃ patto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0508a1:3464_10: araññe viharanto vassaṃ upagantvā vuṭṭhavasso bhagavantaṃ vandituṃ sāvatthiṃ gacchanto antarāmagge māgavikehi
atk-s0508a1:3464_12: Mātā panassa migī pāsaṃ appaviṭṭhāpi puttasinehena dūraṃ na gacchati,
atk-s0508a1:3464_13: maraṇabhayena pāsasamīpampi na upagacchati migapotako ca bhīto ito cito ca parivattento karuṇaṃ vilapati,
atk-s0508a1:3464_15: “aho sattānaṃ snehahetukaṃ dukkha”nti gacchanto tato paraṃ sambahule core ekaṃ purisaṃ jīvagāhaṃ gahetvā palālaveṇiyā sarīraṃ veṭhetvā jhāpente,
atk-s0508a1:3464_16: tañca mahāviravaṃ viravantaṃ disvā tadubhayaṃ nissāya sañjātasaṃvego tesaṃ corānaṃ suṇantānaṃyeva –
atk-s0508a1:3467_0: Jano janena heṭhīyati, heṭheti ca jano janaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3469_0: “Ko hi tassa janenattho, janena janitena vā;
atk-s0508a1:3470_0: Janaṃ ohāya gacchaṃ taṃ, heṭhayitvā bahuṃ jana”nti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:3471_7: ahaṃ ime nissāya jīvāmī”ti paṭibaddhacittoti attho.
atk-s0508a1:3471_9: dhītā”tiādinā aññameva janaṃ añño jano assito taṇhāya allīno pariggayha ṭhito.
atk-s0508a1:3471_11: heṭheti ca jano jananti kammassakatāya yathābhūtāvabodhassa ca abhāvato ajjhupekkhanaṃ akatvā lobhavasena yathā jano janaṃ assito,
atk-s0508a1:3471_12: evaṃ dosavasena jano janena heṭhīyati vibādhīyati.
atk-s0508a1:3471_13: “Tayidaṃ mayhaṃva upari heṭhanaphalavasena paripatissatī”ti ajānanto heṭheti ca jano janaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3472_0: Ko hi tassa janenatthoti tassa aññajanassa aññena janena taṇhāvasena assitena dosavasena heṭhitena vā ko attho.
atk-s0508a1:3472_1: Janena janitena vāti mātāpitā hutvā tena aññena janena janitena vā ko attho.
atk-s0508a1:3472_3: heṭhayitvā bahuṃ jananti yasmā saṃsāre carato janassa ayamevānurūpā paṭipatti,
atk-s0508a1:3472_5: tassa ca bādhikā yā sā taṇhā ca,
atk-s0508a1:3472_6: yo ca so doso eva bahuṃ janaṃ bādhayitvā ṭhito,
atk-s0508a1:3472_7: tañca ohāya sabbaso pahāya pariccajitvā gacchaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:3472_8: tehi anupaddutaṃ ṭhānaṃ gaccheyyaṃ pāpuṇeyyanti attho.
atk-s0508a1:3472_9: Evaṃ pana vatvā thero tāvadeva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattamapāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:3474_0: Pasumārena jīvāmi, kusalaṃ me na vijjati.
atk-s0508a1:3478_0: Haṭṭho haṭṭhena cittena, pade cittaṃ pasādayiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3488_0: Te pana corā therassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā saṃvegajātā pabbajitvā dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjiṃsūti.
atk-s0508a1:3491_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:3491_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto kenacideva karaṇīyena araññaṃ gato tattha aññatarassa rukkhassa sākhāya olambamānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3491_4: paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ disvā “ariyaddhajo olambatī”ti pasannacitto kiṅkaṇipupphāni gahetvā paṃsukūlaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0508a1:3491_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde setabyanagare satthavāhakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:3491_6: mahākāḷoti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patvā gharāvāsaṃ vasanto pañcahi sakaṭasatehi bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā vāṇijjavasena
atk-s0508a1:3491_7: sāvatthiṃ gato ekamantaṃ sakaṭasatthaṃ nivesetvā addhānaparissamaṃ vinodetvā attano parisāya saddhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:3491_8: nisinno sāyanhasamayaṃ gandhamālādihatthe upāsake jetavanaṃ gacchante disvā sayampi tehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:3491_9: gantvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā sosānikaṅgaṃ adhiṭṭhāya susāne vasati.
atk-s0508a1:3491_10: Athekadivasaṃ kāḷī nāma ekā itthī chavaḍāhikā therassa kammaṭṭhānatthāya aciramatasarīraṃ ubho satthī
atk-s0508a1:3491_11: bhinditvā ubho ca bāhū bhinditvā sīsañca dadhithālakaṃ viya bhinditvā sabbaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ sambandhameva
atk-s0508a1:3491_12: katvā therassa oloketuṃ yogyaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0508a1:3493_0: “Kāḷī itthī brahatī dhaṅkarūpā, satthiñca bhetvā aparañca satthiṃ;
atk-s0508a1:3494_0: Bāhañca bhetvā aparañca bāhaṃ, sīsañca bhetvā dadhithālakaṃva;
atk-s0508a1:3497_0: “Yo ve avidvā upadhiṃ karoti, punappunaṃ dukkhamupeti mando;
atk-s0508a1:3498_0: Tasmā pajānaṃ upadhiṃ na kayirā, māhaṃ puna bhinnasiro sayissa”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:3500_4: Satthiñca bhetvāti matasarīrassa satthiṃ jaṇṇubhedanena bhañjitvā.
atk-s0508a1:3500_7: Sīsañca bhetvā dadhithālakaṃvāti matasarīrassa sīsaṃ bhinditvā bhinnattā eva leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi paggharantaṃ dadhithālakaṃ viya,
atk-s0508a1:3500_9: Esā nisinnā abhisandahitvāti chinnabhinnāvayavaṃ matasarīraṃ te avayave yathāṭhāneyeva ṭhapanena sandahitvā
atk-s0508a1:3500_10: sahitaṃ katvā maṃsāpaṇaṃ pasārentī viya esā nisinnā.
atk-s0508a1:3501_0: Yo ve avidvā upadhiṃ karotīti yo imāya upaṭṭhāpitaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ disvāpi avidvā akusalo kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3501_2: so mando mandapañño saṃsārassa anativattanato punappunaṃ aparāparaṃ nirayādīsu dukkhaṃ upeti.
atk-s0508a1:3501_3: Tasmā pajānaṃ upadhiṃ na kayirāti tasmāti yasmā cetadevaṃ, tasmā.
atk-s0508a1:3501_4: Pajānaṃ upadhinti “idha yaṃ dukkhaṃ sambhotī”ti pajānanto yoniso manasikaronto kilesūpadhiṃ na kayirā na uppādeyya. Kasmā?
atk-s0508a1:3501_5: Māhaṃ puna bhinnasiro sayissanti yathayidaṃ matasarīraṃ bhinnasarīraṃ sayati,
atk-s0508a1:3501_6: evaṃ kilesūpadhīhi saṃsāre punappunaṃ uppattiyā kaṭasivaḍḍhako hutvā bhinnasiro ahaṃ mā sayissanti.
atk-s0508a1:3501_7: Evaṃ vadanto eva thero vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:3513_0: Bahū sapatte labhatīti āyasmato tissattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:3513_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto piyadassissa
atk-s0508a1:3513_3: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto sippesu nipphattiṃ gantvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā
atk-s0508a1:3513_4: gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññāyatane sālavane assamaṃ kāretvā vasati.
atk-s0508a1:3513_5: Bhagavā tassa anuggaṇhanatthaṃ assamassa avidūre sālavane nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0508a1:3513_6: So assamato nikkhamitvā phalāphalatthāya gacchanto bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso cattāro daṇḍe ṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a1:3513_7: bhagavato upari pupphitāhi sālasākhāhi sākhāmaṇḍapaṃ katvā sattāhaṃ navanavehi sālapupphehi bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3513_9: Satthā sattāhassa accayena nirodhato vuṭṭhahitvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ cintesi.
atk-s0508a1:3513_11: Bhagavā tassa bhāviniṃ sampattiṃ vibhāvento anumodanaṃ vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:3513_12: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe
atk-s0508a1:3513_13: brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā tissoti laddhanāmo vayappatto tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū hutvā pañcamattāni māṇavakasatāni
atk-s0508a1:3513_14: mante vācento lābhaggayasaggappatto hutvā satthu rājagahagamane buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:3513_15: pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:3534_0: “Ko nu kho bhagavā hetu, sitakammassa satthuno;
atk-s0508a1:3537_0: Tassa kammaṃ saritvāna, sitaṃ pātukariṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3539_0: Devaloke manusse vā, okāsova na sammati.
atk-s0508a1:3553_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:3571_0: So arahattaṃ pana patvā visesato lābhaggayasaggappatto ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:3571_1: Tattha keci puthujjanabhikkhū therassa lābhasakkāraṃ disvā bālabhāvena asahanākāraṃ pavedesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3571_2: Thero taṃ ñatvā lābhasakkāre ādīnavaṃ tattha attano alaggabhāvañca pakāsento –
atk-s0508a1:3574_0: Lābhī annassa pānassa, vatthassa sayanassa ca.
atk-s0508a1:3579_3: evaṃ vevaṇṇiyaṃ ajjhupagato parāyattavuttiko pabbajito sace annapānādīnaṃ lābhī hoti,
atk-s0508a1:3579_6: Tasmā etaṃ evarūpaṃ lābhasakkāresu mahabbhayaṃ vipulabhayaṃ ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ viditvā appicchataṃ santosañca
atk-s0508a1:3579_7: hadaye ṭhapetvā anavajjuppādassāpi uppannassa lābhassa parivajjanena appalābho,
atk-s0508a1:3579_9: saṃsāre bhayassa ikkhanato bhinnakilesatāya vā bhikkhu santuṭṭhiṭṭhānīyassa satisampajaññassa vasena sato hutvā paribbaje careyya vihareyyāti.
atk-s0508a1:3579_10: Taṃ sutvā te bhikkhū tāvadeva theraṃ khamāpesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3582_2: Tassa pubbayogo saṃveguppatti pabbajjā ca ekakanipāte “abhisatto”ti gāthāya saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttāyeva.
atk-s0508a1:3582_3: Tāya ca gāthāya therena attano visesādhigamassa kāraṇaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3582_4: Idha pana adhigatavisesassa attano āyasmatā ca anuruddhena āyasmatā ca nandiyena saha samaggavāso dassitoti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3582_5: Samaggavāsaṃ pana vasantā te yathā ca vasiṃsu,
atk-s0508a1:3588_0: Ramanti dhammaratiyā, hitvāna lokiyaṃ rati”nti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:3589_0: Tattha pācīnavaṃsadāyamhīti pācīnavaṃsanāmake rakkhitagopite sahaparicchede vane.
atk-s0508a1:3589_1: Tañhi vanaṃ gāmassa pācīnadisāyaṃ ṭhitattā vaṃsagumbaparikkhittattā ca “pācīnavaṃsadāyo”ti vutto,
atk-s0508a1:3589_5: Pahāyānappake bhogeti uḷārena puññānubhāvena adhigate kulaparamparāgate ca mahante bhogakkhandhe chaḍḍetvā.
atk-s0508a1:3589_7: Uñche pattāgate ratāti uñchācariyāya ābhatattā uñche patte āgatattā pattāgate pattapariyāpanne ratā abhiratā,
atk-s0508a1:3589_8: saṅghabhattādiatirekalābhaṃ paṭikkhipitvā jaṅghabalaṃ nissāya bhikkhācariyāya laddhena missakabhatteneva santuṭṭhāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:3590_0: Āraddhavīriyāti uttamatthassa adhigamāya āditova pageva sampāditavīriyā.
atk-s0508a1:3590_1: Pahitattāti ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena kālena kālaṃ samāpajjanena ca nibbānaṃ patipesitacittā.
atk-s0508a1:3590_2: Niccaṃ daḷhaparakkamāti vattapaṭipattīsu diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānuyogena sabbakālaṃ asithilaparakkamā.
atk-s0508a1:3590_4: hitvāna lokiyaṃ ratinti loke viditatāya lokapariyāpannatāya ca lokiyaṃ rūpārammaṇādiratiṃ pahāya maggapaññāya
atk-s0508a1:3590_5: pajahitvā lokuttaradhammaratiyā aggaphalanibbānābhiratiyā ca ramanti abhiramantīti.
atk-s0508a1:3593_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:3593_3: santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi
atk-s0508a1:3593_4: taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pūjāsakkārabahulaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā,
atk-s0508a1:3593_5: “ahampi anāgate tumhādisassa buddhassa evarūpo sāvako bhaveyya”nti paṇidhānaṃ katvā tato paṭṭhāya devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:3593_6: saṃsaranto atthadassissa bhagavato kāle vinatāya nāma nadiyā mahanto kacchapo hutvā nibbatto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3593_7: satthāraṃ nadiyā pāraṃ gantuṃ tīre ṭhitaṃ disvā sayaṃ bhagavantaṃ tāretukāmo satthu pādamūle nipajji.
atk-s0508a1:3593_8: Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā piṭṭhiṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0508a1:3593_9: So haṭṭhatuṭṭho vegena sotaṃ chindanto sīghataraṃ paratīrameva pāpesi.
atk-s0508a1:3593_10: Bhagavā tassa anumodanaṃ vadanto bhāviniṃ sampattiṃ kathetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:3594_0: So tena puññakammena sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ suddhodanamahārājassa
atk-s0508a1:3594_1: putto hutvā mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā kucchimhi nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:3594_2: Tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase ñātisaṅghaṃ nandento jātoti nandotveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:3594_3: Tassa vayappattakāle satthā pavattavaradhammacakko lokānuggahaṃ karonto kapilavatthuṃ gantvā ñātisamāgame
atk-s0508a1:3594_4: pokkharavassaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā vessantarajātakaṃ kathetvā dutiyadivase piṇḍāya paviṭṭho “uttiṭṭhe
atk-s0508a1:3594_5: nappamajjeyyā”ti gāthāya pitaraṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā nivesanaṃ gantvā “dhammaṃ care sucarita”nti
atk-s0508a1:3594_6: gāthāya mahāpajāpatiṃ sotāpattiphale rājānaṃ sakadāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā tatiye divase nandakumārassa
atk-s0508a1:3594_7: abhisekanivesanappavesanavivāhamaṅgalesu vattamānesu piṇḍāya pavisitvā nandakumārassa hatthe pattaṃ datvā
atk-s0508a1:3594_8: maṅgalaṃ vatvā tassa hatthato pattaṃ agahetvāva vihāraṃ gato taṃ pattahatthaṃ vihāraṃ āgataṃ anicchamānaṃyeva
atk-s0508a1:3594_9: pabbājetvā tathā pabbajitattāyeva anabhiratiyā pīḷitaṃ ñatvā upāyena tassa taṃ anabhiratiṃ vinodesi.
atk-s0508a1:3594_10: So yoniso paṭisaṅkhāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:3604_0: Sukhaṃ me tādisaṃ natthi, phuṭṭhe pādatale yathā.
atk-s0508a1:3608_0: Ayañca kacchapo rājā, tāresi mama paññavā.
atk-s0508a1:3622_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhaṃ anubhavanto “aho satthu upāyakosallaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:3622_1: yenāhaṃ bhavapaṅkato uddharitvā nibbānathale patiṭṭhāpito”ti attano pahīnasaṃkilesaṃ paṭiladdhañca sukhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3628_0: Yoniso paṭipajjitvā, bhave cittaṃ udabbahi”nti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:3629_0: Tattha ayoniso manasikārāti anupāyamanasikārato asubhaṃ kāyaṃ subhato manasi karitvā subhato manasikārahetu,
atk-s0508a1:3629_2: Maṇḍananti hatthūpagādiābharaṇehi ceva mālāgandhādīhi ca attabhāvassa alaṅkaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3629_9: Kāmarāgenāti vatthukāmesu chandarāgena aṭṭito pīḷito vibādhito āsinti yojanā.
atk-s0508a1:3630_0: Upāyakusalenāti vineyyānaṃ damanūpāyacchekena kovidena buddhena bhagavatā hetubhūtena.
atk-s0508a1:3630_2: Paluṭṭhamakkaṭīdevaccharādassanena hi upakkitavādacodanāya attano kāmarāgāpanayanaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0508a1:3630_3: Bhagavā hi āyasmantaṃ nandattheraṃ paṭhamaṃ janapadakalyāṇiṃ upādāya “yathāyaṃ makkaṭī,
atk-s0508a1:3630_4: evaṃ kakuṭapādiniyo upādāya janapadakalyāṇī”ti mahatiyā āṇiyā khuddakaṃ āṇiṃ nīharanto chaḍḍako viya,
atk-s0508a1:3630_5: sinehapānena sarīraṃ kiledetvā vamanavirecanehi dosaṃ nīharanto bhisakko viya ca kakuṭapādinidassanena
atk-s0508a1:3630_6: janapadakalyāṇiyaṃ virattacittaṃ kāretvā puna upakkitavādena kakuṭapādinīsupi cittaṃ virājetvā sammadeva
atk-s0508a1:3630_10: Upāyena ñāyena sammadeva samathavipassanāya visuddhipaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjitvā bhave saṃsārapaṅke nimuggañca me cittaṃ ariyamaggena hatthena uttāriṃ,
atk-s0508a1:3631_0: Imaṃ udānaṃ udānetvā thero punadivase bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha – “yaṃ me, bhante,
atk-s0508a1:3631_1: bhagavā pāṭibhogo pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādānaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:3631_8: Athassa bhagavā savisesaṃ indriyesu guttadvārataṃ ñatvā taṃ guṇaṃ vibhāvento,
atk-s0508a1:3631_11: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ yadidaṃ nando”ti indriyesu guttadvārabhāvena aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a1:3631_12: Thero hi “yamevāhaṃ indriyānaṃ asaṃvaraṃ nissāya imaṃ vippakāraṃ patto,
atk-s0508a1:3631_13: tamevāhaṃ suṭṭhu niggahessāmī”ti ussāhajāto balavahirottappo tattha ca katādhikārattā indriyasaṃvare ukkaṃsapāramiṃ agamāsīti.
atk-s0508a1:3634_0: Pare ca naṃ pasaṃsantīti āyasmato sirimattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:3634_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato pāramiyo
atk-s0508a1:3634_3: pūretvā tusitabhavane ṭhitakāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3634_4: sakkharappabhedānaṃ itihāsapañcamānaṃ padako veyyākaraṇo lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu anavayo nekkhammajjhāsayatāya
atk-s0508a1:3634_5: kāme pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā caturāsītisahassaparimāṇena tāpasagaṇena parivuto himavantappadese
atk-s0508a1:3634_6: devatābhinimmite assame jhānābhiññāyo nibbattetvā vasanto purimabuddhesu katādhikāratāya lakkhaṇamantesu
atk-s0508a1:3634_7: āgataniyāmena ca buddhaguṇe anussaritvā atīte buddhe uddissa aññatarasmiṃ nadīnivattane pulinacetiyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3634_11: So tesaṃ lakkhaṇamante āharitvā tattha āgatāni mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni vibhajitvā tadanusārena attano bale ṭhatvā buddhaguṇe kittesi.
atk-s0508a1:3634_12: Taṃ sutvā tepi tāpasā pasannamānasā tato paṭṭhāya sammāsambuddhaṃ uddissa thūpapūjaṃ karontā viharanti.
atk-s0508a1:3635_0: Tena ca samayena padumuttarabodhisatto tusitakāyā cavitvā mātukucchiṃ okkanto hoti.
atk-s0508a1:3635_3: Tāpaso tāni antevāsikānaṃ dassetvā bhiyyosomattāya sammāsambuddhesu tesaṃ pasādaṃ vaḍḍhetvā kālaṃ katvā
atk-s0508a1:3635_4: brahmaloke nibbattitvā tehi attano sarīrassa pūjāya karīyamānāya dissamānarūpo āgantvā,
atk-s0508a1:3635_7: bhāvanāya ca yuttappayuttā hothā”ti vatvā brahmalokameva gato.
atk-s0508a1:3636_0: Evaṃ so devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ gahapatikule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:3636_1: tassa jātadivasato paṭṭhāya tasmiṃ kule sirisampattiyā vaḍḍhamānattā sirimātveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:3636_3: tassa “ayaṃ siriṃ vaḍḍhento jāto”ti sirivaḍḍhoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:3636_4: Te ubhopi jetavanappaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddhā pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:3636_5: Tesu sirivaḍḍho na tāva uttarimanussadhammassa lābhī ahosi,
atk-s0508a1:3636_8: sirimatthero pana pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya tādisena kammacchiddena appalābhī ahosi bahujanāsambhāvito,
atk-s0508a1:3636_9: samathavipassanāsu kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:3638_0: Tattha me caṅkamo āsi, amanussehi māpito.
atk-s0508a1:3646_0: Sabbe sissā samāgantvā, etamatthaṃ pucchiṃsu maṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3647_0: “Pulinena kato thūpo, yaṃ tvaṃ deva namassasi;
atk-s0508a1:3648_0: Mayampi ñātumicchāma, puṭṭho ācikkha no tuvaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3650_0: Te kho ahaṃ namassāmi, buddhaseṭṭhe mahāyase.
atk-s0508a1:3656_0: Na tesaṃ jāṇu nadati, sandhisaddo na suyyati.
atk-s0508a1:3658_0: Paṭhamaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ pādaṃ, buddhānaṃ esa dhammatā.
atk-s0508a1:3660_0: Nevukkaṃsenti attānaṃ, no ca vambhenti pāṇinaṃ.

atk-s0508a1:3850_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato asītikoṭivibhavaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:3850_4: pabbatapāde araññāyatane ekissā nadiyā tīre assamaṃ kāretvā viharanto attano anuggaṇhanatthaṃ upagataṃ
atk-s0508a1:3850_5: satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso ajinacammaṃ pattharitvā adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:3850_6: Tattha nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ pupphehi ca candanena ca pūjetvā ambaphalāni datvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandi.
atk-s0508a1:3850_7: Tassa bhagavā nisinnāsanasampattiṃ pakāsento anumodanaṃ vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:3850_8: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:3850_9: “kaṇhamitto”ti laddhanāmo vayappatto satthu vesāligamane buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho mahākaccānattherassa
atk-s0508a1:3850_11: So mandapañño dandhaparakkamo ca hutvā ciraṃ kālaṃ viññuṃ sabrahmacāriṃ nissāyeva vasati.
atk-s0508a1:3850_12: Bhikkhū “yathā nāma valli rukkhādīsu kiñci anissāya vaḍḍhituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0508a1:3850_13: evamayampi kañci paṇḍitaṃ anissāya vaḍḍhituṃ na sakkotī”ti valliyotveva samudācariṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:3850_14: Aparabhāge pana veṇudattattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa ovāde ṭhatvā sato sampajāno hutvā viharanto ñāṇassa
atk-s0508a1:3856_0: Ahaṃ monena monissaṃ, gaṅgāsotova sāgara”nti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:3857_0: Tattha yaṃ kiccaṃ daḷhavīriyenāti daḷhena vīriyena thirena parakkamena,
atk-s0508a1:3857_1: daḷhavīriyena vā purisadhorayhena yaṃ kiccaṃ kātabbaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3857_2: Yaṃ kiccaṃ boddhumicchatāti cattāri ariyasaccāni nibbānameva vā boddhuṃ bujjhituṃ icchantena paṭivijjhitukāmena yaṃ kiccaṃ karaṇīyaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3857_3: Karissaṃ nāvarajjhissanti tamahaṃ dāni karissaṃ na virādhessaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:3857_5: Passa vīriyaṃ parakkamanti yathā paṭipajjamāne dhamme vidhinā īraṇato “vīriyaṃ”,
atk-s0508a1:3857_6: paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato “parakkamo”ti ca laddhanāmaṃ sammāvāyāmaṃ passa na saddhamevāti attano kattukāmataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:3858_8: Gaṅgāsotova sāgaranti yathā gaṅgāya soto sāgaraṃ samuddaṃ avirajjhanto ekaṃsato ogāhati,
atk-s0508a1:3858_9: evaṃ “ahaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto maggañāṇena nibbānaṃ adhigamissāmi,
atk-s0508a1:3858_10: tasmā taṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ me ācikkhathā”ti theraṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ yāci.
atk-s0508a1:3859_0: Taṃ sutvā veṇudattatthero tassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:3859_1: Sopi kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto nacirasseva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:3868_0: “Ko vā tvaṃ kassa vā putto, mahābrahmā idhāgato;
atk-s0508a1:3869_0: Virocesi disā sabbā, udayaṃ sūriyo yathā.
atk-s0508a1:3871_0: Ko vā tvaṃ kassa vā putto, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ mayaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3873_0: Namhi devā na gandhabbo, namhi sakko purindado.
atk-s0508a1:3874_0: “Brahmabhāvo ca me natthi, etesaṃ uttamo ahaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:3889_0: Mama kammaṃ pakittesi, hāsayanto mamaṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a1:3907_0: Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, yamhi gabbhe vasāmahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3919_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā aññaṃ byākaronto thero imāyeva gāthā abhāsīti.
atk-s0508a1:3922_0: Kese me olikhissantītiādikā āyasmato vītasokattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:3922_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a1:3922_3: brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato kāme pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:3922_4: mahatā isigaṇena parivuto araññe vasanto buddhuppādaṃ sutvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho “udumbarapupphasadisā dullabhadassanā
atk-s0508a1:3922_6: idāneva upagantabbā”ti mahatiyā parisāya saddhiṃ satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ gacchanto diyaḍḍhayojane sese byādhiko
atk-s0508a1:3922_7: hutvā buddhagatāya saññāya kālaṅkato devesu uppajjitvā aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:3922_8: aṭṭhārasavassādhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ matthake dhammāsokarañño kaniṭṭhabhātā hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:3922_10: So vayappatto khattiyakumārehi sikkhitabbavijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato giridattattheraṃ nissāya gihibhūto
atk-s0508a1:3922_11: suttantapiṭake abhidhammapiṭake ca visārado hutvā ekadivasaṃ massukammasamaye kappakassa hatthato ādāsaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3922_12: gahetvā kāyaṃ olokento valitapalitādīni disvā sañjātasaṃvego vipassanāya cittaṃ otāretvā bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā
atk-s0508a1:3922_13: tasmiṃyeva āsane sotāpanno hutvā giridattattherassa santike pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:3929_0: “Mama aññataro sisso, sissānaṃ so kathesi me;
atk-s0508a1:3930_0: Sutvāna te etamatthaṃ, ārocesuṃ mamaṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a1:3932_0: Tassānuvattati jano, lābho amhaṃ na vijjati.
atk-s0508a1:3941_0: “Buddho loke samuppanno, cakkhuṃ lacchāma no bhavaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:3960_0: Sabbe coḷā samucchinnā, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:3961_1: kappako upasaṅkamīti gihikāle massukammasamaye “mama kese olikhissaṃ kappemī”ti kesādīnaṃ chedanādivasena kappanato kappako nhāpito maṃ upagacchi.
atk-s0508a1:3961_3: Sarīraṃ paccavekkhisanti sabbakāyike ādāse palitavalitamukhanimittādidassanamukhena “abhibhūto vata jarāya
atk-s0508a1:3961_4: me kāyo”ti jarābhibhūtaṃ attano sarīraṃ paccavekkhiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3961_5: Evaṃ paccavekkhato ca tuccho kāyo adissittha niccadhuvasukhasabhāvādīhi ritto hutvā me kāyo adissatha paññāyi. Kasmā?
atk-s0508a1:3961_6: Andhakāre tamo byagā yena ayonisomanasikārasaṅkhātena tamasā attano kāye andhagatā vijjamānampi asubhādisabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3961_8: tasmiṃ andhakāre andhakaraṇaṭṭhāne kāye yonisomanasikārasaṅkhātena ñāṇālokena avijjātamo vigato,
atk-s0508a1:3961_9: tato eva sabbe coḷā samucchinnā corā viya kusalabhaṇḍacchedanato,
atk-s0508a1:3961_10: sādhūhi alātabbato asaṅgahetabbato saṅkārakūṭādīsu chaḍḍitapilotikakhaṇḍaṃ viya issarajanena ariyajanena
atk-s0508a1:3961_11: jigucchitabbatāya coḷā viyāti vā “coḷā”ti laddhanāmā kilesā samucchinnā.
atk-s0508a1:3961_12: Aggamaggena samugghāṭitattā eva ca nesaṃ natthi dāni punabbhavo āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti natthīti.
atk-s0508a1:3964_0: Pañca nīvaraṇe hitvātiādikā āyasmato puṇṇamāsattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:3964_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto tissassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:3964_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthari araññe viharante paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ dumasākhāya laggetvā
atk-s0508a1:3964_4: gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭhe dhanuhattho gahanaṃ paviṭṭho satthu paṃsukūlaṃ disvā pasannamānaso dhanuṃ nikkhipitvā
atk-s0508a1:3964_6: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kuṭumbiyakule nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:3964_7: Tassa kira jātadivase tasmiṃ gehe sabbabhājanāni suvaṇṇaratanamayehi māsehi paripuṇṇāneva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3964_9: So vayappatto dārapariggahaṃ katvā ekasmiṃ putte uppanne gharāvāsaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā gāmakāvāse vasanto ghaṭento vāyamanto chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:3970_0: Cāpaṃ tattheva nikkhippa, sire katvāna añjaliṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3976_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā sāvatthiṃ upagantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā susāne vasati,
atk-s0508a1:3976_1: tassa ca acirāgatasseva sato putto kālamakāsi.
atk-s0508a1:3976_3: “mā idaṃ aputtakaṃ sāpateyyaṃ rājāno hareyyu”nti taṃ uppabbājetukāmā mahatā parivārena therassa santikaṃ gantvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā palobhetuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0508a1:3976_4: Thero attano vītarāgabhāvajānāpanatthaṃ ākāse ṭhatvā attano paṭipattikittanamukhena tassā dhammaṃ desento –
atk-s0508a1:3982_0: Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, tuccho kāyo adissathā”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:3984_0: Tattha pañca nīvaraṇe hitvāti kāmacchandādike pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya jhānādhigamena viddhaṃsetvā.
atk-s0508a1:3984_1: Yogakkhemassa pattiyāti kāmayogādīhi catūhi yogehi khemassa anupaddutassa nibbānassa adhigamāya.
atk-s0508a1:3984_3: Yathā hi ādāso olokentassa rūpakāye guṇāguṇaṃ ādaṃseti,
atk-s0508a1:3984_4: evaṃ vipassanāsaṅkhāto dhammānaṃ sāmaññavisesāvabodhanato ñāṇadassanabhūto dhammādāso vipassantassa vodānasaṃkilesadhammavibhāvanena
atk-s0508a1:3984_5: tappahānasādhanena ca visesato nāmakāye guṇaṃ ādaṃseti. Tenāha –
atk-s0508a1:3987_0: Imaṃ kāyaṃ dhammasamūhaṃ mama attabhāvaṃ ajjhattikabāhirāyatanabhāvato santarabāhiraṃ sabbaṃ anavasesaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3987_2: Evaṃ passatā ca mayā ajjhattañca bahiddhā cāti attano santāne parasantāne ca tuccho kāyo adissatha niccasārādivirahito
atk-s0508a1:3987_3: tuccho khandhapañcakasaṅkhāto attabhāvakāyo ñāṇacakkhunā yāthāvato apassittha.
atk-s0508a1:3987_6: bālassa taṇhāsaṃyuttassa evamayaṃ kāyo samudāgato”tiādīsu “kāyo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0508a1:3987_9: na dānissa kiñci mayā passitabbaṃ atthīti katakiccataṃ dassento aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:3987_10: Evaṃ thero imāhi gāthāhi purāṇadutiyikāya dhammaṃ desetvā taṃ saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca sampatiṭṭhāpetvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0508a1:3990_0: Yathāpi bhaddo ājaññoti āyasmato nandakattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:3990_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto sikhissa bhagavato kāle paccantadese
atk-s0508a1:3990_3: uppajjitvā viññutaṃ patto vanacāriko hutvā vicaranto ekadivasaṃ satthu caṅkamanaṭṭhānaṃ disvā pasannacitto
atk-s0508a1:3990_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde campāyaṃ gahapatikule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:3990_9: Te ubhopi viññutaṃ patvā āyasmantaṃ soṇaṃ koḷivisaṃ pabbajitaṃ sutvā “soṇopi nāma tathāsukhumālo pabbaji,
atk-s0508a1:3990_11: Tesu bharato nacirasseva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:3990_12: Nandako pana kilesānaṃ balavabhāvena tāva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0508a1:3990_14: Athassa bharatatthero āsayaṃ ñatvā avassayo bhavitukāmo taṃ pacchāsamaṇaṃ katvā vihārato nikkhamitvā maggasamīpe nisinno vipassanākathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0508a1:3991_0: Tena ca samayena sakaṭasatthe gacchante eko sakaṭe yutto goṇo cikkhallaṭṭhāne sakaṭaṃ uddharituṃ asakkonto paripati.
atk-s0508a1:3991_1: Tato naṃ satthavāho sakaṭā mocetvā tiṇañca pānīyañca datvā parissamaṃ apanetvā puna dhure yojesi.
atk-s0508a1:3991_2: Tato goṇo vūpasantaparissamo laddhabalo taṃ sakaṭaṃ cikkhallaṭṭhānato uddharitvā thale patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0508a1:3991_5: imassa kamma”nti taṃ nidassetvā tena “passāmī”ti vutte “imamatthaṃ suṭṭhu upadhārehī”ti āha.
atk-s0508a1:3991_6: Itaro “yathāyaṃ goṇo vūpasantaparissamo paṅkaṭṭhānato bhāraṃ ubbahati,
atk-s0508a1:3991_7: evaṃ mayāpi saṃsārapaṅkato attā uddharitabbo”ti tamevārammaṇaṃ katvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:3999_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano jeṭṭhabhātikassa bharatattherassa santike aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:4002_0: Bhiyyo laddhāna saṃvegaṃ, adīno vahate dhuraṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4005_0: Ājānīyaṃ maṃ dhāretha, puttaṃ buddhassa orasa”nti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4006_1: adīno vahate dhuranti “mayhaṃ jātibalavīriyānaṃ ananucchavikametaṃ yadidaṃ āgatassa bhārassa avahana”nti
atk-s0508a1:4006_5: Bhiyyo punappunaṃ bhiyyosomattāya attano dhuraṃ bhāraṃ vahate ubbahati.
atk-s0508a1:4009_3: Ayaṃ kira anomadassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ manuññadassanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4009_4: mudusukhasamphassaṃ upāhanadvayaṃ gahetvā gacchanto satthāraṃ caṅkamantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso upāhanā
atk-s0508a1:4009_7: yaṃ mama assa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti āha.
atk-s0508a1:4009_9: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde campānagare gahapatikule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:4009_11: So viññutaṃ patto soṇattherassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ sutvā “sopi nāma pabbajī”ti sañjātasaṃvego pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:4009_12: katapubbakicco vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:4017_0: Ito phalaṃ labhissāmi, so me attho samijjhatu.
atk-s0508a1:4020_0: “Yo pānadhiṃ me adāsi, pasanno sehi pāṇibhi;
atk-s0508a1:4029_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:4039_0: Datvāna pānadhiṃ ekaṃ, pattomhi acalaṃ padaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4043_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā attano kaniṭṭhabhātikena nandakattherena heṭṭhā vuttanayena aññābyākaraṇe kate “idāni nandakopi arahā jāto,
atk-s0508a1:4043_1: handa mayaṃ ubhopi satthu santikaṃ gantvā vusitabrahmacariyataṃ nivedessāmāti uppannaṃ parivitakkaṃ nandakattherassa kathento –
atk-s0508a1:4049_0: So no attho anuppatto, sabbasaṃyojanakkhayo”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4050_2: Gacchāmāti tena attanā ca ekajjhaṃ kātabbakiriyāvacanaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4050_4: sammāsambuddho hi samantacakkhunā buddhacakkhunā ca sattānaṃ āsayānusayacaritādīnaṃ yathābhūtavilokanena
atk-s0508a1:4050_5: sadevakassa lokassa vajjāvajjaṃ upanijjhāyatīti visesato upajjhāyoti vattabbataṃ arahati.
atk-s0508a1:4050_9: Yathābhuccaguṇābhibyāhāratāya abhītanādabhāvato sīhanādaṃ buddhassa sammāsambuddhassa tato eva sabbasattuttamatāya seṭṭhassa,
atk-s0508a1:4050_10: buddhānaṃ vā sāvakabuddhādīnaṃ seṭṭhassa sammukhā purato nadissāmāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:4051_5: Anukampāyāti anuggaṇhanena amhe dvepi pabbājayi pabbājesi.
atk-s0508a1:4051_7: So no attho anuppattoti so attho sabbesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ khayabhūtaṃ arahattaphalaṃ no amhehi anuppatto,
atk-s0508a1:4054_0: Nadanti evaṃ sappaññāti āyasmato bhāradvājattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:4054_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekatiṃse kappe kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:4054_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ sumanaṃ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:4054_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā gottanāmena bhāradvājotveva paññāyittha.
atk-s0508a1:4054_6: So vayappatto gharāvāsaṃ vasanto ekaputtaṃ labhi.
atk-s0508a1:4054_9: asukassa nāma ācariyassa santike sippaṃ sikkhitvā ehī”ti taṃ takkasilaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0508a1:4054_10: So gacchanto antarāmagge satthu sāvakaṃ aññataraṃ mahātheraṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ labhitvā tassa santike dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4054_11: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā katapubbakicco vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:4057_0: “Ekatiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ tadā;
atk-s0508a1:4060_0: Athassa pitā bhāradvājo veḷuvane viharantaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4060_1: Atha putto satthāraṃ vandituṃ rājagahaṃ āgato satthu santike nisinnaṃ pitaraṃ disvā tuṭṭhacitto “pitāpi kho me pabbajito,
atk-s0508a1:4060_2: kiṃ nu kho tena pabbajjākiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpita”nti vīmaṃsanto khīṇāsavabhāvaṃ ñatvā taṃ sīhanādaṃ nadāpetukāmo, “sādhu,
atk-s0508a1:4065_0: “Satthā ca pariciṇṇo me, dhammo saṅgho ca pūjito;
atk-s0508a1:4066_0: Ahañca vitto sumano, puttaṃ disvā anāsava”nti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4067_0: Tattha nadantīti yathābhuccaguṇābhibyāhāravasena abhītanādaṃ nadanti gajjanti.
atk-s0508a1:4067_4: tato eva anavasesasaṃkilesapakkhanimmathanena savāhanaṃ kilesamāraṃ abhisaṅkhāramāraṃ devaputtamārañca
atk-s0508a1:4067_5: jetvā sabbaso vijitasaṅgāmā nadanti sappaññāti sambandho.
atk-s0508a1:4068_0: Evaṃ vijetabbavijayena sīhanādaṃ dassetvā idāni ārādhetabbasamārādhanena icchitabbasiddhiyā ca taṃ dassetuṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4068_2: Tattha satthā ca pariciṇṇo meti mama satthā sammāsambuddho yathānusiṭṭhaṃ ovādānusāsanīkaraṇena mayā pariciṇṇo upāsito,
atk-s0508a1:4068_4: Dhammo saṅgho ca pūjitoti navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo,
atk-s0508a1:4068_5: yathāpaṭipattiyāgatamaggānuppattiyā sīladiṭṭhisāmaññagamanena ariyasaṅgho ca mayā pūjito mānito.
atk-s0508a1:4068_7: puttaṃ disvā anāsavanti mama puttaṃ anāsavaṃ sabbaso khīṇāsavaṃ disvā dassanahetu ahampi vitto nirāmisāya pītiyā tuṭṭho,
atk-s0508a1:4068_8: tatoyeva nirāmisena somanassena sumano jātoti attho.
atk-s0508a1:4071_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito catunavute kappe kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:4071_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ sobhitaṃ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ disvā pasannacitto punnāgapupphehi
atk-s0508a1:4071_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā kaṇhadinnoti
atk-s0508a1:4071_6: laddhanāmo vayappatto upanissayasampattiyā codiyamāno dhammasenāpatiṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:4082_0: “Bhavarāgahatassa me sato, bhavarāgo puna me na vijjati;
atk-s0508a1:4083_0: Na cāhu na ca me bhavissati, na ca me etarahi vijjatī”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:4085_4: Na hi patirūpadesavāsena vinā sappurisūpanissayo sambhavati.
atk-s0508a1:4085_6: Etena attano bāhusaccaṃ dassento pacchimacakkadvayasampattiṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:4085_10: añjasaṃ amatogadhanti te dhamme sutvā tattha vuttarūpārūpadhamme salakkhaṇādito pariggahetvā anukkamena
atk-s0508a1:4085_11: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā amatogadhaṃ nibbānapatiṭṭhaṃ taṃsampāpakaṃ añjasaṃ ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjiṃ pāpuṇiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4086_0: Bhavarāgahatassa me satoti bhavarāgena bhavataṇhāya anādimati saṃsāre hatassa upaddutassa mama sato samānassa,
atk-s0508a1:4086_2: Bhavarāgo puna me na vijjatīti tato eva puna idāni bhavarāgo me natthi.
atk-s0508a1:4086_4: na ca me etarahi vijjatīti yadipi pubbe puthujjanakāle sekkhakāle ca me bhavarāgo ahosi,
atk-s0508a1:4086_5: aggamaggappattito pana paṭṭhāya na cāhu na ca ahosi,
atk-s0508a1:4086_7: etarahi adhunāpi na ca me vijjati na ca upalabbhati,
atk-s0508a1:4086_9: Bhavarāgavacaneneva cettha tadekaṭṭhatāya mānādīnampi abhāvo vuttoti sabbaso parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojanataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:4091_0: Yato ahaṃ pabbajitoti āyasmato migasirattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:4091_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto kassapassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a1:4091_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannacitto kusaṭṭhakaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4091_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:4091_5: gahetvā migasiranakkhattena jātattā migasiroti laddhanāmo vayappatto brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:4091_7: yaṃ parijappetvā tivassamatthake matānampi sīsaṃ nakhena ākoṭetvā “ayaṃ satto asukaṭṭhāne nibbatto”ti jānāti.
atk-s0508a1:4092_0: So gharāvāsaṃ anicchanto paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā taṃ vijjaṃ nissāya lokena sakkato garukato lābhī
atk-s0508a1:4092_1: hutvā vicaranto sāvatthiṃ upagato satthu santikaṃ gantvā attano ānubhāvaṃ pakāsento – “ahaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4092_5: “chavasīsāni āharāpetvā mantaṃ parijappetvā nakhena sīsaṃ ākoṭento nirayādikaṃ tehi tehi nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ jānāmī”ti kathesi.
atk-s0508a1:4092_6: Athassa bhagavā parinibbutassa bhikkhuno sīsakapālaṃ āharāpetvā,
atk-s0508a1:4092_9: So taṃ kapālaṃ mantaṃ parijappetvā nakhena ākoṭetvā neva antaṃ na koṭiṃ passati.
atk-s0508a1:4092_12: “upaparikkhissāmi tāvā”ti vatvā punappunaṃ parivattentopi na passateva.
atk-s0508a1:4092_13: Bāhirakamantena hi khīṇāsavassa gatiṃ kathaṃ jānissati,
atk-s0508a1:4092_14: athassa matthakato kacchehi ca sedo mucci.
atk-s0508a1:4092_20: ito uttaritarampi jānāmī”ti vatvā “nibbānaṃ gato so”ti āha.
atk-s0508a1:4092_22: “Tena hi pabbajā”ti vatvā taṃ pabbājetvā paṭhamaṃ samathakammaṭṭhāne niyojetvā jhānābhiññāsu patiṭṭhitassa vipassanāya kammaṃ upadisi.
atk-s0508a1:4092_23: So vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:4104_0: Akuppā me vimuttīti, sabbasaṃyojanakkhayā”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4105_1: sammāsambuddhasāsaneti yato pabhuti ahaṃ pabbajito buddhassa bhagavato sāsane,
atk-s0508a1:4105_3: Vimuccamāno uggacchinti saṃkilesapakkhato paṭhamaṃ tāva samathavipassanāhi vimuccamāno vodānadhammasavanena uṭṭhahiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4105_4: Evaṃ uggacchanto kāmadhātuṃ upaccagaṃ anāgāmimaggena accantameva kāmadhātuṃ atikkamiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4106_1: tato cittaṃ vimucci meti sadevakassa lokassa aggabhūtattā seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmuno buddhassa bhagavato mahākaruṇāyogena
atk-s0508a1:4106_2: “ayaṃ kulaputto mama sāsane pabbajitvā kathaṃ nu kho paṭipajjatī”ti pekkhantassa tato anāgāmimaggādhigamato
atk-s0508a1:4106_3: pacchā aggamaggādhigamena mama cittaṃ sabbasaṃkilesato accantameva mucci.
atk-s0508a1:4106_5: sabbasaṃyojanakkhayāti tathāvimuttacittattā eva sabbesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ khayā parikkhayā iti evaṃ akuppā me vimuttīti aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4109_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:4109_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ passitvā pasannamānaso pattaṃ ādāya
atk-s0508a1:4109_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:4109_7: So vayappatto vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato nekkhammajjhāsayatāya kāme pahāya paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:4109_8: vicaranto satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto
atk-s0508a1:4111_0: Rittakaṃ pattaṃ disvāna, kummāsaṃ pūrayiṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4121_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, thūṇikā ca vidālitā;
atk-s0508a1:4122_0: Vimariyādikataṃ cittaṃ, idheva vidhamissatī”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4123_1: tattha tattha punappunanti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave punappunaṃ nibbattamānāni gahakāni attabhāvagehāni na nibbāni anavaṭṭhitāni ittarāni parittakālāni.
atk-s0508a1:4123_2: Gahakāraṃ gavesantoti imassa attabhāvagehassa kārakaṃ taṇhāvaḍḍhakiṃ pariyesanto ettakaṃ kālaṃ anuvicarinti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:4123_3: Dukkhā jāti punappunanti idaṃ gahakārakagavesanassa kāraṇavacanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4123_4: Yasmā jarābyādhimaraṇamissatāya jāti nāmesā punappunaṃ upagantuṃ dukkhā,
atk-s0508a1:4123_5: na ca sā tasmiṃ adiṭṭhe nivattati,
atk-s0508a1:4124_0: Gahakāraka diṭṭhosīti idāni pana yena so sakkā daṭṭhuṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4124_2: Puna gehanti puna imasmiṃ saṃsāravaṭṭe attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ mama gehaṃ na kāhasi na karissasi.
atk-s0508a1:4124_3: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggāti tava sabbā anavasesakilesaphāsukā mayā bhaggā.
atk-s0508a1:4124_4: Thūṇikā ca vidālitāti idāni tayā kātabbassa attabhāvagehassa avijjāsaṅkhātā kaṇṇikā ca bhinnā.
atk-s0508a1:4124_5: Vimariyādikataṃ cittanti mama cittaṃ vigatantaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4124_7: Tato eva idheva vidhamissati imasmiṃyeva bhave viddhaṃsissati,
atk-s0508a1:4127_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle daliddakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto bhagavati parinibbute
atk-s0508a1:4127_3: tassa dhātuṃ gahetvā manussadevanāgagaruḷakumbhaṇḍayakkhagandhabbehi sattaratanamaye sattayojanike thūpe
atk-s0508a1:4127_4: kate tattha sudhotaṃ attano uttarāsaṅgaṃ veḷagge ābandhitvā dhajaṃ katvā pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4127_5: Taṃ gahetvā abhisammatako nāma yakkhasenāpati devehi cetiyapūjārakkhaṇatthaṃ ṭhapito adissamānakāyo ākāse
atk-s0508a1:4127_7: So taṃ disvā bhiyyosomattāya pasannamānaso ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:4127_8: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:4127_9: upavāṇoti laddhanāmo vayappatto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:4127_10: vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto arahattaṃ patvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:4147_0: Manussā ceva devā ca, buddhathūpaṃ akaṃsu te.
atk-s0508a1:4155_0: Manussā devanāgā ca, buddhapūjaṃ akaṃsu te.
atk-s0508a1:4158_0: “Sabbaṃ maṇimayaṃ thūpaṃ, akaruṃ te ca kañcukaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:4163_0: Manussā ceva devā ca, nāgā ca garuḷā tathā.
atk-s0508a1:4165_0: Mā no pamattā assumha, appamattā sadevakā.
atk-s0508a1:4171_0: Manussā devanāgā ca, garuḷā ca kumbhaṇḍakā.
atk-s0508a1:4173_0: Mā no pamattā assumha, appamattā sadevakā.
atk-s0508a1:4179_0: Manujā devatā nāgā, kumbhaṇḍā garuḷā tathā.
atk-s0508a1:4182_0: “Vediyo satta katvāna, dhajaṃ chattaṃ akaṃsu te;
atk-s0508a1:4185_0: Rattindivā na ñāyanti, āloko hoti sabbadā.
atk-s0508a1:4188_0: “Tena kālena ye keci, thūpaṃ pūjenti mānusā;
atk-s0508a1:4189_0: Na te thūpaṃ āruhanti, ambare ukkhipanti te.
atk-s0508a1:4191_0: Dhajaṃ vā pupphadāmaṃ vā, abhiropeti uttariṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4192_0: “Na te passanti taṃ yakkhaṃ, dāmaṃ passanti gacchato;
atk-s0508a1:4193_0: Evaṃ passitvā gacchantā, sabbe gacchanti suggatiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4194_0: “Viruddhā ye pāvacane, pasannā ye ca sāsane;
atk-s0508a1:4197_0: Āmoditaṃ janaṃ disvā, evaṃ cintesahaṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a1:4199_0: Imā ca janatā tuṭṭhā, kāraṃ kubbaṃ na tappare.
atk-s0508a1:4205_0: Vāteritaṃ dhajaṃ disvā, bhiyyo hāsaṃ janesahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4207_0: Taṃ bhikkhuṃ abhivādetvā, vipākaṃ pucchahaṃ dhaje.
atk-s0508a1:4223_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:4230_0: “Satasahasse kataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dassesi me idha;
atk-s0508a1:4233_0: Tīṇi yojanāni sāmantā, ussīyanti dhajā sadā.
