atk-s0508a1:4237_1: Tena ca samayena bhagavato vātābādho uppajji.
atk-s0508a1:4237_2: Therassa ca gihisahāyo devahito nāma brāhmaṇo sāvatthiyaṃ paṭivasati.
atk-s0508a1:4237_4: Athāyasmā upavāṇo nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya tassa brāhmaṇassa nivesanaṃ upagacchi.
atk-s0508a1:4237_5: Brāhmaṇo “kenaci aññena payojanena thero āgato”ti ñatvā,
atk-s0508a1:4240_0: Sace uṇhodakaṃ atthi, munino dehi brāhmaṇa.
atk-s0508a1:4243_0: Apacitopaceyyānaṃ, tassa icchāmi hātave”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4244_1: yo imasmiṃ loke pūjaneyyānaṃ pūjetabbehi sakkādīhi devehi mahābrahmādīhi ca brahmehi pūjito,
atk-s0508a1:4244_5: sobhanagamanādinā sugato sabbaññū muni mayhaṃ satthā devadevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā,
atk-s0508a1:4244_6: so dāni vātehi vātahetu vātakkhobhanimittaṃ ābādhiko jāto. Sace, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0508a1:4244_8: tassa vātābādhavūpasamanatthaṃ taṃ hātave upanetuṃ icchāmīti.
atk-s0508a1:4244_9: Taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo uṇhodakaṃ tadanurūpaṃ vātārahañca bhesajjaṃ bhagavato upanāmesi.
atk-s0508a1:4247_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:4247_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto bījaniṃ gahetvā bodhiyā pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4247_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sunāparantajanapade seṭṭhikule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:4247_5: isidinnoti laddhanāmo vayappatto satthu candanamāḷapaṭiggahaṇe pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā pasannamānaso satthāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:4247_6: upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā sotāpanno hutvā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati.
atk-s0508a1:4249_0: “Diṭṭhā mayā dhammadharā upāsakā, kāmā aniccā iti bhāsamānā;
atk-s0508a1:4250_0: Sārattarattā maṇikuṇḍalesu, puttesu dāresu ca te apekkhā.
atk-s0508a1:4252_0: “Addhā na jānanti yatodha dhammaṃ, kāmā aniccā iti cāpi āhu;
atk-s0508a1:4253_0: Rāgañca tesaṃ na balatthi chettuṃ, tasmā sitā puttadāraṃ dhanañcā”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:4255_1: kāmā aniccā iti bhāsamānāti idhekacce pariyattidhammadharā upāsakā mayā diṭṭhā,
atk-s0508a1:4255_2: pariyattidhammadharattā eva “kāmā nāmete aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā”ti kāmesu ādīnavapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammaṃ bhāsamānā,
atk-s0508a1:4255_4: puttesu dāresu ca te apekkhāti sārattā hutvā bahalarāgarattā maṇīsu kuṇḍalesu ca,
atk-s0508a1:4255_7: aññaṃ bhaṇantā aññaṃ karontā diṭṭhā mayāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:4256_0: Yatoti yasmā te upāsakā sārattarattā maṇikuṇḍalesu puttesu dāresu ca apekkhavanto,
atk-s0508a1:4256_1: tasmā idha imasmiṃ buddhasāsane dhammaṃ yāthāvato addhā ekaṃsena na jānanti.
atk-s0508a1:4256_2: Evaṃ bhūtā ca “kāmā aniccā”iti cāpi āhu ahosi,
atk-s0508a1:4256_4: Rāgañca tesaṃ na balatthi chettunti tesaṃ upāsakānaṃ yasmā rāgaṃ chettuṃ samucchindituṃ tādisaṃ ñāṇabalaṃ natthi,
atk-s0508a1:4256_5: tasmā tena kāraṇena sitā taṇhāvasena nissitā puttadāraṃ dhanañca allīnā na vissajjentīti sabbametaṃ devatā
atk-s0508a1:4256_7: Taṃ sutvā upāsako saṃvegajāto pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:4262_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā aññaṃ byākaronto imā eva gāthā abhāsīti.
atk-s0508a1:4265_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto ito catunavutikappamatthake kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:4265_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ sataraṃsiṃ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ nirodhā vuṭṭhahitvā piṇḍāya carantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4265_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe gahapatikule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:4266_0: So vayappatto satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā himavantasamīpe bheravāya nāma
atk-s0508a1:4266_2: Athekadivasaṃ mahā akālamegho satapaṭalasahassapaṭalo thanento gajjanto vijjullatā nicchārento gaḷagaḷāyanto uṭṭhahitvā vassituṃ ārabhi,
atk-s0508a1:4266_4: Taṃ saddaṃ sutvā acchataracchuvanamahiṃsahatthiādayo bhītatasitā bhītaravaṃ viraviṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:4266_5: Thero pana āraddhavipassanattā kāye jīvite ca nirapekkho vigatalomahaṃso taṃ acintento vipassanāyameva
atk-s0508a1:4266_6: kammaṃ karonto ghammāpagamena utusappāyalābhena samāhitacitto tāvadeva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā saha abhiññāhi
atk-s0508a1:4274_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā somanassajāto udānavasena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:4278_0: Tassa mayhaṃ ekakassa bherave bile viharato,
atk-s0508a1:4279_0: Natthi bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃso vā.
atk-s0508a1:4281_0: “Dhammatā mamesā yassa me, ekakassa bherave bile;
atk-s0508a1:4282_0: Viharato natthi bhayaṃ vā, chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃso vā”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:4284_1: devo ca gaḷagaḷāyatīti devo megho vassati ca,
atk-s0508a1:4284_4: Ekako cāhaṃ bherave bile viharāmīti ahañca ekako asahāyo sappaṭibhayāyaṃ pabbataguhāyaṃ vasāmi,
atk-s0508a1:4284_5: tassa mayhaṃ evaṃbhūtassa me sato natthi bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃso vāti cittutrāsasaññitaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4284_6: bhayaṃ vā taṃnimittakaṃ sarīrassa chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃsanamattaṃ vā natthi.
atk-s0508a1:4285_1: Apariññātavatthukassa hi tattha appahīnacchandarāgatāya bhayādinā bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4285_4: tasmā bhayādīnaṃ abhāvo dhammatā mamesā mama dhammasabhāvo esoti aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4288_0: Kassa selūpamaṃ cittanti āyasmato nitakattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:4288_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto vipassissa bhagavato kāle bandhumatīnagare
atk-s0508a1:4288_3: ārāmagopako hutvā jīvanto ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ ākāsena gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso nāḷikeraphalaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4288_5: Satthā taṃ anuggaṇhanto ākāseyeva ṭhatvā paṭiggaṇhi.
atk-s0508a1:4288_6: So taṃ datvā uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedi.
atk-s0508a1:4288_7: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:4288_8: nitakoti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patto satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4288_9: gahetvā araññe viharanto ghaṭento arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:4302_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā there phalasukhena nibbānasukhena viharante padhānapariggāhako thero taṃ āraññāyatanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4302_1: gantvā tattha vasantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pariggaṇhanatthaṃ “kassa selūpama”ntiādinā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a1:4303_2: ṭhitaṃ nānupakampatīti imasmiṃ araññāyatane vasantesu kassa bhikkhuno cittaṃ aggaphalādhigamena ekaghanasilāmayapabbatūpamaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4303_3: sabbesaṃ iñjanānaṃ abhāvato vasībhāvappattiyā ca ṭhitaṃ sabbehipi lokadhammehi nānukampati na vedhati.
atk-s0508a1:4303_4: Idānissa akampanākāraṃ saddhiṃ kāraṇena dassetuṃ “viratta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4303_5: Tattha virattaṃ rajanīyesūti virāgasaṅkhātena ariyamaggena rajanīyesu rāguppattihetubhūtesu tebhūmakadhammesu virattaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4303_9: Na kuppatīti na dussati na vikāraṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0508a1:4303_10: Yassevaṃ bhāvitaṃ cittanti yassa ariyapuggalassa cittaṃ mano evaṃ vuttanayena tādibhāvena bhāvitaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4303_11: kuto taṃ dukkhamessatīti taṃ puggalaṃ kuto sattato saṅkhārato vā dukkhaṃ upagamissati,
atk-s0508a1:4304_1: Evaṃ aniyamavasena pucchitamatthaṃ nitakatthero attūpanāyikaṃ katvā vissajjento “mama selūpamaṃ citta”ntiādinā dutiyagāthāya aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4307_0: Na tāva supituṃ hotīti āyasmato soṇassa poṭiriyaputtassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:4307_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro sikhissa bhagavato kāle vanacaro hutvā jīvanto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:4307_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ poṭiriyassa nāma gāmabhojakassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:4307_6: So vayappatto bhaddiyassa sākiyarañño senāpati ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:4307_12: Taṃ bhagavā anupiyāyaṃ ambavane viharanto attano obhāsaṃ pharāpetvā tenassa satiṃ janetvā imāya gāthāya taṃ ovadanto –
atk-s0508a1:4313_0: Saṅgāme me mataṃ seyyo, yañce jīve parājito”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4314_1: ratti nakkhattamālinīti aṭṭhahi akkhaṇehi vajjitaṃ navamaṃ khaṇaṃ labhitvā ṭhitassa viññujātikassa yāva na arahattaṃ hatthagataṃ hoti,
atk-s0508a1:4314_2: tāva ayaṃ nakkhattamālinī ratti supituṃ niddāyituṃ na hoti,
atk-s0508a1:4314_5: ratti hoti vijānatāti esā ratti nāma manussānaṃ migapakkhīnañca niddūpagamanena visesato nissaddavelābhūtā
atk-s0508a1:4314_6: paṭipattiṃ attani sañjaggituṃ jāgariyānuyogamanuyuñjitumeva vijānatā viññunā icchitā hotīti.
atk-s0508a1:4315_0: Taṃ sutvā soṇo saṃviggataramānaso hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā abbhokāsikaṅgaṃ adhiṭṭhāya vipassanāya
atk-s0508a1:4315_2: Tattha avapatitanti avamukhaṃ patitaṃ uddhaṃpādaṃ adhomukhaṃ patitaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4315_3: Kuñjaro ce anukkameti kuñjaro anukkameyya ce.
atk-s0508a1:4315_5: yadāhaṃ hatthimāruhitvā saṅgāmaṃ paviṭṭho hatthikkhandhato patito,
atk-s0508a1:4315_6: tadāhaṃ saṅgāme tena hatthinā maddito mato ahosiṃ ce,
atk-s0508a1:4315_10: Imaṃ gāthaṃ vadantoyeva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:4320_0: “Ekatiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ tadā;
atk-s0508a1:4326_0: Pañca kāmaguṇe hitvāti āyasmato nisabhattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:4326_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:4326_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannacitto kapitthaphalamadāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4326_4: So tena puññakammena sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde koliyajanapade kulagehe nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:4326_5: nisabhoti laddhanāmo vayappatto sākiyakoliyānaṃ saṅgāme buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:4332_0: So arahattaṃ pana patvā attano sahāyabhikkhū pamādavihārena kālaṃ vītināmente disvā te ovadanto –
atk-s0508a1:4337_1: bālaputhujjanassa piyāyitabbasabhāvatāya piyarūpe manuññasabhāvatāya manorame rūpādike pañca kāmaguṇe
atk-s0508a1:4337_2: kāmakoṭṭhāse hitvā pahāya pariccajitvā kammaphalasaddhāya ratanattayasaddhāya ca vasena gharā gharabandhanato
atk-s0508a1:4337_3: nikkhamma nikkhamitvā pabbajjaṃ upagato viññujātiko pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya ghaṭento vāyamanto vaṭṭadukkhassa
atk-s0508a1:4337_5: Evaṃ te bhikkhū ovaditvā “ayaṃ pare eva saññāpento viharati,
atk-s0508a1:4337_6: “sayaṃ pana akārako’ti mā cintayitthā”ti tesaṃ attano paṭipannabhāvaṃ pakāsento –
atk-s0508a1:4341_1: Tattha nābhinandāmi maraṇanti maraṇaṃ na abhikaṅkhāmi.
atk-s0508a1:4341_2: Nābhinandāmi jīvitanti idaṃ pana tassa kāraṇavacanaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4341_5: Yo hi āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇāya kilesābhisaṅkhāre ācinoti upacinoti,
atk-s0508a1:4341_6: so punabbhavābhinibbattiṃ abhinandanto nāntariyakatāya attano maraṇampi abhinandati nāma kāraṇassa appahīnattā,
atk-s0508a1:4341_7: khīṇāsavo pana sabbaso ācayagāmidhamme pahāya apacayagāmidhamme patiṭṭhito pariññātavatthuko sabbaso
atk-s0508a1:4341_8: jīvitaṃ anabhinandanto maraṇampi anabhinandati nāma kāraṇassa eva suppahīnattā. Tenāha –
atk-s0508a1:4341_12: yāva parinibbānā avaṭṭhānañca kathanti āha “kālañca paṭikaṅkhāmi,
atk-s0508a1:4341_14: kilesaparinibbāne siddhe satipaññāvepullappattiyā sato sampajāno kevalaṃ khandhaparinibbānakālaṃ paṭikaṅkhāmi,
atk-s0508a1:4341_16: na pana me maraṇe jīvite vā abhinandanā atthi arahattamaggeneva tassa samugghāṭitattāti.
atk-s0508a1:4344_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:4344_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso kosambaphalaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4344_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ sākiyarājakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:4344_5: usabhoti laddhanāmo vayappatto satthu ñātisamāgame buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji.
atk-s0508a1:4344_6: So pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya samaṇadhammaṃ akatvā divā saṅgaṇikārāmo sakalarattiṃ niddāyamāno vītināmeti.
atk-s0508a1:4344_7: So ekadivasaṃ muṭṭhassati asampajāno niddaṃ okkanto supine kesamassuṃ ohāretvā ambapallavavaṇṇaṃ cīvaraṃ
atk-s0508a1:4344_8: pārupitvā hatthigīvāyaṃ nisīditvā nagaraṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ tattheva manusse sampatte disvā lajjāya hatthikkhandhato
atk-s0508a1:4344_10: “īdisaṃ nāma supinaṃ muṭṭhassatinā asampajānena niddāyamānena mayā diṭṭha”nti uppannasaṃvego vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:4347_0: “Ekatiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ tadā;
atk-s0508a1:4350_0: Atha thero yathādiṭṭhaṃ supinaṃ aṅkusaṃ katvā arahattassa adhigatattā tasseva supinassa kittanavasena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:4356_0: Sohaṃ ditto tadā santo, patto me āsavakkhayo”ti. – gāthādvayamāha;
atk-s0508a1:4357_1: aṃse katvāna cīvaranti ambapallavākāraṃ pavāḷavaṇṇaṃ cīvaraṃ khandhe karitvā uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā.
atk-s0508a1:4357_2: Gāmanti attano rājadhāniṃ hatthikkhandhe nisinno piṇḍāya pāvisiṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4357_3: paviṭṭhamattova mahājanena olokiyamāno hatthikkhandhato oruyha ṭhito paṭibujjhiṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4357_4: pabuddhova saṃvegaṃ alabhiṃ tadā “muṭṭhassati asampajāno hutvā niddāyokkamanena etaṃ jāta”nti.
atk-s0508a1:4357_5: Apare pana “rājāva hutvā rattibhāge evarūpaṃ supinaṃ disvā vibhātāya rattiyā hatthikkhandhaṃ āruyha nagaravīthiyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4357_6: caranto taṃ supinaṃ saritvā hatthikkhandhato oruyha saṃvegaṃ labhitvā satthu santike pabbajitvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4357_7: patvā udānaṃ udānento imā gāthā abhāsī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0508a1:4357_8: Dittoti tasmiṃ rājakāle jātimadabhogamadādiparidappito samāno saṃvegamalabhinti yojanā.
atk-s0508a1:4360_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:4360_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ vinatāya nāma nadiyā tīre aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4360_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ duggatakule nibbattitvā yāva vayappatti,
atk-s0508a1:4360_6: tāva aññaṃ upāyaṃ ajānanto kappaṭakhaṇḍanivāsano sarāvahattho tattha tattha kuraṃ pariyesanto vicari,
atk-s0508a1:4360_8: So vayappatto tiṇaṃ vikkiṇitvā jīvikaṃ kappento ekadivasaṃ tiṇalāvanatthaṃ araññaṃ gato tattha aññataraṃ
atk-s0508a1:4360_9: khīṇāsavattheraṃ disvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā nisīdi.
atk-s0508a1:4360_11: So dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho “kiṃ me imāya kicchajīvikāyā”ti pabbajitvā attano nivatthakappaṭacoḷaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nikkhipi.
atk-s0508a1:4360_13: tadā taṃ kappaṭaṃ olokentassa anabhirati vigacchati,
atk-s0508a1:4360_16: Tassa taṃ kāraṇaṃ bhikkhū bhagavato ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4360_17: Athekadivasaṃ kappaṭakuro bhikkhu dhammasabhāyaṃ parisapariyante nisinno niddāyati,
atk-s0508a1:4365_0: “Mā kho tvaṃ kappaṭa pacālesi, mā tvaṃ upakaṇṇamhi tāḷessaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:4366_0: Na hi tvaṃ kappaṭa mattamaññāsi, saṅghamajjhamhi pacalāyamāno”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:4368_0: Tattha ayamiti kappaṭo kappaṭakuroti kappaṭakuro bhikkhu “ayaṃ mama kappaṭo,
atk-s0508a1:4368_1: imaṃ paridahitvā yathā tathā jīvāmī”ti evaṃ uppannamicchāvitakko acchāya atibharitāya amataghaṭikāyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4368_2: mama amataghaṭe tahaṃ tahaṃ vassante “amatamadhigataṃ ahamanusāsāmi,
atk-s0508a1:4368_5: āhañchaṃ amatadundubhi”ntiādinā ghosetvā mayā dhammāmate pavassiyamāne katapadaṃ jhānāni ocetuṃ lokiyalokuttarajjhānāni
atk-s0508a1:4368_6: upacetuṃ bhāvetuṃ katapadaṃ kaṭamaggavihitabhāvanāmaggaṃ idaṃ mama sāsanaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4368_7: tathāpi dhammakaṭamatto mama sāsanadhammato ukkaṇṭhacitto apagatamānaso kappaṭakuroti taṃ codetvā punapissa
atk-s0508a1:4368_8: sahoḍḍhaṃ coraṃ gaṇhanto viya pamādavihāraṃ dassento “mā kho tvaṃ, kappaṭa,
atk-s0508a1:4369_3: “mama dhammaṃ suṇissāmī”ti nisīditvā mā kho pacālesi mā pacalāhi mā niddaṃ upagacchi.
atk-s0508a1:4369_4: Mā tvaṃ upakaṇṇamhi tāḷessanti taṃ niddāyamānaṃ upakaṇṇamhi kaṇṇasamīpe desanāhatthena ahaṃ mā patāḷessaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4369_5: Yathā ito paraṃ kilesappahānāya ahaṃ taṃ na ovadeyyaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4369_9: saṅghamajjhamhi pacalāyamāno mattaṃ pamāṇaṃ na vā maññasi,
atk-s0508a1:4369_11: so mā upajjhagā”ti ettakampi na jānāsi,
atk-s0508a1:4369_12: passa yāva ca te aparaddhanti codesi.
atk-s0508a1:4370_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā dvīhi gāthāhi gāḷhaṃ taṃ niggayha codanāya katāya aṭṭhivedhaviddho viya caṇḍagajo maggaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4370_1: otaranto viya ca sañjātasaṃvego vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:4378_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthārā vuttagāthādvayameva attano arahattādhigamanassa aṅkusabhūtanti paccudāhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4383_0: Aho buddhā aho dhammāti āyasmato kumārakassapattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:4383_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:4383_4: So satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ cittakathikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4383_5: disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ ākaṅkhanto paṇidhānaṃ katvā tadanurūpāni puññāni karonto kassapassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:4383_6: kāle samaṇadhammaṃ katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe seṭṭhidhītāya kucchimhi
atk-s0508a1:4383_8: Sā kira kumārikākāleyeva pabbajitukāmā hutvā mātāpitaro yācitvā pabbajjaṃ alabhamānā kulagharaṃ gatāpi
atk-s0508a1:4383_9: gabbhasaṇṭhitampi ajānantī sāmikaṃ ārādhetvā tena anuññātā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitā.
atk-s0508a1:4383_10: Tassā gabbhinibhāvaṃ disvā bhikkhuniyo devadattaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:4383_14: Thero sāvatthinagaravāsīni kulāni visākhañca upāsikaṃ pakkosāpetvā sarājikāya parisāya vinicchinanto “pure laddho gabbho,
atk-s0508a1:4384_3: Aparabhāge alaṅkaritvā satthu santikaṃ netvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0508a1:4384_5: idaṃ phalaṃ vā khādanīyaṃ vā kassapassa dethā”ti vutte “katarakassapassā”ti.
atk-s0508a1:4384_7: Evaṃ gahitanāmattā rañño posāvanikaputtattā ca vuḍḍhakālepi kumārakassapotveva paññāyittha.
atk-s0508a1:4385_0: So pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya vipassanāya ceva kammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0508a1:4385_2: Atha tena saddhiṃ pabbatamatthake samaṇadhammaṃ katvā anāgāmī hutvā suddhāvāse nibbatto mahābrahmā “vipassanāya
atk-s0508a1:4385_3: mukhaṃ dassetvā maggaphalappattiyā upāyaṃ karissāmī”ti pañcadasa pañhe abhisaṅkharitvā andhavane vasantassa
atk-s0508a1:4385_4: therassa “ime pañhe satthāraṃ puccheyyāsī”ti ācikkhitvā gato.
atk-s0508a1:4385_7: Thero satthārā kathitaniyāmeneva te uggaṇhitvā vipassanaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:4397_0: Nipacca pādamūlamhi, taṃ ṭhāna patthayiṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4405_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:4415_0: Sākhena cattā me mātā, nigrodhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā.
atk-s0508a1:4419_0: Nigrodhasmiṃ mataṃ seyyo, yañce sākhamhi jīvitaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4420_0: “Tenānusiṭṭhā migayūthapena, ahañca mātā ca tathetare ca;
atk-s0508a1:4421_0: Āgamma rammaṃ tusitādhivāsaṃ, gatā pavāsaṃ sagharaṃ yatheva.
atk-s0508a1:4427_0: So avoca vināsetha, pāpikaṃ bhikkhuniṃ imaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4437_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā cittakathikabhāvena satthārā etadagge ṭhapito attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā ratanattayaguṇavibhāvanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:4439_0: “Aho buddhā aho dhammā, aho no satthu sampadā;
atk-s0508a1:4444_0: Jātimaraṇasaṃsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4445_5: Aho no satthu sampadāti amhākaṃ satthu dasabalassa aho sampattiyo.
atk-s0508a1:4445_8: sāvako sacchikāhitīti etādisaṃ evarūpaṃ suvisuddhajjhānābhiññāparivāraṃ anavasesakilesakkhayāvahaṃ santaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4445_9: paṇītaṃ anuttaraṃ dhammaṃ sāvakopi nāma sacchikarissati,
atk-s0508a1:4445_10: tasmā evaṃvidhaguṇavisesādhigamahetubhūtā aho acchariyā buddhā bhagavanto,
atk-s0508a1:4445_12: acchariyā amhākaṃ satthu sampattiyoti ratanattayassa guṇādhimuttiṃ pavedesīti.
atk-s0508a1:4446_0: Evaṃ sādhāraṇavasena dassitaṃ dhammassa sacchikiriyaṃ idāni attupanāyikaṃ katvā dassento “asaṅkheyyesū”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a1:4446_5: Tesamayaṃ pacchimako carimoyaṃ samussayoti yasmā ayaṃ sabbapacchimako,
atk-s0508a1:4446_7: tasmā jātimaraṇasahito khandhādipaṭipāṭisaññito saṃsāro idāni āyatiṃ punabbhavābhāvato punabbhavo natthi,
atk-s0508a1:4449_0: Yo have daharo bhikkhūti āyasmato dhammapālattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:4449_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a1:4449_3: kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto kenacideva karaṇīyena vanantaṃ upagato satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:4449_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde satthari parinibbute avantiraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a1:4449_6: nibbattitvā dhammapāloti laddhanāmo vayappatto takkasilaṃ gantvā sippaṃ uggahetvā paṭinivattento antarāmagge
atk-s0508a1:4449_7: ekasmiṃ vihāre aññataraṃ theraṃ disvā tassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4455_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā samāpattisukhena vītināmento ekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ vihāre dve sāmaṇere rukkhagge pupphāni
atk-s0508a1:4455_1: ocinante ārūḷhasākhāya bhaggāya patante disvā thero iddhānubhāvena hatthena gahetvā arogeyeva bhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4458_0: Jāgaro sa hi suttesu, amoghaṃ tassa jīvitaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4461_0: Anuyuñjetha medhāvī, saraṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti. – imā dve gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4462_7: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti yo bhikkhu daharova samāno taruṇo “tathāhaṃ pacchā vuḍḍhakāle jānissāmī”ti acintetvā
atk-s0508a1:4462_8: buddhānaṃ sāsane appamādapaṭipattiyaṃ yuñjati samathavipassanābhāvanāya yogaṃ karoti,
atk-s0508a1:4462_9: so suttesu avijjāniddāya suttesu pamattesu saddhādijāgaradhammasamannāgamena jāgaro,
atk-s0508a1:4462_10: tato eva attahitaparahitapāripūriyā amoghaṃ avañjhaṃ tassa jīvitaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4462_12: tasmā saddhañca “atthi kammaṃ atthi kammavipāko”tiādinayappavattaṃ kammaphalasaddhañca,
atk-s0508a1:4462_17: vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya pariññādivasena catusaccadhammadassanañca medhāvī dhammojapaññāya
atk-s0508a1:4462_18: samannāgato bhikkhu buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ ovādaṃ anusiṭṭhiṃ anussaranto ādittampi attano sīsaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā
atk-s0508a1:4465_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0508a1:4465_3: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:4465_6: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:4465_7: brahmālīti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patto hetusampattiyā codiyamāno saṃsāre sañjātasaṃvego tādisena kalyāṇamittasannissayena
atk-s0508a1:4465_8: buddhasāsane pabbajitvā patirūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe viharanto ñāṇassa paripākagatattā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a1:4471_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā maggasukhena phalasukhena vītināmento ekadivasaṃ padhānapariggāhakena therena
atk-s0508a1:4471_1: tasmiṃ araññāyatane bhikkhū uddissa vuttaṃ padhānānuyogaṃ pariggaṇhanto –
atk-s0508a1:4474_0: Pahīnamānassa anāsavassa, devāpi kassa pihayanti tādino.
atk-s0508a1:4477_0: Pahīnamānassa anāsavassa, devāpi mayhaṃ pihayanti tādino”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:4479_1: imasmiṃ araññāyatane vasantesu bhikkhūsu kassa bhikkhuno therassa vā navassa vā majjhimassa vā chekena
atk-s0508a1:4479_2: sārathinā sudantā assā viya manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni samathaṃ dantabhāvaṃ nibbisevanabhāvaṃ gatāni.
atk-s0508a1:4479_3: Kassa navavidhampi mānaṃ pahāya ṭhitattā pahīnamānassa catunnampi āsavānaṃ abhāvena anāsavassa iṭṭhādīsu
atk-s0508a1:4479_4: tādilakkhaṇappattiyā tādino devāpi pihayanti manussāpi sammāpaṭipattidassanādinā ca ādarena patthentīti.
atk-s0508a1:4480_0: Tattha ca gāthāyaṃ purimaḍḍhena anāgāmimaggādhigamo puṭṭho,
atk-s0508a1:4480_1: anāgāminopi hi indriyāni pahīnakāmarāgabyāpādatāya samathaṃ nibbisevanataṃ gatāni honti.
atk-s0508a1:4480_3: arahā hi “pahīnamāno anāsavo tādī”ti ca vuccati.
atk-s0508a1:4481_0: Athāyasmā brahmāli padhānapariggāhakena vuttaṃ “kassindriyānī”ti gāthaṃ paccanubhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4481_1: Tadatthaṃ attūpanāyikavasena vissajjento “mayhindriyānī”tiādikāya dutiyagāthāya aññaṃ byākāsi,
atk-s0508a1:4484_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4484_3: satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ lūkhacīvaradharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā
atk-s0508a1:4484_4: taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ ākaṅkhanto paṇidhānaṃ katvā tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto atthadassissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:4484_5: kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato brāhmaṇamāṇave vijjāsippāni sikkhāpento
atk-s0508a1:4484_6: ekadivasaṃ atthadassiṃ bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0508a1:4484_7: vanditvā sirasi añjaliṃ katvā “yāvatā rūpino sattā”tiādinā chahi gāthāhi abhitthavitvā bhājanaṃ pūretvā
atk-s0508a1:4485_0: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle kaṭṭhavāhanassa nāma rañño amacco
atk-s0508a1:4485_1: hutvā tena satthu ānayanatthaṃ purisasahassena pesito satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:4485_2: pabbajitvā vīsativassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṃ katvā tato cuto ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ sugatīsuyeva parivattento
atk-s0508a1:4485_3: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā mogharājāti laddhanāmo bāvarībrāhmaṇassa santike uggahitasippo
atk-s0508a1:4485_4: saṃvegajāto tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tāpasasahassaparivāro ajitādīhi saddhiṃ satthu santikaṃ pesito
atk-s0508a1:4485_5: tesaṃ pannarasamo hutvā pañhe pucchitvā pañhavissajjanapariyosāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:4493_0: Sabbe te tava ñāṇamhi, anto honti samogadhā.
atk-s0508a1:4495_0: Ye keci udake pāṇā, antojāle bhavanti te.
atk-s0508a1:4497_0: Sabbe te tava ñāṇamhi, anto honti samogadhā.
atk-s0508a1:4499_0: Tava dhammaṃ suṇitvāna, kaṅkhāsotaṃ taranti te.
atk-s0508a1:4509_0: Mama cittaṃ pasādento, imā gāthā abhāsatha.
atk-s0508a1:4511_0: Tena cittappasādena, duggatiṃ so na gacchati.
atk-s0508a1:4525_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthalūkhaṃ suttalūkhaṃ rajanalūkhanti visesena tividhenapi lūkhena samannāgataṃ paṃsukūlaṃ dhāresi.
atk-s0508a1:4525_1: Tena naṃ satthā lūkhacīvaradharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a1:4525_2: Aparabhāge purimakammappaccayā parihārassa akaraṇato therassa sarīre daddupīḷakādīni uppajjitvā vaḍḍhiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:4525_3: So “senāsanaṃ dussatī”ti hemantepi magadhakkhettesu palālasanthārāni attharitvā seti.
atk-s0508a1:4525_4: Taṃ ekadivasaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ satthā paṭisanthāravasena “chavipāpakā”tiādinā paṭhamagāthāya pucchi.
atk-s0508a1:4526_1: Tattha chavipāpakāti daddukacchupīḷakāhi bhinnacchavibhāvato hīnacchavika duṭṭhacchavika.
atk-s0508a1:4526_2: Cittabhaddakāti anavasesakilesappahānena brahmavihārasevanāya ca bhaddacitta sundaracitta.
atk-s0508a1:4526_4: Satataṃ samāhitoti aggaphalasamādhinā niccakālaṃ abhiṇhaṃ samāhitamānaso.
atk-s0508a1:4526_9: Bhikkhu tvaṃ sīti bhikkhu ko tvaṃ asi,
atk-s0508a1:4526_10: evaṃbhūto paresu tava senāsanaṃ katvā adentesu saṅghikañca senāsanaṃ apavisanto.
atk-s0508a1:4526_11: Kathaṃ karissasīti yathāvutte sītakāle kathaṃ attabhāvaṃ pavattesīti satthā pucchi.
atk-s0508a1:4526_12: Evaṃ pana puṭṭho thero satthu tamatthaṃ kathento –
atk-s0508a1:4530_3: tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīvasena “magadhā”tveva bahuvacanena vuccati.
atk-s0508a1:4530_5: Iti me sutanti evaṃ mayā sutaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4530_8: Tena edise kāle magadhesu yattha katthaci mayā vasituṃ sakkāti dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:4530_10: yathaññe sukhajīvinoti yathā aññe sukhajīvino bhikkhū senāsanasappāyaṃ laddhā sundarehi attharaṇapāvuraṇehi sukhena sayanti,
atk-s0508a1:4530_11: evaṃ ahampi palālasanthārameva heṭṭhā santharitvā upari tiriyañca palālacchadaneneva chāditasarīratāya palālacchannako seyyaṃ sayiṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4533_0: Na ukkhipe no ca parikkhipe pareti āyasmato visākhassa pañcālaputtassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:4533_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito cuddase
atk-s0508a1:4533_3: kappe paccantagāme daliddakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ phalapariyesanaṃ carantehi tasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:4533_4: gāme manussehi saddhiṃ araññaṃ gato tattha ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ disvā pasannamānaso valliphalaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4533_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe maṇḍalikarājakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:4533_6: visākhoti laddhanāmo pañcālarājadhītuyā puttabhāvato pacchā pañcālaputtoti paññāyittha.
atk-s0508a1:4533_7: So pitari mate rajjaṃ kārento satthari attano gāmasamīpagate satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:4533_8: pabbajitvā satthārā saddhiṃ sāvatthiṃ gato vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:4541_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā thero ñātīnaṃ anukampāya jātibhūmiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4541_1: Tattha manussā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā kālena kālaṃ dhammaṃ suṇantā ekadivasaṃ “katihi nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0508a1:4541_2: aṅgehi samannāgato dhammakathiko hotī”ti dhammakathikalakkhaṇaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:4543_0: “Na ukkhipe no ca parikkhipe pare, na okkhipe pāragataṃ na eraye;
atk-s0508a1:4544_0: Na cattavaṇṇaṃ parisāsu byāhare, anuddhato sammitabhāṇi subbato.
atk-s0508a1:4547_0: Saṃsevitabuddhasīlinā, nibbānaṃ na hi tena dullabha”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:4549_0: Tattha na ukkhipeti attānaṃ na ukkhipeyya,
atk-s0508a1:4549_1: jātiādīhi bāhusaccādīhi ca attukkaṃsanaṃ na kareyya.
atk-s0508a1:4549_2: No ca parikkhipe pareti pare parapuggale teheva jātiādīhi no parikkhipe paricchinditvā na khipeyya guṇaparidhaṃsanavasena vā na khipeyya.
atk-s0508a1:4549_4: Pare ojjhāpanavasena na okkhipe heṭṭhato katvā pare na olokāpeyya,
atk-s0508a1:4549_8: Pāragatanti saṃsārapāraṃ viya vijjāya pāraṃ gataṃ khīṇāsavaṃ tevijjaṃ chaḷabhiññaṃ vā na eraye na ghaṭṭaye na āsādeyya.
atk-s0508a1:4549_9: Na cattavaṇṇaṃ parisāsu byāhareti attano vaṇṇaṃ guṇaṃ lābhasakkārasilokaṃ nikāmayamāno khattiyaparisādīsu na bhāseyya.
atk-s0508a1:4549_13: kālena sāpadesaṃ pariyantavatiṃ atthasañhitameva vācaṃ bhāsanasīloti attho.
atk-s0508a1:4549_14: Ito aññathā vadantassa vacanaṃ agahaṇīyaṃ hoti.
atk-s0508a1:4550_0: Evaṃ thero saṅkhepeneva dhammakathikalakkhaṇaṃ vatvā tesaṃ guṇānaṃ attani labbhamānataṃ adhimuccitvā
atk-s0508a1:4550_1: bhiyyosomattāya abhippasannaṃ mahājanaṃ ñatvā “evaṃvidhassa dhammakathikassa vimuttāyatanasannissitassa
atk-s0508a1:4553_0: Nadanti morā susikhā supekhuṇāti āyasmato cūḷakattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:4553_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto ito ekatiṃse
atk-s0508a1:4553_3: kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:4553_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā cūḷakoti
atk-s0508a1:4553_6: laddhanāmo vayappatto dhanapāladamane satthari laddhappasādo pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto indasālaguhāyaṃ vasati,
atk-s0508a1:4553_7: so ekadivasaṃ guhādvāre nisinno magadhakkhettaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0508a1:4553_8: Tasmiṃ khaṇe pāvusakālamegho gambhīramadhuranigghoso satapaṭalasahassapaṭalo añjana sikharasannikāso nabhaṃ pūretvā pavassati,
atk-s0508a1:4553_9: mayūrasaṅghā ca meghagajjitaṃ sutvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā kekāsaddaṃ muñcitvā tattha tattha padese naccantā vicaranti.
atk-s0508a1:4553_10: Therassapi āvāsagabbhe meghavātaphassehi apagatadhammattā passaddhakarajakāye kallataṃ patte utusappāyalābhena cittaṃ ekaggaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0508a1:4553_12: so taṃ ñatvā kālasampadādikittanamukhena attānaṃ bhāvanāya ussāhento –
atk-s0508a1:4555_0: “Nadanti morā susikhā supekhuṇā, sunīlagīvā sumukhā sugajjino;
atk-s0508a1:4556_0: Susaddalā cāpi mahāmahī ayaṃ, subyāpitambu suvalāhakaṃ nabhaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4559_0: Susukkasukkaṃ nipuṇaṃ sududdasaṃ, phusāhi taṃ uttamamaccutaṃ pada”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:4561_1: sunīlagīvā sumukhā sugajjinoti ete matthake uṭṭhitāhi sundarāhi sikhāhi samannāgatattā susikhā,
atk-s0508a1:4561_2: nānāvaṇṇehi anekehi sobhanehi bhaddakapiñchehi samannāgatattā supekhuṇā,
atk-s0508a1:4561_3: rājīvavaṇṇasaṅkāsāya sundarāya nīlavaṇṇāya gīvāya samannāgatattā sunīlagīvā,
atk-s0508a1:4561_6: morā sikhaṇḍino chajjasaṃvādī kekāsaddaṃ muñcantā nadanti ravanti.
atk-s0508a1:4561_7: Susaddalā cāpi mahāmahī ayanti ayañca mahāpathavī susaddalā sundaraharitatiṇā.
atk-s0508a1:4561_8: Subyāpitambūti abhinavavuṭṭhiyā tahaṃ tahaṃ vissandamānasalilatāya suṭṭhu byāpitajalā vitatajalā.
atk-s0508a1:4561_11: Suvalāhakaṃ nabhanti idañca nabhaṃ ākāsaṃ nīluppaladalasannibhehi samantato pūretvā ṭhitehi sundarehi valāhakehi meghehi suvalāhakaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4562_0: Sukallarūpo sumanassa jhāyatanti idāni utusappāyalābhena suṭṭhu kallarūpo kammaniyasabhāvo tvaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4562_1: nīvaraṇehi anajjhārūḷhacittatāya sundaramanassa yogāvacarassa yaṃ ārammaṇūpanijjhānavasena lakkhaṇūpanijjhānavasena ca jhāyataṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4562_3: accutaṃ padanti evaṃ jhāyanto ca sādhu subuddhassa sammāsambuddhassa sāsane sundaranikkamo hutvā suparisuddhasīlatāya susukkaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4562_8: niccasabhāvatāya accutaṃ padaṃ taṃ nibbānaṃ phusāhi attapaccakkhakaraṇena sammāpaṭipattiyā sacchikarohīti.
atk-s0508a1:4563_0: Evaṃ thero attānaṃ ovadantova utusappāyalābhena samāhitacitto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:4571_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā thero attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā pītisomanassajāto “nadanti morā”tiādinā tāyeva gāthā paccudāhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4574_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito ekatiṃse
atk-s0508a1:4574_3: kappe kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ padumaṃ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ rathiyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4574_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe ibbhakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:4574_6: rūpasampattiyā anūpamoti laddhanāmo vayappatto upanissayasampannatāya kāme pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a1:4577_0: Tena teneva vajasi, yena sūlaṃ kaliṅgaraṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4580_0: Satthā te dullabho laddho, mānatthe maṃ niyojayī”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:4582_0: Tattha nandamānāgataṃ cittāti nandamāna abhinandamāna citta abhinandamānaṃ āgataṃ uppannaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4582_1: Sūlamāropamānakanti dukkhuppattiṭṭhānatāya sūlasadisattā sūlaṃ taṃ taṃ bhavaṃ kammakilesehi ettakaṃ kālaṃ āropiyamānaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4582_3: yena sūlaṃ kaliṅgaranti yattha yattha sūlasaṅkhātā bhavā kaliṅgarasaṅkhātā adhikuṭṭanakā kāmaguṇā ca tena teneva,
atk-s0508a1:4583_0: Tāhaṃ cittakaliṃ brūmīti taṃ tasmā pamattabhāvato cittakaliṃ cittakālakaṇṇiṃ ahaṃ kathayāmi.
atk-s0508a1:4583_1: Punapi taṃ brūmi kathemi cittadubbhakaṃ cittasaṅkhātassa attano bahūpakārassa santānassa anatthāvahanato cittadubbhiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4583_7: Kappānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyampi nāma buddhasuñño loko hoti,
atk-s0508a1:4583_9: laddhesu ca tesu satthāpi dullabhoyeva hoti.
atk-s0508a1:4583_10: Evaṃ dullabho satthā idāni tayā laddho,
atk-s0508a1:4583_11: tasmiṃ laddhe sampatipi anatthe ahite āyatiñca anatthāvahe dukkhāvahe akusale maṃ mā niyojesīti.
atk-s0508a1:4583_12: Evaṃ thero attano cittaṃ ovadanto eva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:4585_0: Disvāna taṃ ahaṃ buddhaṃ, sayambhuṃ aparājitaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4593_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito pañcasaṭṭhime kappe ekasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:4593_3: paccantagāme nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto vanacarako hutvā vicaranto ekadivasaṃ upasantaṃ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4593_5: So tassa upasamaṃ disvā pasannamānaso campakapupphena pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4593_6: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe ibbhakule nibbatto jātadivasato paṭṭhāya mātugāmahatthaṃ gato rodati.
atk-s0508a1:4593_7: Brahmalokato kira cavitvā idhāgato yasmā mātugāmasamphassaṃ na sahati,
atk-s0508a1:4593_9: So vayappatto satthu yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā tadaheva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:4601_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā attano pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā dhammasaṃvegena –
atk-s0508a1:4607_0: Sabbā gatī samucchinnā, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti. – dve gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4608_1: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave ādānanikkhepavasena aparāparaṃ sandhāvanto.
atk-s0508a1:4608_4: Parivattisanti ghaṭīyantaṃ viya paribbhamanto cavanupapajjanavasena aparāparaṃ parivattiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4608_7: Dukkhādīni cattāri ariyasaccāni ñāṇacakkhunā apassanto appaṭivijjhanto,
atk-s0508a1:4608_8: tato eva avijjandhatāya andhabhūto puthūnaṃ jananādīhi kāraṇehi puthujjano honto gatīsu parivattisanti yojanā,
atk-s0508a1:4609_2: ariyasaccānaṃ ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva tumhākañcā”ti.
atk-s0508a1:4610_0: Tassa mayhaṃ vuttanayena pubbe puthujjanasseva sato idāni satthārā dinnanayena appamattassa appamādapaṭipattiyā
atk-s0508a1:4610_2: Saṃsārā vinaḷīkatāti saṃsaranti sattā etehīti “saṃsārā”ti laddhanāmā kammakilesā aggamaggena samucchinnattā vigatanaḷā nimmūlā katā.
atk-s0508a1:4610_3: Sabbā gatī samucchinnāti evaṃ kammakilesavaṭṭānaṃ vinaḷīkatattā nirayādikā sabbāpi gatiyo sammadeva ucchinnā viddhaṃsitā,
atk-s0508a1:4610_4: tato eva natthi dāni āyatiṃ punabbhavoti idameva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosīti.
atk-s0508a1:4613_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekatiṃse kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle eko gopālako ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:4613_3: So satthari parinibbute aññataraṃ theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa santike buddhaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4613_4: sutvā pasannamānaso “kuhiṃ bhagavā”ti pucchitvā parinibbutabhāvaṃ sutvā “evaṃ mahānubhāvā buddhāpi nāma
atk-s0508a1:4613_8: So kālena kālaṃ bodhirukkhasamīpaṃ gantvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā buddhaguṇe anussaranto bodhiṃ vandati.
atk-s0508a1:4613_9: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe ibbhakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:4613_10: sandhitoti laddhanāmo vayappatto aniccatāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā saṃvegajāto pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4613_11: paṭṭhapetvā ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:4613_12: So attano pubbenivāsaṃ anussaranto sikhissa bhagavato kāle bodhivandanaṃ buddhānussatiṃ aniccasaññāpaṭilābhañca
atk-s0508a1:4619_0: Tassā saññāya vāhasā, patto me āsavakkhayo”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:4621_1: yvāyaṃ etarahi amhākaṃ bhagavato bodhirukkho assattho,
atk-s0508a1:4621_2: etassa ṭhāne tadā sikhissa bhagavato bodhirukkho puṇḍarīko ṭhitoti so assatthaṭṭhānīyatāya “assatthe”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4621_4: Apare pana “assattharukkhamūle nisīditvā tadā buddhānussatiyā bhāvitattā thero ‘assatthe’ti avocā”ti vadanti.
atk-s0508a1:4621_10: alabhitthaṃ patissatoti buddhārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇassa ekajātiyattā ekaṃ “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinayappavattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4621_11: buddhānussatisahagataṃ saññaṃ buddhaguṇānaṃ patipatisaraṇato patissato hutvā alabhiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4622_2: Ito bhaddakappato uddhaṃ ārohanavasena ekatiṃse kappe.
atk-s0508a1:4622_4: yaṃ vā buddhānaṃ aniccataṃ disvā tadanusārena sabbāsaṅkhāresu tadā aniccasaññaṃ alabhiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4622_5: Tassā saññāya vāhasāti tassā yathāvuttāya saññāya kāraṇabhāvena taṃ upanissayaṃ katvā.
atk-s0508a1:4622_6: Patto me āsavakkhayoti idāni mayā āsavānaṃ khayo nirodho adhigatoti imāyeva ca imassa therassa apadānagāthāpi. Yathāha –
atk-s0508a1:4632_0: Tikanipāte ayoni suddhimanvesanti āyasmato aṅgaṇikabhāradvājattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:4632_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito ekatiṃse
atk-s0508a1:4632_3: kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4632_4: disvā pasannamānaso pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā añjaliṃ paggaṇhi.
atk-s0508a1:4632_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde himavantasamīpe ukkaṭṭhe nāma nagare
atk-s0508a1:4632_6: vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa gehe nibbattitvā aṅgaṇikabhāradvājoti laddhanāmo vayappatto vijjāsippesu
atk-s0508a1:4632_7: nipphattiṃ gato nekkhammajjhāsayatāya paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā amaraṃ tapaṃ caranto tattha tattha
atk-s0508a1:4632_8: vicaranto sammāsambuddhaṃ janapadacārikaṃ carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā taṃ
atk-s0508a1:4632_9: micchātapaṃ pahāya sāsane pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:4640_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā vimuttisukhena viharanto ñātīnaṃ anukampāya attano jātibhūmiṃ gantvā bahū ñātake
atk-s0508a1:4640_1: saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpetvā tato nivattitvā kururaṭṭhe kuṇḍiyassa nāma nigamassa avidūre araññe
atk-s0508a1:4640_2: vasanto kenacideva karaṇīyena uggārāmaṃ gato uttarāpathato āgatehi sandiṭṭhehi brāhmaṇehi samāgato tehi,
atk-s0508a1:4640_4: kiṃ disvā brāhmaṇānaṃ samayaṃ pahāya imaṃ samayaṃ gaṇhī”ti pucchito tesaṃ ito buddhasāsanato bahiddhā suddhi natthīti dassento –
atk-s0508a1:4643_0: Suddhimaggaṃ ajānanto, akāsiṃ amaraṃ tapa”nti. – paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a1:4644_3: Aggiṃ paricariṃ vaneti “ayaṃ suddhimaggo”ti adhippāyena araññāyatane aggihutasālāyaṃ agyāgāraṃ katvā
atk-s0508a1:4644_4: āhutiṃ paggaṇhanto aggidevaṃ paricariṃ vede vuttavidhinā pūjesiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4644_6: akāsiṃ amaraṃ tapanti suddhiyā nibbānassa maggaṃ ajānanto aggiparicaraṇaṃ viya pañcatapatappanādiattakilamathānuyogaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4645_0: Evaṃ thero assamato assamaṃ gacchanto viya vede vuttavidhinā aggiparicaraṇādinā anuṭṭhāya suddhiyā appattabhāvena
atk-s0508a1:4645_1: bahiddhā suddhiyā abhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni imasmiṃyeva sāsane suddhi ca mayā adhigatāti dassento –
atk-s0508a1:4648_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. – dutiyagāthamāha;
atk-s0508a1:4649_0: Tattha tanti yassatthāya suddhiṃ anvesanto tassa maggaṃ ajānanto aggiṃ paricariṃ amaraṃ tapaṃ acariṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4649_1: taṃ nibbānasukhaṃ sukhena samathavipassanāya sukhāya paṭipadāya attakilamathānuyogaṃ anupagamma mayā laddhaṃ pattaṃ adhigataṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4649_2: Passa dhammasudhammatanti satthu sāsanadhammassa sudhammataṃ aviparītaniyyānikadhammasabhāvaṃ passa jānāhīti dhammālapanavasena vadati,
atk-s0508a1:4651_2: Evaṃ suddhiyā adhigatattā “ito paṭṭhāyāhaṃ paramatthato brāhmaṇo”ti dassento –
atk-s0508a1:4654_0: Tevijjo nhātakocamhi, sottiyo camhi vedagū”ti. – tatiyaṃ gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a1:4655_1: ito pubbe jātimattena brāhmaṇabhāvato brāhmaṇānaṃ samaññāya brahmabandhu nāma āsiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4655_2: Bāhitapāpattā pana idāni kho arahattādhigamena paramatthato brāhmaṇo ca amhi.
atk-s0508a1:4655_3: Ito pubbe bhavasañcayakarānaṃ tissannaṃ vedasaṅkhātānaṃ vijjānaṃ ajjhayanena samaññāmattena tevijjo nāma
atk-s0508a1:4655_4: hutvā idāni bhavakkhayakarāya vijjāya vasena tissannaṃ vijjānaṃ adhigatattā paramatthato tevijjo ca amhi.
atk-s0508a1:4655_5: Tathā ito pubbe bhavassādagadhitāya nhātakavatanipphattiyā samaññāmattena nhātako nāma hutvā idāni aṭṭhaṅgikamaggajalena
atk-s0508a1:4655_7: Ito pubbe avimuttabhavassādamantajjhānena vohāramattato sottiyo nāma hutvā idāni suvimuttabhavassādadhammajjhānena paramatthato sottiyo camhi.
atk-s0508a1:4655_8: Ito pubbe appaṭinissaṭṭhapāpadhammānaṃ vedānaṃ gatamattena vedagū nāma hutvā idāni vedasaṅkhātena maggañāṇena
atk-s0508a1:4655_9: saṃsāramahoghassa vedassa catusaccassa ca pāraṃ gatattā adhigatattā ñātattā paramatthato vedagū jātoti.
atk-s0508a1:4655_10: Taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇā sāsane uḷāraṃ pasādaṃ pavedesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4658_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa
atk-s0508a1:4658_3: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ vinatāya nāma nadiyā tīre gacchantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4658_4: disvā pasannamānaso manuññadassanāni mahantāni udumbaraphalāni ocinitvā upanāmesi.
atk-s0508a1:4658_5: So tena puññakammena sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ bhaddakappe kassape bhagavati loke uppajjitvā pavattavaradhammacakke
atk-s0508a1:4658_6: veneyyajanānuggahaṃ karonte tassa sāsane pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā bhāvanamanuyuñjanto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4659_0: Ativiya sañjātasaṃvego vihāre nisinno “arahattaṃ appatvā ito na nikkhamissāmī”ti cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāya vāyamanto
atk-s0508a1:4659_2: So kālaṅkatvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rohitanagare khattiyakule nibbattitvā paccayoti
atk-s0508a1:4659_3: laddhanāmo vayappatto pitu accayena rajje patiṭṭhito ekadivasaṃ mahārājabaliṃ kātuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0508a1:4659_5: Tasmiṃ samāgame tassa pasādañjananatthaṃ satthā mahājanassa pekkhantasseva ākāse vessavaṇena nimmite
atk-s0508a1:4659_8: Taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā paccayarājāpi rajjaṃ pahāya purimahetusañcodito pabbaji.
atk-s0508a1:4659_9: So yathā kassapassa bhagavato kāle paṭiññaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0508a1:4659_10: evaṃ paṭiññaṃ katvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā tāvadeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:4669_0: Na vihārā nikkhamissaṃ, iti katvāna mānasaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4672_0: Pattomhi acalaṃ ṭhānaṃ, phusitvā accutaṃ padaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4674_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattikittanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:4677_0: Vihāraṃ me paviṭṭhassa, cetaso paṇidhī ahu.
atk-s0508a1:4683_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:4685_10: cetaso paṇidhī ahūti evaṃ sekhassa me vasanakavihāraṃ ovarakaṃ paviṭṭhassa sato evarūpo idāni vuccamānākāro cetopaṇidhi ahosi,
atk-s0508a1:4686_1: Tattha nāsissanti yaṃkiñci bhojanaṃ na bhuñjissaṃ na bhuñjissāmi taṇhāsalle mama hadayagate anūhate anuddhateti evaṃ sabbapadesu yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4686_2: Na pivissāmīti yaṃkiñci pātabbaṃ na pivissāmi.
atk-s0508a1:4686_3: Vihārato na nikkhameti imasmā idāni mayā nisinnagabbhato na nikkhameyyaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4686_4: Napi passaṃ nipātessanti mama sarīrassa dvīsu passesu ekampi passaṃ kāyakilamathavinodanatthaṃ na nipātessaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4687_0: Tassa mevaṃ viharatoti tassa me evaṃ cittaṃ paṇidhāya daḷhavīriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā vipassanānuyogavasena viharato.
atk-s0508a1:4687_1: Passa vīriyaparakkamanti vidhinā īrayitabbato “vīriyaṃ” paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato “parakkamo”ti ca laddhanāmaṃ ussoḷhībhūtaṃ vāyāmaṃ passa jānāhi.
atk-s0508a1:4687_2: Yassa panānubhāvena mayā tisso vijjā anuppattā,
atk-s0508a1:4690_0: Yo pubbe karaṇīyānīti āyasmato bākulattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:4690_2: Ayampi kira atīte ito kappasatasahassādhikassa asaṅkhyeyyassa matthake anomadassissa bhagavato uppattito
atk-s0508a1:4690_3: puretarameva brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvā tattha sāraṃ apassanto “samparāyikatthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4690_4: gavesissāmī”ti isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pabbatapāde viharanto pañcābhiññāaṭṭhasamāpattilābhī hutvā viharanto
atk-s0508a1:4690_5: buddhuppādaṃ sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhito satthu udarābādhe uppanne
atk-s0508a1:4690_6: araññato bhesajjāni āharitvā taṃ vūpasametvā tattha puññaṃ ārogyatthāya pariṇāmetvā tato cuto brahmaloke
atk-s0508a1:4690_7: nibbattitvā ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:4690_8: nibbatto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ appābādhānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayaṃ taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ ākaṅkhanto
atk-s0508a1:4690_9: paṇidhānaṃ katvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto vipassissa bhagavato nibbattito
atk-s0508a1:4690_10: puretarameva bandhumatīnagare brāhmaṇakule nibbatto purimanayeneva isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā jhānābhiññālābhī
atk-s0508a1:4690_11: hutvā pabbatapāde vasanto buddhuppādaṃ sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhito
atk-s0508a1:4690_12: bhikkhūnaṃ tiṇapupphakaroge uppanne taṃ vūpasametvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto brahmaloke nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:4690_13: ekanavutikappe devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā gharāvāsaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4690_14: vasanto ekaṃ jiṇṇaṃ vinassamānaṃ mahāvihāraṃ disvā tattha uposathāgārādikaṃ sabbaṃ āvasathaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0508a1:4690_15: tattha bhikkhusaṅghassa sabbaṃ bhesajjaṃ paṭiyādetvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:4690_16: saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato uppattito puretarameva kosambiyaṃ seṭṭhigehe nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:4690_17: So arogabhāvāya mahāyamunāya nhāpiyamāno dhātiyā hatthato macchena gilito macche kevaṭṭahatthagate bārāṇasiseṭṭhibhariyāya
atk-s0508a1:4690_18: vikkiṇitvā gahite phāliyamānepi puññabalena arogoyeva hutvā tāya puttoti gahetvā posiyamāno taṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:4690_20: detha no putta”nti anuyoge kate raññā “ubhayesampi sādhāraṇo hotū”ti dvinnaṃ kulānaṃ dāyādabhāvena vinicchayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4690_21: katvā ṭhapitattā bākuloti laddhanāmo vayappatto hutvā mahatiṃ sampattiṃ anubhavanto āsītiko hutvā satthu
atk-s0508a1:4690_22: santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā sattāhameva puthujjano ahosi,
atk-s0508a1:4690_23: aṭṭhame aruṇe saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:4694_0: Kapitthā ca bahū tattha, pupphitā jīvajīvakā.
atk-s0508a1:4696_0: Phārusakā alābū ca, puṇḍarīkā ca pupphitā.
atk-s0508a1:4698_0: Mahānāmā bahū tattha, ajjunā ca piyaṅgukā.
atk-s0508a1:4700_0: Ediso assamo mayhaṃ, sasissohaṃ tahiṃ vasiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4719_0: “Yo me pādāsi bhesajjaṃ, byādhiñca samayī mama;
atk-s0508a1:4722_0: Vādite tūriye tattha, modissati sadā ayaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4732_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:4736_0: Bākulo nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a1:4744_0: Khepetuṃ neva sakkomi, tadā hi sukataṃ mama.
atk-s0508a1:4745_0: “Lābhā mama suladdhaṃ me, yohaṃ addakkhi nāyakaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:4752_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā ekadivasaṃ satthārā attano sāvake paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantare ṭhapentena appābādhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4752_1: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito so parinibbānasamaye saṅghamajjhe bhikkhūnaṃ ovādamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:4755_0: Sukhā so dhaṃsate ṭhānā, pacchā ca manutappati.
atk-s0508a1:4757_0: “Yañhi kayirā tañhi vade, yaṃ na kayirā na taṃ vade;
atk-s0508a1:4761_0: Asokaṃ virajaṃ khemaṃ, yattha dukkhaṃ nirujjhatī”ti. – gāthāttayamabhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4762_1: pacchā so kātumicchatīti yo puggalo pubbe puretaraṃ jarārogādīhi anabhibhūtakāleyeva kātabbāni attano
atk-s0508a1:4762_2: hitasukhāvahāni kammāni pamādavasena akatvā pacchā so kātabbakālaṃ atikkamitvā kātuṃ icchati.
atk-s0508a1:4762_4: Tadā pana jarārogādīhi abhibhūtattā kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0508a1:4762_5: asakkonto ca sukhā so dhaṃsate ṭhānā,
atk-s0508a1:4762_6: pacchā ca manutappatīti so puggalo sukhā ṭhānā saggato nibbānato ca tadupāyassa anuppāditattā parihāyanto
atk-s0508a1:4762_7: “akataṃ me kalyāṇa”ntiādinā pacchā ca anutappati vippaṭisāraṃ āpajjati. Ma-
atk-s0508a1:4762_9: Ahaṃ pana karaṇīyaṃ katvā eva tumhe evaṃ vadāmīti dassento “yañhi kayirā”ti dutiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a1:4763_0: Tattha parijānantīti “ettako aya”nti paricchijja jānanti na bahuṃ maññantīti attho.
atk-s0508a1:4763_1: Sammāpaṭipattivasena hi yathāvādī tathākārī eva sobhati,
atk-s0508a1:4763_3: Karaṇīyapariyāyena sādhāraṇato vuttamatthaṃ idāni sarūpato dassetuṃ “susukhaṃ vatā”tiādinā tatiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a1:4763_5: sammā sāmaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddhena bhagavatā desitaṃ sabbaso sokahetūnaṃ abhāvato
atk-s0508a1:4763_6: asokaṃ vigatarāgādirajattā virajaṃ catūhi yogehi anupaddutattā khemaṃ nibbānaṃ suṭṭhu sukhaṃ vata, kasmā?
atk-s0508a1:4763_7: Yattha yasmiṃ nibbāne sakalaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ nirujjhati accantameva vūpasamatīti.
atk-s0508a1:4766_0: Sukhañce jīvituṃ iccheti āyasmato dhaniyattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:4766_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:4766_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso naḷamālāya pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4766_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe kumbhakārakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:4766_6: Tena ca samayena satthā dhaniyassa kumbhakārassa sālāyaṃ nisīditvā pukkusātissa kulaputtassa chadhātuvibhaṅgasuttaṃ desesi.
atk-s0508a1:4766_8: Dhaniyo tassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ sutvā “niyyānikaṃ vata buddhasāsanaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4766_9: yattha ekarattiparicayenāpi vaṭṭadukkhato muñcituṃ sakkā”ti paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kuṭimaṇḍanānuyutto
atk-s0508a1:4766_10: viharanto kuṭikaraṇaṃ paṭicca bhagavatā garahito saṅghike senāsane vasanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:4776_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā ye bhikkhū dhutaṅgasamādhānena attānaṃ ukkaṃsetvā saṅghabhattādiṃ sādiyante aññe bhikkhū avajānanti,
atk-s0508a1:4785_0: Itarītarena tusseyya, ekadhammañca bhāvaye”ti. – tisso gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4786_1: sāmaññasmiṃ apekkhavāti sāmaññasmiṃ samaṇabhāve apekkhavā sikkhāya tibbagāravo hutvā sukhaṃ jīvituṃ iccheyya ce,
atk-s0508a1:4786_2: anesanaṃ pahāya sāmaññasukhena sace jīvitukāmoti attho.
atk-s0508a1:4786_4: cīvaraṃ pānabhojananti saṅghato ābhataṃ cīvaraṃ āhāraṃ na avamaññeyya,
atk-s0508a1:4786_5: saṅghassa uppajjanakalābho nāma parisuddhuppādo hotīti taṃ paribhuñjantassa ājīvapārisuddhisambhavena sāmaññasukhaṃ hatthagatamevāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:4786_6: Ahi mūsikasobbhaṃvāti ahi viya mūsikāya khatabilaṃ sevetha seveyya senāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4786_7: Yathā nāma sappo sayamattano āsayaṃ akatvā mūsikāya aññena vā kate āsaye vasitvā yena kāmaṃ pakkamati,
atk-s0508a1:4786_8: evamevaṃ bhikkhu sayaṃ senāsanakaraṇā saṃkilesaṃ anāpajjitvā yattha katthaci vasitvā pakkameyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:4787_0: Idāni vutte avutte ca paccaye yathālābhasantoseneva sāmaññasukhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0508a1:4787_2: yena kenaci hīnena vā paṇītena vā yathāladdhena paccayena santosaṃ āpajjeyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:4787_4: tañhi anuyuñjantassa anavajjaṃ sabbaṃ lokiyasukhaṃ lokuttarasukhañca hatthagatameva hoti.
atk-s0508a1:4790_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle himavantasamīpe mahato jātassarassa heṭṭhā mahati nāgabhavane
atk-s0508a1:4790_3: mahānubhāvo nāgarājā hutvā nibbatto ekadivasaṃ nāgabhavanato nikkhamitvā vicaranto satthāraṃ ākāsena
atk-s0508a1:4790_4: gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso attano sīsamaṇinā pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4790_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe mātaṅgassa nāma kuṭumbikassa
atk-s0508a1:4790_7: So viññutaṃ patto alasajātiko hutvā kiñci kammaṃ akaronto ñātakehi aññehi ca garahito “sukhajīvino ime
atk-s0508a1:4790_8: samaṇā sakyaputtiyā”ti sukhajīvitaṃ ākaṅkhanto bhikkhūhi kataparicayo hutvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4790_9: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā aññe bhikkhū iddhimante disvā iddhibalaṃ patthetvā satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4794_0: Tattha me bhavanaṃ āsi, puññakammena saṃyutaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4798_0: Sakaṃ cittaṃ pasādetvā, avandiṃ satthuno ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4802_0: Antalikkhe ṭhito satthā, imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsatha.
atk-s0508a1:4803_0: “So te ijjhatu saṅkappo, labhassu vipulaṃ sukhaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:4816_0: Bhaṇḍā me sukatā honti, yadicchasi piḷandhanā.
atk-s0508a1:4824_0: Divasañceva rattiñca, āloko hoti me sadā.
atk-s0508a1:4826_0: Ñāṇāloko mayā diṭṭho, pattomhi acalaṃ padaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4830_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā puggalādhiṭṭhānavasena kosajjaṃ garahanto attano ca vīriyārambhaṃ kittento –
atk-s0508a1:4835_0: “Yo ca sītañca uṇhañca, tiṇā bhiyyo na maññati;
atk-s0508a1:4836_0: Karaṃ purisakiccāni, so sukhā na vihāyati.
atk-s0508a1:4840_10: bhikkhunā kammaṃ kattabbaṃ hotī”tiādinā vuttaṃ kosajjavatthuṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
atk-s0508a1:4840_15: Tiṇā bhiyyo na maññatīti tiṇato upari na maññati,
atk-s0508a1:4843_0: Ye cittakathī bahussutāti āyasmato khujjasobhitattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:4843_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahatā
atk-s0508a1:4843_3: bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso dasahi gāthāhi abhitthavi.
atk-s0508a1:4843_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde pāṭaliputtanagare brāhmaṇakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:4843_7: So vayappatto satthari parinibbute ānandattherassa santike pabbajitvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:4845_0: Rathiyaṃ paṭipajjantaṃ, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a1:4847_0: Ñāṇālokena jotantaṃ, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a1:4849_0: Uddharantaṃ bahū satte, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a1:4851_0: Sīhanādaṃ vinadantaṃ, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a1:4853_0: Pucchanti nipuṇe pañhe, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a1:4855_0: Tena puññaṃ anubhonti, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a1:4857_0: Na vikampati ajjhiṭṭho, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a1:4859_0: Vinadanti gajā mattā, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a1:4861_0: Abbhunnatā samā honti, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a1:4863_0: Sabbe satte viññāpeti, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a1:4867_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle rājagahe sattapaṇṇiguhāyaṃ sannipatitena saṅghena “āyasmantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4867_1: ānandaṃ āmantehī”ti āṇatto pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā therassa purato uṭṭhahitvā saṅghassa sāsanaṃ ārocetvā
atk-s0508a1:4867_2: sayaṃ puretaraṃ ākāsena gantvā sattapaṇṇiguhādvāraṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:4867_3: Tena ca samayena mārassa mārakāyikānañca paṭisedhanatthaṃ devasaṅghena pesitā aññatarā devatā sattapaṇṇiguhādvāre ṭhitā hoti,
atk-s0508a1:4867_4: tassā khujjasobhito thero attano āgamanaṃ kathento –
atk-s0508a1:4870_0: Tesaññataroyamāyuvā, dvāre tiṭṭhati khujjasobhito”ti. – paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a1:4871_2: vitthāraṇaṃ gambhīrakaraṇaṃ uttānīkaraṇaṃ kaṅkhāvinodanaṃ dhammapatiṭṭhāpananti evamādīhi nānānayehi
atk-s0508a1:4871_12: Taṃ sutvā sā devatā therassa āgamanaṃ saṅghassa nivedentī –
atk-s0508a1:4873_0: “Ye cittakathī…pe… dvāre tiṭṭhati māluterito”ti. – dutiyaṃ gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a1:4874_0: Tattha māluteritoti iddhicittajanitena vāyunā erito, iddhibalena āgatoti attho.
atk-s0508a1:4875_0: Evaṃ tāya devatāya niveditena saṅghena katokāso thero saṅghassa santikaṃ gacchanto –
atk-s0508a1:4880_0: Tattha suyuddhenāti pubbabhāge tadaṅgavikkhambhanappahānavasena kilesehi suṭṭhu yujjhanena.
atk-s0508a1:4880_2: Saṅgāmavijayena cāti samucchedappahānavasena sabbaso kilesābhisaṅkhāranimmathanena laddhasaṅgāmavijayena ca.
atk-s0508a1:4880_4: Evāyaṃ sukhamedhatīti evaṃ vuttappakārena ayaṃ khujjasobhito nibbānasukhaṃ phalasamāpattisukhañca edhati,
atk-s0508a1:4883_0: Yodha koci manussesūti āyasmato vāraṇattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:4883_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto ito dvānavute kappe tissassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:4883_3: uppattito puretarameva brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu pāragū hutvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:4883_5: Tena ca samayena tissassa bhagavato bodhisattabhūtassa tusitā kāyā cavitvā carimabhave mātukucchiṃ okkamanena mahāpathavikampo ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:4883_6: Taṃ disvā mahājano bhīto saṃviggo naṃ isiṃ upasaṅkamitvā pathavikampanakāraṇaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0508a1:4883_9: tasmā mā bhāyathā”ti buddhuppādassa pubbanimittabhāvaṃ kathetvā samassāsesi,
atk-s0508a1:4883_11: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:4883_12: vāraṇoti laddhanāmo vayappatto aññatarassa āraññakassa therassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā laddhappasādo pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:4883_14: So ekadivasaṃ buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge ahinakule aññamaññaṃ kalahaṃ katvā kālaṅkate disvā
atk-s0508a1:4883_15: “ime sattā aññamaññavirodhena jīvitakkhayaṃ pattā”ti saṃviggamānaso hutvā bhagavato santikaṃ gato,
atk-s0508a1:4883_16: tassa bhagavā cittācāraṃ ñatvā tadanurūpameva ovādaṃ dento –
atk-s0508a1:4886_0: Asmā lokā paramhā ca, ubhayā dhaṃsate naro.
atk-s0508a1:4889_0: Bahuñhi so pasavati, puññaṃ tādisako naro.
atk-s0508a1:4892_0: Ekāsanassa ca raho, cittavūpasamassā cā”ti. – tisso gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4893_0: Tattha yodha koci manussesūti idha manussesu yo koci khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā vesso vā suddo vā gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā.
atk-s0508a1:4893_2: Parapāṇāni hiṃsatīti parasatte māreti vibādhati ca.
atk-s0508a1:4894_0: Evaṃ parapīḷālakkhaṇaṃ pāpadhammaṃ dassetvā idāni parapīḷānivattilakkhaṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ dassento “yo ca mettenā”tiādinā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a1:4894_1: Tattha mettena cittenāti mettāsampayuttena cittena appanāpattena itarītarena vā.
atk-s0508a1:4894_2: Sabbapāṇānukampatīti sabbe pāṇe attano orasaputte viya mettāyati.
atk-s0508a1:4894_4: puññaṃ tādisako naroti so tathārūpo mettāvihārī puggalo bahuṃ mahantaṃ anappakaṃ kusalaṃ pasavati paṭilabhati adhigacchati.
atk-s0508a1:4895_0: Idāni taṃ sasambhāre samathavipassanādhamme niyojento “subhāsitassā”tiādinā tatiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a1:4895_1: Tattha subhāsitassa sikkhethāti appicchakathādibhedaṃ subhāsitaṃ pariyattidhammaṃ savanadhāraṇaparipucchādivasena sikkheyya.
atk-s0508a1:4895_2: Samaṇūpāsanassa cāti samitapāpānaṃ samaṇānaṃ kalyāṇamittānaṃ upāsakānaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā payirupāsanañceva
atk-s0508a1:4895_4: Ekāsanassa ca raho cittavūpasamassa cāti ekassa asahāyassa kāyavivekaṃ anubrūhantassa raho kammaṭṭhānānuyogavasena āsanaṃ nisajjaṃ sikkheyya.
atk-s0508a1:4895_5: Evaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto bhāvanañca matthakaṃ pāpento samucchedavasena kilesānaṃ cittassa vūpasamañca sikkheyya.
atk-s0508a1:4895_6: Yāhi adhisīlasikkhādīhi kilesā accantameva vūpasantā pahīnā honti,

atk-s0508a1:4911_0: Tathā nimittā dissanti, obhāso vipulo mahā.

atk-s0508a1:4938_6: tathā pemabandhanena bandhanaṭṭhena “bandhū”ti ca laddhanāmānaṃ bandhavānaṃ atthāya hitāya hotīti.
atk-s0508a1:4939_0: Evaṃ sādhāraṇato vuttamatthaṃ attūpanāyikaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “niggayhā”tiādinā itaragāthā vuttā.

atk-s0508a1:4939_3: Ñātibandhavapemena “amhākaṃ ayaṃ bandhavo”ti evaṃ pavattena pemena mama ovādaṃ atikkamituṃ asakkontā
atk-s0508a1:4939_4: kāraṃ katvāna bhikkhūsu pasannacittā hutvā cīvarādipaccayadānena ceva upaṭṭhānena ca bhikkhūsu sakkārasammānaṃ

atk-s0508a1:4942_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle ārāmagopakakule
atk-s0508a1:4942_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ ākāsena gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso labujaphalaṃ adāsi.

atk-s0508a1:4943_3: So vayappatto attano sahāyehi kevaṭṭaputtehi saddhiṃ macchagahaṇatthaṃ aciravatiyaṃ nadiyaṃ jālaṃ khipi.
atk-s0508a1:4943_6: Rājā “imassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇassa macchassa vaṇṇakāraṇaṃ bhagavā jānātī”ti macchaṃ gāhāpetvā bhagavato dassesi.
atk-s0508a1:4943_7: Bhagavā “ayaṃ kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa sāsane osakkamāne pabbajitvā micchā paṭipajjanto sāsanaṃ osakkāpetvā
atk-s0508a1:4943_8: niraye nibbatto ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ niraye paccitvā tato cuto aciravatiyaṃ maccho hutvā nibbatto”ti vatvā
atk-s0508a1:4943_10: tassa bhātikattherassa parinibbutabhāvañca teneva kathāpetvā imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā kapilasuttaṃ desesi.
atk-s0508a1:4944_0: Satthu desanaṃ sutvā yasojo saṃvegajāto saddhiṃ attano sahāyehi bhagavato santike pabbajitvā patirūpe
atk-s0508a1:4944_1: ṭhāne vasanto ekadivasaṃ sapariso bhagavantaṃ vandituṃ jetavanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4944_2: Tassa āgamane senāsanapaññāpanādinā vihāre uccāsaddamahāsaddo ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:4944_3: Taṃ sutvā “bhagavā saparisaṃ yasojaṃ paṇāmesī”ti sabbaṃ udāne āgatanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4944_4: Paṇāmito pana āyasmā yasojo kasābhihato bhaddo assājānīyo viya saṃviggamānaso saddhiṃ parisāya vaggumudāya
atk-s0508a1:4944_5: nadiyā tīre vasanto ghaṭento vāyamanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā antovasseyeva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:4956_0: Chaḷabhiññaṃ pana samānaṃ saparisaṃ āyasmantaṃ yasojaṃ satthā pakkositvā āneñjasamāpattinā paṭisanthāramakāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4956_2: Tenassa sarīraṃ kisaṃ ahosi lūkhaṃ dubbaṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4959_0: Mattaññū annapānamhi, adīnamānaso naro”ti. – paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a1:4960_3: Dhamanisanthatoti dhamanīhi santhatagatto appamaṃsalohitatāya pākaṭīhi kaṇḍarasirāhi vitatasarīro.
atk-s0508a1:4960_7: porisassa dhurassa vahanato porisalakkhaṇasampanno purisadhorayhoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:4961_0: Evaṃ thero satthārā pasaṭṭho pasaṭṭhabhāvānurūpaṃ attano adhivāsanakhantivīriyārambhavivekābhiratikittanamukhena bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ kathento –

atk-s0508a1:4969_1: evaṃ bhikkhu araññasmiṃ brahāvane araññāniyaṃ ḍaṃsādiparissaye sato sampajāno adhivāseyya,
atk-s0508a1:4970_0: Yathā brahmāti yathā brahmā ekako cittappakoparahito jhānasukhena niccameva sukhito viharati tathā ekoti

atk-s0508a1:4970_5: tathā dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sahavāse ghaṭṭanāpi bhaveyyāti sadutiyavāsena bhikkhu “devasamo”ti vutto.
atk-s0508a1:4970_6: Yathā gāmo tathā tayoti asmimeva pāṭhe tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sahavāso gāmavāsasadiso vivekavāso na hotīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:4970_7: Kolāhalaṃ tatuttarinti tato tayato upari ca bahūnaṃ saṃvāso kolāhalaṃ uccāsaddamahāsaddamahājanasannipātasadiso,
atk-s0508a1:4973_0: Ahu tuyhaṃ pure saddhāti āyasmato sāṭimattiyattherassa gāthā.
