atk-s0508a1:4979_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā bhikkhū ovadati anusāsati bahū ca satte dhammaṃ kathetvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0508a1:4979_1: Aññatarañca kulaṃ assaddhaṃ appasannaṃ saddhaṃ pasannaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4979_2: Tena tasmiṃ kule manussā there abhippasannā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4979_3: Tatthekā dārikā abhirūpā dassanīyā theraṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ sakkaccaṃ bhojanena parivisati.
atk-s0508a1:4979_5: appatiṭṭho bhavissatī”ti cintetvā therassa rūpena gantvā taṃ dārikaṃ hatthe aggahesi.
atk-s0508a1:4979_8: Taṃ disvā gharajano there appasādaṃ janesi.
atk-s0508a1:4979_9: Punadivase thero taṃ kāraṇaṃ anāvajjento taṃ gharaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4979_11: Thero taṃ kāraṇaṃ āvajjento mārassa kiriyaṃ disvā “tassa gīvāyaṃ kukkurakuṇapaṃ paṭimuñcatū”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0508a1:4979_12: tassa mocanatthaṃ upagatena mārena atītadivase katakiriyaṃ kathāpetvā taṃ tajjetvā vissajjesi.
atk-s0508a1:4981_0: “Ahu tuyhaṃ pure saddhā, sā te ajja na vijjati;
atk-s0508a1:4982_0: Yaṃ tuyhaṃ tuyhamevetaṃ, natthi duccaritaṃ mama.
atk-s0508a1:4984_0: “Aniccā hi calā saddhā, evaṃ diṭṭhā hi sā mayā;
atk-s0508a1:4985_0: Rajjantipi virajjanti, tattha kiṃ jiyyate muni.
atk-s0508a1:4987_0: “Paccati munino bhattaṃ, thokaṃ thokaṃ kule kule;
atk-s0508a1:4990_1: sā te ajja na vijjatīti, upāsaka,
atk-s0508a1:4990_2: ito pubbe tava mayi “ayyo dhammacārī samacārī”tiādinā saddhā ahosi,
atk-s0508a1:4990_3: sā saddhā te tava ajja idāni na upalabbhati.
atk-s0508a1:4990_7: sammā pasannacittena hi dānaṃ nāma dātabbanti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:4990_8: Atha vā yaṃ tuyhaṃ tuyhamevetanti yaṃ tava mayi ajja agāravaṃ pavattaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4990_12: Natthi duccaritaṃ mamāti mama pana duccaritaṃ nāma natthi maggeneva duccaritahetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā.
atk-s0508a1:4991_0: Aniccā hi calā saddhāti yasmā pothujjanikā saddhā aniccā ekantikā na hoti,
atk-s0508a1:4991_1: tato eva calā assapiṭṭhe ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍaṃ viya,
atk-s0508a1:4991_3: Evaṃ diṭṭhā hi sā mayāti evaṃ bhūtā ca sā saddhā mayā tayi diṭṭhā paccakkhato viditā.
atk-s0508a1:4991_4: Rajjantipi virajjantīti evaṃ tassā anavaṭṭhitattā eva ime sattā kadāci katthaci mittasanthavavasena rajjanti sinehampi karonti,
atk-s0508a1:4991_6: Tattha kiṃ jiyyate munīti tasmiṃ puthujjanānaṃ rajjane virajjane ca muni pabbajito kiṃ jiyyati,
atk-s0508a1:4992_1: kathaṃ tumhe yāpethā”ti evaṃ mā cintayīti dassento “paccatī”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a1:4992_2: Tassattho munino pabbajitassa bhattaṃ nāma kule kule anugharaṃ divase divase thokaṃ thokaṃ paccate,
atk-s0508a1:4992_5: atthi jaṅghabalaṃ mamāti atthi me jaṅghabalaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4992_6: nāhaṃ obhaggajaṅgho na khañjo na ca pādarogī,
atk-s0508a1:4992_8: “yathāpi bhamaro puppha”ntiādinā satthārā vuttanayena piṇḍāya caritvā yāpessāmīti dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:4995_2: Ayampi padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulaghare nibbatto ekadivasaṃ satthu dhammaṃ suṇanto
atk-s0508a1:4995_3: satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ vinayadharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0508a1:4995_4: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kappakagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0508a1:4995_6: So vayappatto anuruddhādīnaṃ channaṃ khattiyānaṃ pasādako hutvā tathāgate anupiyambavane viharante pabbajanatthāya
atk-s0508a1:4995_7: nikkhamantehi chahi khattiyehi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0508a1:4996_0: So pabbajitvā upasampanno satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā “mayhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0508a1:4996_2: Bhikkhu tava araññe vasantassa ekameva dhuraṃ vaḍḍhissati,
atk-s0508a1:4996_3: amhākaṃ pana santike vasantassa ganthadhurañca vipassanādhurañca paripūressatīti.
atk-s0508a1:4996_4: Thero satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:5000_0: Lakkhaṇe itihāse ca, sadhamme pāramiṃ gato.
atk-s0508a1:5002_0: Carakā tāpasā ceva, caranti mahiyā tadā.
atk-s0508a1:5004_0: Bahujjano maṃ pūjeti, nāhaṃ pūjemi kiñcanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5006_0: Buddhoti vacanaṃ natthi, tāva nuppajjate jino.
atk-s0508a1:5008_0: Sabbaṃ tamaṃ vinodetvā, loke uppajji cakkhumā.
atk-s0508a1:5011_0: “Pitu atthāya so buddho, dhammaṃ desesi cakkhumā;
atk-s0508a1:5012_0: Tena kālena parisā, samantā yojanaṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a1:5018_0: Aṭṭhame divase patte, sunandaṃ kittayī jino.
atk-s0508a1:5022_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:5026_0: Hāsayanto janaṃ sabbaṃ, dassayanto sakaṃ balaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5029_0: “Tattha me ahu saṅkappo, sutvāna munino vacaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:5030_0: Ahampi kāraṃ kassāmi, yathā passāmi gotamaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5034_0: Vinaye agganikkhitto, taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthaye ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5036_0: Tena bhogena buddhassa, ārāmaṃ māpaye ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5046_0: Mā naṃ koci viheṭhesi, santacittāna tādinaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5060_0: Sobhano nāma ārāmo, sampaṭiccha tuvaṃ muni.
atk-s0508a1:5067_0: “Hatthī assā rathā pattī, senā ca caturaṅginī;
atk-s0508a1:5082_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:5084_0: Upāli nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a1:5095_0: “Bhave sātaṃ na vindāmi, ḍayhanto tīhi aggibhi;
atk-s0508a1:5100_0: Taṃ pivitvā sukhī assa, visamhā parimuttiyā.
atk-s0508a1:5110_0: Tassa so vihane bhūtaṃ, samūlañca vināsaye.
atk-s0508a1:5114_0: So me tamaṃ vinodesi, bhūtavejjova bhūtakaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5128_0: Devānaṃ sā piyā evaṃ, āsāvatī latuttamā.
atk-s0508a1:5130_0: Sāyaṃ pātaṃ namassāmi, devā āsāvatiṃ yathā.
atk-s0508a1:5132_0: Dūrāgatampi maṃ santaṃ, khaṇoyaṃ na virādhayi.
atk-s0508a1:5138_0: Meghesu gajjamānesu, gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti tā sadā.
atk-s0508a1:5139_0: “Cirampi gabbhaṃ dhārenti, yāva megho na gajjati;
atk-s0508a1:5148_0: Caturo ca phale sabbe, dhammevaṃ vijanayiṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5152_0: Na me samasamo atthi, dhāremi sāsanaṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5154_0: Ettha me vimati natthi, akkhare byañjanepi vā.
atk-s0508a1:5160_0: Anaññātaṃ mayā natthi, ekaggo satthu sāsane.
atk-s0508a1:5168_0: Aṭṭālake ca vividhe, kāraye nagare bahū.
atk-s0508a1:5174_0: Mā me bhaṇḍaṃ vinassīti, bhaṇḍarakkhaṃ ṭhapeti so.
atk-s0508a1:5175_0: “Mamatto hoti yo rañño, vuddhiṃ yassa ca icchati;
atk-s0508a1:5186_0: Saddhā te esikā vīra, dvārapālo ca saṃvaro.
atk-s0508a1:5192_0: Āneñjañca nirodho ca, esā dhammakuṭī tava.
atk-s0508a1:5196_0: Kolito nāma nāmena, porohicco tavaṃ mune.
atk-s0508a1:5200_0: Ānando nāma nāmena, dhammārakkho tavaṃ mune.
atk-s0508a1:5204_0: Tattha me cintanā natthi, taññevatthaṃ kathemahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5206_0: Vinaye mādiso natthi, kuto bhiyyo bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:5208_0: Upālissa samo natthi, vinaye khandhakesu ca.
atk-s0508a1:5214_0: So me attho anuppatto, vinaye pāramiṃ gato.
atk-s0508a1:5216_0: Vijahitvāna taṃ jātiṃ, putto jāto mahesino.
atk-s0508a1:5219_0: “Tassa rañño ahaṃ putto, candano nāma khattiyo;
atk-s0508a1:5224_0: Āruyha sirikaṃ nāgaṃ, nagarā nikkhamiṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a1:5226_0: Devalo nāma sambuddho, āgacchi purato mama.
atk-s0508a1:5228_0: Tato sañjātakopo so, nāgo nuddharate padaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5231_0: “Sātaṃ tattha na vindāmi, siro pajjalito yathā;
atk-s0508a1:5238_0: Purā sabbe vinassāma, khamāpessāma taṃ muniṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5250_0: Pariḷāhaṃ vinodehi, mā no raṭṭhaṃ vināsaya.
atk-s0508a1:5252_0: Ayomayena kūṭena, siraṃ bhindeyyu me sadā.
atk-s0508a1:5253_0: “Dake aggi na saṇṭhāti, bījaṃ sele na rūhati;
atk-s0508a1:5254_0: Agade kimi na saṇṭhāti, kopo buddhe na jāyati.
atk-s0508a1:5255_0: “Yathā ca bhūmi acalā, appameyyo ca sāgaro;
atk-s0508a1:5256_0: Anantako ca ākāso, evaṃ buddhā akhobhiyā.
atk-s0508a1:5258_0: Khantānaṃ khamitānañca, gamanaṃ taṃ na vijjati.
atk-s0508a1:5262_0: Samatikkamma taṃ jātiṃ, pāvisiṃ abhayaṃ puraṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5268_0: Atthaṃ tuyhaṃ pavakkhāmi, yathā diṭṭhaṃ padaṃ mama.
atk-s0508a1:5271_0: “Mā vo khaṇaṃ virādhetha, khaṇātītā hi socare;
atk-s0508a1:5278_0: Āsīviso diṭṭhaviso, evaṃ jhāpeti taṃ naraṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5282_0: Sadevakaṃ so tāreti, tasmā te avirādhiyā.
atk-s0508a1:5284_0: Pathavīsadisā buddhā, tasmā te na virādhiyā.
atk-s0508a1:5286_0: Rāhule dhanapāle ca, sabbesaṃ samako muni.
atk-s0508a1:5296_0: Kappemi vinaye vāsaṃ, vinayo mama gocaro.
atk-s0508a1:5298_0: Upāli taṃ mahāvīra, pāde vandati satthuno.
atk-s0508a1:5299_0: “So ahaṃ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṃ purā puraṃ;
atk-s0508a1:5302_0: Tattha hi naṃ satthā sayameva sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ uggaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0508a1:5302_1: So aparabhāge bhārukacchakavatthuṃ ajjukavatthuṃ kumārakassapavatthunti imāni tīṇi vatthūni vinicchayi.
atk-s0508a1:5302_2: Satthā ekekasmiṃ vinicchite sādhukāraṃ datvā tayopi vinicchaye aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theraṃ vinayadharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a1:5302_3: So aparabhāge ekasmiṃ uposathadivase pātimokkhuddesasamaye bhikkhū ovadanto –
atk-s0508a1:5308_0: Saṅghasmiṃ viharaṃ bhikkhu, sikkhetha vinayaṃ budho.
atk-s0508a1:5311_0: Kappākappesu kusalo, careyya apurakkhato”ti. – tisso gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:5312_7: Mitte bhajeyya kalyāṇe suddhājīve atanditeti “piyo garu bhāvanīyo”tiādinā vuttalakkhaṇe kalyāṇamitte,
atk-s0508a1:5312_11: Saṅghasmiṃ viharanti saṅghe bhikkhusamūhe vattapaṭivattapūraṇavasena viharanto.
atk-s0508a1:5312_12: Sikkhetha vinayaṃ budhoti bodhañāṇatāsukusalo hutvā vinayapariyattiṃ sikkheyya.
atk-s0508a1:5312_17: Kappākappesūti kappiyākappiyesu kusalo suttavasena suttānulomavasena ca nipuṇo cheko.
atk-s0508a1:5312_18: Apurakkhatoti na purakkhato taṇhādīhi kutoci purekkhāraṃ apaccāsīsanto hutvā vihareyya.
atk-s0508a1:5315_0: Paṇḍitaṃ vata maṃ santanti āyasmato uttarapālattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:5315_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato gamanamagge setuṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0508a1:5315_3: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:5315_4: uttarapāloti laddhanāmo vayappatto yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0508a1:5315_5: Tassa ekadivasaṃ ayonisomanasikāravasena anubhūtārammaṇaṃ anussarantassa kāmarāgo uppajji.
atk-s0508a1:5315_6: So tāvadeva sahoḍḍhaṃ coraṃ gaṇhanto viya attano cittaṃ niggahetvā saṃvegajāto paṭipakkhamanasikārena
atk-s0508a1:5315_7: kilese vikkhambhetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:5321_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā sīhanādaṃ nadanto –
atk-s0508a1:5324_0: Pañca kāmaguṇā loke, sammohā pātayiṃsu maṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5329_0: “Sabbe kāmā pahīnā me, bhavā sabbe padālitā;
atk-s0508a1:5332_0: Tattha paṇḍitaṃ vata maṃ santanti sutacintāmayāya paññāya vasena paññāsampannampi nāma maṃ samānaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5332_1: Alamatthavicintakanti attano ca paresañca atthaṃ hitaṃ vicintetuṃ samatthaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:5332_10: lokato vā uttaritukāmaṃ maṃ loke pātayiṃsūti attho.
atk-s0508a1:5333_3: Devaputtamārassa vā issariyaṭṭhāne taṃ anupavisitvā ṭhito.
atk-s0508a1:5333_8: ahaṃ pāsā pamuccitunti aggamaggasaṇḍāsena rāgādisallaṃ anavasesato uddharantoyeva rāgabandhanasaṅkhātā maccurājassa pāsā ahaṃ parimuccituṃ asakkhiṃ,
atk-s0508a1:5334_0: Tato eva ca sabbe kāmā pahīnā me,
atk-s0508a1:5334_1: bhavā sabbe padālitāti vatthārammaṇādibhedena anekabhedabhinnā sabbe kilesakāmā ariyamaggena samucchedavasena mayā pahīnā.
atk-s0508a1:5334_2: Kilesakāmesu hi pahīnesu vatthukāmāpi pahīnā eva honti.
atk-s0508a1:5334_3: Tathā kāmabhavakammabhavādayo bhavā sabbe maggañāṇāsinā padālitā viddhaṃsitā.
atk-s0508a1:5334_4: Kammabhavesu hi padālitesu upapattibhavā padālitā eva honti.
atk-s0508a1:5334_5: Evaṃ kammabhavānaṃ padālitattā eva vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro,
atk-s0508a1:5337_0: Suṇātha ñātayo sabbeti āyasmato abhibhūtattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:5337_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vessabhussa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:5337_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto tādisena kalyāṇamittasannissayena sāsane abhippasanno ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:5337_4: So satthari parinibbute tassa dhātuṃ gahetuṃ mahājane ussāhaṃ karonte sayaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ gandhodakena citakaṃ nibbāpesi.
atk-s0508a1:5337_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde veṭhapuranagare rājakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:5337_6: abhibhūtoti laddhanāmo pitu accayena rajjaṃ kāreti.
atk-s0508a1:5337_7: Tasmiñca samaye bhagavā janapadacārikaṃ caranto anupubbena taṃ nagaraṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:5337_8: Tato so rājā “bhagavā kira mama nagaraṃ anuppatto”ti sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā dutiyadivase mahādānaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0508a1:5337_9: Bhagavā bhuttāvī tassa rañño ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ anumodanaṃ karontoyeva vitthārato dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0508a1:5337_10: So dhammaṃ sutvā laddhappasādo rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:5343_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhena viharante tasmiṃ tassa ñātakā amaccā pārisajjā nāgarā jānapadāti sabbe samāgantvā, “bhante,
atk-s0508a1:5343_1: kasmā tvaṃ amhe anāthe katvā pabbajito”ti parideviṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:5343_2: Thero te ñātipamukhe manusse paridevante disvā tesaṃ attano pabbajjakāraṇavibhāvanamukhena dhammaṃ kathento –
atk-s0508a1:5346_0: Dhammaṃ vo desayissāmi, dukkhā jāti punappunaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5352_0: Pahāya jātisaṃsāraṃ, dukkhassantaṃ karissatī”ti. – tisso gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:5353_1: idāni mayā vuccamānaṃ ohitasotā sotadvārānusārena upadhārethāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:5353_2: Ñātayoti ñātī pamukhe katvā tesaṃ sabbesaṃ ālapanaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:5353_5: etissaṃ vā mama pabbajjāya samāgatāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:5354_1: taṃ “dhammaṃ vo desayissāmī”ti paṭijānitvā “dukkhā jāti punappuna”ntiādinā desetuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0508a1:5354_2: Tattha dukkhā jāti punappunanti jāti nāmesā gabbhokkantimūlakādibhedassa jarādibhedassa ca anekavihitassa dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato dukkhā.
atk-s0508a1:5355_0: Tassā pana jātiyā samatikkamanatthaṃ ussāho karaṇīyoti dassento āha “ārambhathā”tiādi.
atk-s0508a1:5355_2: Nikkamathāti kosajjapakkhato nikkhantattā nikkamadhātusaṅkhātaṃ taduttariṃ vīriyaṃ karotha.
atk-s0508a1:5355_3: Yuñjatha buddhasāsaneti yasmā sīlasaṃvaro indriyesu guttadvāratā bhojane mattaññutā satisampajaññanti
atk-s0508a1:5355_4: imesu dhammesu patiṭṭhitānaṃ jāgariyānuyogavasena ārambhanikkamadhātuyo sampajjanti,
atk-s0508a1:5355_5: tasmā tathābhūtā samathavipassanāsaṅkhāte adhisīlasikkhādisaṅkhāte vā bhagavato sāsane yuttappayuttā hotha.
atk-s0508a1:5355_7: naḷāgāraṃva kuñjaroti evaṃ paṭipajjantā ca tedhātuissarassa maccurājassa vasaṃ satte netīti tassa senāsaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5355_8: abalaṃ dubbalaṃ yathā nāma thāmabalūpapanno kuñjaro naḷehi kataṃ agāraṃ khaṇeneva viddhaṃseti,
atk-s0508a1:5355_9: evameva kilesagaṇaṃ dhunātha vidhamatha viddhaṃsethāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:5356_0: Evaṃ pana buddhasāsane ussāhaṃ karontassa ekaṃsiko jātidukkhassa samatikkamoti dassento “yo imasmi”ntiādinā tatiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a1:5359_2: Ayaṃ kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto sikhimhi bhagavati parinibbute
atk-s0508a1:5359_3: tassa citakaṃ devamanussesu pūjentesu aṭṭhahi campakapupphehi citakaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0508a1:5359_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sakyarājakule nibbattitvā gotamoti
atk-s0508a1:5359_5: gottavaseneva abhilakkhitanāmo vayappatto satthu ñātisamāgame paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a1:5365_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā vimuttisukhena viharanto ekadivasaṃ ñātakehi “kasmā, bhante,
atk-s0508a1:5365_1: amhe pahāya pabbajito”ti puṭṭho saṃsāre attanā anubhūtadukkhañceva idāni adhigataṃ nibbānasukhañca pakāsento –
atk-s0508a1:5368_0: Dukkhamamhipi tiracchānayoniyaṃ, nekadhā hi vusitaṃ ciraṃ mayā.
atk-s0508a1:5374_0: Taṃ viditvā mahamahattasambhavaṃ, santimeva satimā samajjhaga”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:5376_0: Tattha saṃsaranti anādimati saṃsāre saṃsaranto kammakilesehi pañcasu gatīsu cavanupapātavasena aparāparaṃ saṃsarantoti attho.
atk-s0508a1:5376_12: Nekadhā hīti oṭṭhagoṇagadrabhādivasena ceva kākabalākakulalādivasena ca anekappakāraṃ anekavārañca ciraṃ
atk-s0508a1:5376_13: dīghamaddhānaṃ mayā vusitaṃ niccaṃ utrastamānasatādivasena dukkhaṃ anubhūtaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5376_14: Tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattasatto mahāmūḷhatāya cirataraṃ tattheva aparāparaṃ parivattatīti dassanatthaṃ idha “cira”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5377_0: Mānusopi ca bhavobhirādhitoti manussattabhāvopi mayā tādisena kusalakammunā samavāyena abhirādhito sādhito adhigato.
atk-s0508a1:5377_2: Saggakāyamagamaṃ sakiṃ sakinti saggagatisaṅkhātaṃ kāmāvacaradevakāyaṃ sakiṃ sakiṃ kadāci kadāci upapajjanavasena agacchiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5377_4: Nevasaññisu asaññisuṭṭhitanti rūpārūpadhātūsu ca na kevalaṃ saññīsu eva,
atk-s0508a1:5377_5: atha kho nevasaññīnāsaññīsu asaññīsu ca upapajja ṭhitaṃ mayāti ānetvā yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5377_8: ye pana ito bāhirakā tattha niccasaññino bhavavimokkhasaññino ca,
atk-s0508a1:5377_9: tesaṃ tassā saññāya micchābhāvadassanatthaṃ visuṃ gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5378_0: Evaṃ dvīhi gāthāhi bhavamūlassa anupacchinnattā anādimati saṃsāre attano vaṭṭadukkhānubhavaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0508a1:5378_1: idāni tadupacchedena vivaṭṭasukhānubhavaṃ dassento “sambhavā”tiādinā tatiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a1:5378_3: Kāmabhavādayo eva hi hetupaccayasamavāyena bhavantīti idha sambhavāti vuttā.
atk-s0508a1:5378_8: Pacalitāti saṅkhatattā eva uppādajarādīhi pakārato calitā anavaṭṭhitā.
atk-s0508a1:5378_11: Taṃ viditvā mahamattasambhavanti taṃ yathāvuttaṃ saṅkhatasabhāvaṃ attasambhavaṃ attani sambhūtaṃ attāyattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5378_12: issarādivasena aparāyattaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena ahaṃ viditvā tappaṭipakkhabhūtaṃ santimeva nibbānameva
atk-s0508a1:5378_13: maggapaññāsatiyā satimā hutvā samajjhagaṃ adhigacchiṃ ariyamaggabhāvanāya anuppattoti.
atk-s0508a1:5378_14: Evaṃ thero ñātakānaṃ dhammadesanāmukhena aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:5381_0: Yo pubbe karaṇīyānīti āyasmato hāritattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:5381_2: Ayampi padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute tassa citakapūjāya kayiramānāya gandhena pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:5381_3: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:5381_4: hāritoti laddhanāmo vayappatto jātimānaṃ nissāya aññe vasalavādena samudācarati.
atk-s0508a1:5381_5: So bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitopi ciraparicitattā vasalasamudācāraṃ na vissajji.
atk-s0508a1:5381_6: Athekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā sañjātasaṃvego vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā attano cittappavattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:5381_7: upaparikkhanto mānuddhaccaviggahitataṃ disvā taṃ pahāya vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:5387_0: Arahā pana hutvā vimuttisukhaṃ anubhavanto “yo pubbe karaṇīyānī”tiādinā tīhi gāthāhi bhikkhūnaṃ ovādadānamukhena aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:5390_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:5390_3: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute sādhukīḷanadivasesu vītivattesu
atk-s0508a1:5390_4: satthu sarīraṃ gahetvā upāsakesu jhāpanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantesu satthu guṇe āvajjitvā pasannamānaso sumanapupphehi
atk-s0508a1:5390_6: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bārāṇasiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:5390_7: vimaloti laddhanāmo vayappatto somamittattheraṃ nissāya sāsane pabbajitvā teneva ussāhito vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5396_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano sahāyassa bhikkhussa ovādaṃ dento –
atk-s0508a1:5399_0: Ovāde cassa tiṭṭheyya, patthento acalaṃ sukhaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5408_2: Bhajeyyuttamapuggalanti sappurisaṃ paṇḍitaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ ovādānusāsanīgahaṇavasena seveyya.
atk-s0508a1:5408_3: Ovāde cassa tiṭṭheyyāti assa kalyāṇamittassa ovāde anusiṭṭhiyaṃ yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjanavasena tiṭṭheyya.
